original:
Wondrous Item, Common

While you’re wearing this fearsome steel helm, your eyes glow red and the rest of your face is hidden in shadow.
translation:
奇物，普通

佩戴这顶头盔期间，这个惊悚的钢铁头盔会使你的眼睛亮起着红色的光芒，你脸部的其他部分则隐藏在阴影中。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This small sphere of thick glass weighs 1 pound. If you are within 60 feet of it, you can command it to emanate light equivalent to that of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00]{Daylight} spell (your choice). Once used, the Daylight effect can’t be used again until the next dawn.

You can issue another command as a Magic action to make the illuminated globe rise into the air and float no more than 5 feet off the ground. The globe hovers in this way until you or another creature grasps it. If you move more than 60 feet from the hovering globe, it follows you until it is within 60 feet of you. It takes the shortest route to do so. If prevented from moving, the globe sinks gently to the ground and becomes inactive, and its light winks out.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这个厚玻璃制成的小球重 1 磅。在它周围 60 尺内，你可以说出命令语以使它发出相当于法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00] 的光芒。使用一次后直至次日黎明前， 昼明术 效应将无法再次使用。

你可以用魔法动作来说出另一个命令语，以让发光球体飞到空中，漂浮在离地面不超过 5 尺的地方。球体将持续漂浮在空中，直到你或另一生物将它抓住。如果你离开球体周围 60 尺范围，则它将沿最短路径跟随你移动直到距离你 60 尺为止。如果它的移动遭到妨碍，它将闪烁着落回地面并回到启动前的状态，其发出的光芒也会熄灭。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This powder resembles fine sand. There is enough of it for one use. When you take a Utilize action to throw the dust into the air, you and each creature and object within a 10-foot Emanation originating from you have the Invisible condition for 2d4 minutes. The duration is the same for all subjects, and the dust is consumed when its magic takes effect. Immediately after an affected creature makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell, the Invisible condition ends for that creature.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这些粉末形同细沙，其分量足够使用一次。你可以用操作动作将粉末洒向空中，让你和以你为源点的 10 尺光环范围内的每个生物和物件变为 &Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态 2d4 分钟。每个目标的隐形时长相同，一旦粉末的魔法生效，其即被消耗。如果一名受影响的生物发动攻击或者施展法术，则该生物的隐形效应也随之终止。

original:
Source: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDustOfDisappe]{Dust of Disappearance}

You have the &Reference[Invisible] condition for 2d4 minutes or until you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.
translation:
来源： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDustOfDisappe]

让施放者和以施放者为源点的 10 尺光环范围内的每个生物和物件变为 &Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态 2d4 分钟。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This small packet contains 1d6 + 4 pinches of dust. As a Utilize action, you can sprinkle a pinch of the dust over water, turning up to a 15-foot Cube of water into one marble-sized pellet, which floats or rests near where the dust was sprinkled. The pellet’s weight is negligible. A creature can take a Utilize action to smash the pellet against a hard surface, causing the pellet to shatter and release the water the dust absorbed. Doing so destroys the pellet and ends its magic.

As a Utilize action, you can sprinkle a pinch of the dust on an Elemental within 5 feet of yourself that is composed mostly of water (such as a Water Elemental or a Water Weird ). Such a creature exposed to a pinch of the dust makes a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 10d6 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Foundry Note

The Determine Number of Pinches activity is provided for optional use and will consume item uses to produce a total of 1d6 + 4 remaining uses. Once the number of pinches in the packet has been determined, that activity may be deleted.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这个小包里共装着 1d6 + 4 把粉末。你可以用一个操作动作将一把粉末洒到水面上。粉末将把 15 尺立方区域的水变成一个弹珠大小的小球，漂浮或停止在粉末被洒下的位置附近。小球的重量可以忽略不计。 生物可以用操作动作将小球摔在某个结实表面，以令小球破碎并释放其中的水分。这样做会摧毁小球并使其失去其魔力。

你可以用利用动作将一把粉末洒在 5 尺内一个身体大部分由水组成的元素生物（例如 水元素 或 水诡 ）身上。此时该生物须进行一次DC 13 的体质豁免，豁免失败者受到 10d6 点暗蚀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

Foundry Note

确定份数 行动可供选择使用，将消耗物品的使用次数以产生总共 1d6 + 4 次剩余使用次数。一旦确定了包裹中的份数，该行动可以被删除。

key: entries->Dust of Dryness->activities->Determine Number of Pinches->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

Found in a small container, this powder resembles @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDustOfDisappe]{Dust of Disappearance}, and Identify reveals it to be such. There is enough of it for one use.

As a Utilize action, you can throw the dust into the air, forcing yourself and every creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from you to make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. Constructs, Elementals, Oozes, Plants, and Undead succeed on the save automatically.

On a failed save, a creature begins sneezing uncontrollably; it has the Incapacitated condition and is suffocating. The creature [[/save ability=con dc=15]]{repeats the save} at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The effect also ends on any creature targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} spell.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这种粉末通常被装在小盒子里，其分量足够使用一次。这种粉末看起来像是 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDustOfDisappe]，对其施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00] 也会给出这样的结果。

你可以用使用动作把这种粉末洒向空中，迫使你和你周围 30 尺内的生物进行一次DC 15 的体质豁免，构装、元素、泥怪、植物和亡灵在豁免中自动成功。

豁免失败者将不停打喷嚏，陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态并窒息。受影响的生物能在每次自己的回合结束时 [[/save ability=con dc=15]]{再次进行该豁免}。一旦豁免成功，其自己身上的效应也将随之终止。法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest] 也可以终止一名生物身上的该效应。

key: entries->Dust of Sneezing and Choking->effects->Incapacitated and Suffocating (Sneezing)->name
entries->Dust of Sneezing and Choking->effects->Incapacitated and Suffocating (Sneezing)->description

Source: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDustOfSneezin]
The creature has the Incapacitated condition and is suffocating. The creature [[/save ability=con dc=15]]{repeats the save} at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The effect also ends on any creature targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} spell.

Armor (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmHalfPlateA]{Half Plate} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]{Plate Armor}), Very Rare

While wearing this armor, you gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class. In addition, if an effect moves you against your will along the ground, you can take a Reaction to reduce the distance you are moved by up to 10 feet.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
护甲（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmHalfPlateA] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]），极珍稀

着装该护甲期间，你的AC获得 +2 加值。此外，当某种效应将要在违背你意愿的情况下使你沿地面移动时，你可以用反应来减少你被移动的距离，至多减少 10 尺。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
减少非自愿移动的距离

translation: 某种效应将要在违背你意愿的情况下使你沿地面移动时

original: Distance moved reduced by up to 10 feet

Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepWarhammer0]{Warhammer}), Very Rare (Requires Attunement by a Dwarf or a Creature Attuned to a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBeltOfDwarven]{Belt of Dwarvenkind})

You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the Thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged attack using this weapon, it deals an extra [[/damage 1d8 type=force]] damage, or an extra [[/damage 2d8 type=force]] damage if the target is a Giant. Immediately after hitting or missing, the weapon flies back to your hand.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepWarhammer0]），极珍稀（需矮人同调或一个与 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBeltOfDwarven]同调的生物）

你用该魔法武器发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值。它具有投掷属性，常规射程为 20 尺，最大射程为 60 尺。当你用此武器发动远程攻击命中时，它将额外造成 [[/damage 1d8 type=force]] 伤害。如果命中的目标是一个生物类型为巨人的生物，则将额外伤害提升至 [[/damage 2d8 type=force]] 伤害。攻击后，此武器将立即飞回你的手中。
伤害加值：对巨人造成 1d8 力场伤害

original:
An an action, you can light a Dynamite Stick and throw it at a point up to 60 feet away, where it explodes. Each creature in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

It takes 1 minute to bind two or more Dynamite Sticks together so they explode at the same time. Each stick after the first increases the damage by 1d6 (to a maximum of 10d6) and the effect’s radius by 5 feet (to a maximum of 20 feet).

It takes 1 minute to rig dynamite with a longer fuse so it explodes after a longer period of time, such as 1 minute or 10 minutes.

Foundry Note

The Throw Bundle activity allows you to select the number of bundled sticks and automatically adjusts the measured template and damage values.

To support bundling rather than increasing the quantity of Dynamite Sticks you have in your inventory, increase the max Limited Uses value of this item.
translation:
以一个动作，你可以点燃一根雷管并将它扔到至多 60 尺远的一点。雷管将于该点爆炸，每个位于该点附近5尺半径球状区域内生物都必须进行一次DC 12 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败者受到 3d6 力场伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

将多根雷管绑在一起能使其同时爆炸，这需要花费 1 分钟的时间来操作。此时每增加一根雷管，其爆炸时的伤害都将增加 1d6（至多增加至 10d6），爆炸半径则增加 5 尺 （至多增加至 20 尺）。

雷管可以通过安装更长的引线来延迟爆炸时间，这需要 1 分钟的时间来操作。这样做可以令雷管在更长的时间后才会爆炸，如 1 分钟或 10 分钟。

Foundry Note

通过投掷捆装 行动，你可选择雷管炸药的数量，系统将自动同步调整爆炸范围模板与伤害数值。

若需实现增量增效而非单纯增加背包内雷管数量，请提升该物品的使用次数上限最大值。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

While held up to your ear, this horn suppresses the effects of the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition on you.
translation:
奇物，普通

将这个小喇叭举在你耳边的期间，它会压制 &Reference[Deafened apply=false] 状态对你的影响。

key: entries->Ear Horn of Hearing->activities->Hold to Ear->name
entries->Ear Horn of Hearing->effects->Suppressed Condition: Deafened->name

original:
Ring, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

Each Ring of Elemental Command is linked to one of the four Elemental Planes. The DM chooses or randomly determines the linked plane. For example, a Ring of Elemental Command (air) is linked to the Elemental Plane of Air.

Every Ring of Elemental Command has the following two properties:

Elemental Bane. While wearing the ring, you have Advantage on attack rolls against Elementals and they have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Elemental Compulsion. While wearing the ring, you can take a Magic action to try to compel an Elemental you see within 60 feet of yourself. The Elemental makes a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the Elemental has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start your next turn, and you determine what it does with its move and action on its next turn.

Elemental Focus. While wearing the ring, you benefit from additional properties corresponding to the ring’s linked Elemental Plane:

Earth. You know Terran, and you have Resistance to Acid damage. Terrain composed of rubble, rocks, or dirt isn’t Difficult Terrain for you. In addition, you can move through solid earth or rock as if those areas were Difficult Terrain without disturbing the matter through which you pass. If you end your turn in solid earth or rock, you are shunted out to the nearest unoccupied space you last occupied.

Spellcasting. The ring has 5 charges and regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can cast a spell from it. Choose the spell from the list of available spells based on the Elemental Plane the ring is linked to, as shown in the following table. The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell, which has a save DC of 18.

Plane

Spells (Charges)

Earth

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEarthquake]{Earthquake} (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneShape]{Stone Shape} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneskin0]{Stoneskin} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofSton]{Wall of Stone} (3 charges)
translation:
戒指，传说（需同调）

每枚命令元素戒指都连接着四个元素位面之一。由DM选择或随机决定连接着的位面。例如，一枚命令元素戒指（气）连接着气元素位面。

每枚命令元素戒指都具有以下两种词条：

元素灾厄。 着装戒指期间，你对元素的攻击检定具有优势，且元素对你的攻击具有劣势。

元素强令。 着装戒指期间，你可以执行魔法动作来尝试强迫一个可见的，位于你 60 尺内的元素服从于你。该元素进行一次DC18的感知豁免。豁免失败时，该元素直到你的下个回合开始前陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态，且你决定其下一回合他将使用移动和动作做什么。

元素集中。 着装戒指期间，你受益于与该戒指连接的元素位面对应的额外词条：

土。 你懂土族语，你对强酸伤害具有抗性。你无视因碎石,岩石或泥土造成的困难地形。此外，你可以在固态土地或岩石内部穿行，如同它们是困难地形一般，且不会影响你所穿过的物质。如果你在固态土地或岩石中结束你的回合，你会被推回你先前所处的最近的未占据空间。

施法。 这枚戒指具有 5 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d4 + 1 已消耗的充能。着装戒指期间，你可以从中施展法术。根据戒指连接的元素位面，从以下表格中选择对应的法术，施展相应法术所需的充能数如该表所示，法术的豁免DC为 18。

位面

法术（充能数）

土

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEarthquake] (5 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneShape] (2 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneskin0] (3 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofSton] (3 充能)

translation:
奇物，非普通

这枚宝石蕴含了一道元素能量的微尘。

你可以使用一个利用动作来打破宝石，随后宝石便会失去魔法，并召唤出一只元素。元素会出现在距离被打破的宝石最近的未被占据的空间、理解你所说的语言、服从你的命令、使用你的先攻值并在你之后立即执行其回合。元素会在 1 小时后、它死亡时、你用一个附赠动作解消时消失。宝石的种类决定了其能召唤哪种元素，见下表：

宝石 召唤的元素

original:
Potion, Rare

The clear, red liquid has tiny bubbles of light in it.

When you drink this potion, you are cured of all magical contagions. In addition, the following conditions end on you: &Reference[Blinded], &Reference[Deafened], &Reference[Paralyzed], and &Reference[Poisoned].
translation:
药水，珍稀

这瓶清澈的红色液体中有着发光的微小气泡。

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你身上的所有魔法性疫病都会被治愈。此外，你身上的 &Reference[Blinded apply=false]、&Reference[Deafened apply=false]、&Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 与 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态都会结束。

original:
Armor (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainMail0]{Chain Mail} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}), Rare

You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class while you wear this armor. You are considered trained with this armor even if you lack training with Medium or Heavy armor.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
护甲（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainMail0] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainShirt]），珍稀

穿着这件护甲期间，你的AC获得 +1 加值。即使没有受训于中型护甲或重型护甲，你依然视为受训于该护甲。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This spellbook, along with anything written on its pages, can’t be damaged by fire or water. In addition, the spellbook doesn’t deteriorate with age.
translation:
\n

奇物，普通

这本法术书及其书页上所写的任何内容都不会因火烧或浸水而受损。此外，这本法术书不会随时间老化。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortbow00]{Shortbow}), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, which has no string. Each time you pull your arm back in a firing motion, a magical arrow made of golden energy appears nocked and ready to fire. An arrow produced by this weapon deals Force damage instead of Piercing damage on a hit, and it disappears after it hits or misses its target. Until it disappears, the arrow emits Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet.

This weapon has the following additional properties.

Arrow of Restraint.

Whenever you use this weapon to make a ranged attack against a creature, you can try to restrain the target instead of dealing damage to it. If the arrow hits, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=str dc=15 format=long]] or have the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition for 1 minute. As an action, a creature Restrained by an arrow can make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=20 format=long]] to try to break the restraint, ending the effect on itself on a successful check.

Arrow of Transport.

As a Magic action, you can fire one energy arrow from this weapon at a target you can see within 60 feet of yourself. The target can be either a willing Medium or smaller creature or an object that isn’t being worn or carried, provided the object is small enough to fit inside a 5-foot Cube. The arrow teleports the target to an unoccupied space you can see within 10 feet of you.

Energy Ladder.

As a Magic action, you can loose a flurry of energy arrows from this weapon at a wall up to 60 feet away from yourself. The arrows become glowing rungs that stick out of the wall, forming a magical ladder up to 60 feet long on the wall. This ladder lasts for 1 minute before disappearing.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongbow000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortbow00]），极珍稀（需同调）

你以此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰具有 +1 加值。此魔法武器没有弓弦。你每次做出拉弓动作时，一根金色能量构成的魔法箭会搭在弓上，随时准备射出。由此武器生成的箭在命中目标时造成力场伤害而非穿刺伤害，并且会在命中目标或失手之后消失。直到那根箭消失之前，它会放出 20 尺明亮光照与额外 20 尺微光光照。

这把魔法武器具有以下额外词条。

束缚之箭。

当你使用这把武器朝一个生物进行一次远程攻击时，你可以试图束缚该生物而非造成伤害。若箭命中了目标，则其必须成功于一次 [[/save ability=str dc=15 format=long]] 豁免，否则陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，持续1分钟。以一个动作，被一根箭束缚的生物可以进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=20 format=long]] 检定以挣脱束缚，若检定成功，则其身上的此效应结束。

转移之箭。

以一个魔法动作，你可以向位于你 60 尺内一个你可见的目标射出一根能量箭。目标可以是一名自愿的中型或更小的生物，也可以是一个未被着装或携带的，小到足以塞入一个 5 尺立方的物件。箭将目标转移至位于你 10 尺内一处你可见的未占空间中。

能量梯子。

以一个魔法动作，你可以对着一面位于你 60 尺内的墙壁从此武器中射出一连串箭，箭会成为突出墙面的发光梯级，在墙上形成一架至多 60 尺长的魔法梯子。梯子在消失前会持续存在1分钟。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: Willing target teleported to within 10 feet of you
translation: 自愿目标传送到距你 10 尺之内的地方

original: Creates a magical ladder 60 feet high
translation: 生成一个 60 尺高的魔法梯子

豁免失败：&Reference[restrained]
逃脱：[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=20]]

original: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition for 1 minute. As an action, a creature Restrained by an arrow can make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=20 format=long]] to try to break the restraint, ending the effect on itself on a successful check.
translation: 你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，持续 1 分钟。以一个动作，被一根箭束缚的生物可以进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=20 format=long]] 检定以挣脱束缚，若检定成功，则其身上的此效应结束。

Bound into this armor is a spell of level 8 or lower. The spell is determined when the armor is created and must belong to the Abjuration or Illusion school of magic. The armor has 6 charges and regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the armor, you can expend 1 charge to cast its spell.

The level of the spell bound into the armor determines the spell’s saving throw DC and attack bonus, as well as the armor’s rarity, as shown in the following table.

护甲（任意轻甲、中甲或重甲），多种稀有度（需同调）

这套护甲中铭刻了一道八环或更低环阶的法术。这道法术必须是一道属于防护或幻术学派的法术，在制造此护甲的时候决定。此护甲具有 6 充能，且在每日黎明时重获 1d6 已消耗的充能。着装此护甲期间，你可以消耗 1 充能以施展该法术。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This magical eye replaces a real one that was lost or removed. While the Ersatz Eye is embedded in your eye socket, you can see through the tiny orb as though it were your natural eye. You can insert or remove the Ersatz Eye as a Magic action, and it can’t be removed against your will while you are alive.
translation:
\n

奇物，普通

这只魔法眼球可以替代一只失去或被移除的真眼。在 义眼 被植入你的眼窝期间，你可以透过这颗微型小球视物，就像它是你的天生眼睛一样。你可以使用一个魔法动作植入或移除该义眼，并且在你活着的时候，义眼无法违背你的意愿被移除。

original:
Inhaled Poison

A creature subjected to Essence of Ether must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 8 hours. The creature also has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition while Poisoned in this way. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
translation:
吸入型毒药

吸入这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态 8 小时。以此中毒期间该生物还会陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态。该生物会在受到伤害、或是其它生物用一个动作来将其摇醒时苏醒。

original: The card’s medusa-like visage curses you. You take a −2 penalty to saving throws while cursed in this way. Only a god or the magic of the Fates card can end this curse.
translation: 卡片上与美杜莎相似的画像诅咒了你。诅咒持续期间，你的豁免检定具有 -2 减值。只有神明或命运卡牌的魔法可以终止该诅咒。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original: You take a −2 penalty to saving throws while cursed in this way. Only a god or the magic of the Fates card can end this curse.
translation: 你的豁免检定具有 -2 减值。只有神明或命运卡牌的魔法可以终止该诅咒。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

As a Magic action, you can open or close this bottle.

Opening the bottle causes thick smoke to billow out, forming a cloud that fills a 60-foot Emanation originating from the bottle. The area within the smoke is &Reference[HeavilyObscured].

Each minute the bottle remains open, the size of the Emanation increases by 10 feet until it reaches its maximum size of 120 feet.

Closing the bottle causes the cloud to become fixed in place until it disperses after 10 minutes. A strong wind (such as that created by the Gust of Wind spell) disperses the cloud after 1 minute.

Foundry Note

The scaling slider of the Open Bottle activity controls the size of the created Emanation from 60 feet at scaling value 1 to 120 feet at scaling value 7 (increments of 10 feet).
translation:
奇物，非普通

以一个魔法动作，你可以开关这个瓶子。

打开此瓶会使浓重的烟雾从中涌出，形成一团浓厚的烟云。烟云会充满以此瓶为源点的 60 尺光环区域。被烟云笼罩的区域处于 &Reference[HeavilyObscured].

只要瓶子保持开启，每 1 分钟此光环区域就会扩大 10 尺，最大达到 120 尺。

关闭此瓶会使烟云固定在原地，直至 10 分钟后消散。一阵强风（例如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind] 所创造的）可以在 1 分钟后将其吹散。

Foundry Note

开启壶盖 行动控制创造光环区域大小，缩放值为 1 时为 60 尺，缩放值为 7 时为 120 尺（每次递增 10 尺）。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepBattleaxe0]{Battleaxe}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreataxe00]{Greataxe}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepHalberd000]{Halberd}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepHandaxe000]{Handaxe}), Very Rare

You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Any Humanoid you hit with the weapon takes an extra 2d6 Slashing damage, and you gain Temporary Hit Points equal to the extra damage dealt.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepBattleaxe0]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreataxe00]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepHalberd000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepHandaxe000]），极珍稀

你用该魔法武器发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +1 加值。

你用该武器命中的任何类人都额外受到 2d6 挥砍伤害，且你获得等于造成的该额外伤害的临时生命值。

original:
Wondrous Item, Artifact (Requires Attunement)

Vecna was a mighty wizard who, through magic and conquest, forged a terrible empire. For all his power, however, Vecna feared death and took steps to prevent his demise by becoming a lich.

A treacherous lieutenant named Kas brought Vecna’s rule to an end in a terrible battle. Of Vecna, all that remained were one hand and one eye, grisly Artifacts that still seek to work Vecna’s will in the world.

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEyeofVecna000]{Eye of Vecna} and the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgHandofVecna00]{Hand of Vecna} are separate Artifacts that might be found together or separately. The eye looks like a bloodshot organ torn free from the socket. The hand is a shriveled left extremity.

Properties of the Eye and Hand. While attuned to both the hand and eye, you gain the following additional benefits:

Danger Sense.

You have Advantage on Initiative rolls.

Necrotic Reduction.

As a Magic action, you can target one creature you can see within 5 feet of yourself. The target makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 7d6 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage is transformed into green slime (see chapter 3) that covers the ground in its space, each 5-foot square of slime representing a separate patch. Nonmagical objects worn or carried by the target that are made of metal or organic material are destroyed by the slime.

Poison Immunity.

You have Immunity to Poison damage and the Poisoned condition.

Regeneration.

If you start your turn with at least 1 Hit Point, you regain 1d10 Hit Points.

Wish.

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish}. Once used, this property can’t be used again until 30 days have passed.

Destroying the Eye and Hand.

If the Eye of Vecna and the Hand of Vecna are both attached to the same creature and that creature is slain by the Sword of Kas , both the eye and the hand burst into flame, turn to ash, and are destroyed. Any other attempt to destroy the eye or hand seems to work, but the Artifact reappears in one of Vecna’s many hidden vaults, where it waits to be rediscovered.
translation:
奇物，神器（需同调）

维克那是一名强大的法师。他行使魔法之力征讨，建立了一个恐怖的大帝国。然而，拥有强大力量的维克依然畏惧死亡，他采取手段，通过成为巫妖阻拦死亡的脚步。

一名名为凯斯的将军发动了叛乱，并在一场骇人的战争中结束了维克那的统治，维克那剩下的只有一只手掌和一只眼睛，这些可怖的神器仍试图在世上贯彻维克纳的意志。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEyeofVecna000]{维克那法眼} 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgHandofVecna00]{维克那魔掌} 是独立的神器，可能一起出现也可能被分开发现。法眼布满血丝，有如刚刚直接从眼眶中抽出。魔掌则是风干萎缩的左肢。

法眼和魔掌词条。同时与法眼和魔掌维持同调期间，你获得以下增益：

危机感应。

你的先攻检定具有优势。

暗蚀抵抗。

以一个魔法动作，你可以指定一名位于你 5 尺内的你可见的生物为目标。目标进行一次DC 18 的体质豁免，豁免失败则收到 7d6 暗蚀伤害，成功则受到半伤。因受此伤害生命值降至 0 的生物将被转化为绿软泥（见第 3 章）并覆盖其所处空间的地面。每个 5 尺立方的软泥代表一个单独的区域。目标着装或携带的由金属或有机材料制成的非魔法物件将被软泥摧毁。

毒素免疫。

你对毒素伤害和中毒 状态具有免疫。

再生。

你的回合开始时，若你拥有至少 1 生命值，你恢复 1d10 生命值。

祈愿。

你可以施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]。该词条一经使用，30 天后你才能再次使用。

摧毁法眼和魔掌。

如果 维克那法眼 和 维克那魔掌 与同一生物维持同调，并且该生物被 凯斯之剑 斩杀，则法眼和魔掌即时迸出火焰烧成灰烬，并且被摧毁。任何其他摧毁法眼和魔掌的尝试似乎也是可行的，但这些神器会在维克那的其中一个隐藏宝库中重现，等着再临人间。

original: start your turn with at least 1 Hit Point
translation: 你的回合开始时，若你拥有至少 1 生命值

translation:

original:
Wondrous Item, Artifact (Requires Attunement)

The Eye of Vecna and the Hand of Vecna are separate Artifacts that might be found together or separately. The eye looks like a bloodshot organ torn free from the socket. See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEyeAndHandOfV]{Eye and Hand of Vecna} if both Artifacts are obtained.

Random Properties of the Eye. The Eye of Vecna has the following random properties (see “Artifacts” in this chapter):

  • 1 minor beneficial property
  • 1 major beneficial property
  • 1 minor detrimental property

Attuning to the Eye. To attune to the eye, you must press it into your empty socket. The eye grafts itself to your head and remains there until you die. If the eye is ever removed, you die.

Properties of the Eye. While you are attuned to the eye, your alignment is Neutral Evil, and you gain the following benefits:

Truesight.

You have &Reference[Truesight] out to 240 feet.

Spellcasting.

The eye has 8 charges and regains 1d4 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. You can cast a spell on the Eye of Vecna Spells table from the eye (save DC 18). The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell. Each time you cast a spell from the eye, there is a 5 percent chance that Vecna tears your soul from your body, devours it, and then takes control of the body like a puppet. If that happens, you become an NPC under the DM’s control.

Eye of Vecna Spells
SpellCharge Cost
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance}2
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCrownofMad]{Crown of Madness}1
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{Disintegrate}4
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominateMo]{Dominate Monster}5
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEyebite000]{Eyebite}4
X-ray Vision.

You can take a Magic action to gain X-ray vision with a range of 30 feet for 1 minute. To you, solid objects within that radius appear transparent and don’t prevent light from passing through themselves. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, or up to 3 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block the vision, as does a thin sheet of lead.

translation: 与法眼维持同调期间，你的阵营为中立邪恶，且你具有 240 尺的 &Reference[Truesight]。

original:
You gain X-ray vision with a range of 30 feet for 1 minute.

To you, solid objects within that radius appear transparent and don’t prevent light from passing through themselves. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, or up to 3 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block the vision, as does a thin sheet of lead.
translation:
你获得距离 30 尺的X光视野，持续 1 分钟。

对你而言，此视觉范围内的实体均为透明状态，并且不会阻碍光线通过。此视觉可以穿透 1 尺厚的石头、1 寸厚的普通金属、或是至多 3 尺厚的木头或泥土。更厚的物件，或是一层铅片，将阻碍这种视觉。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. They have 3 charges. While wearing them, you can expend 1 or more charges to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person} (save DC 13). For 1 charge, you cast the level 1 version of the spell. You increase the spell’s level by one for each additional charge you expend. The lenses regain all expended charges daily at dawn.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

这副水晶镜片适合戴在眼前。它具有 3 发充能。佩戴着这副镜片期间，你可以消耗至少 1 充能来施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso] （豁免DC 13）。若消耗 1 发充能，你可以施展一环版本的该法术。每多消耗一发充能，该法术的环阶就提升一环。镜片消耗掉的充能将在每天黎明时恢复。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, your vision improves significantly out to a range of 1 foot, granting you Darkvision within that range and Advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks made to examine something within that range.
translation:
\n

奇物，非普通

这副水晶镜片适合戴在眼前。佩戴着这副镜片期间，你观察周边 1 尺距离内的事物时的视力显著提高，这将给予你此范围内的黑暗视觉，并使你为检视某物而进行的智力（调查）检定具有优势。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you have Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. In conditions of clear visibility, you can make out details of even extremely distant creatures and objects as small as 2 feet across.
translation:
\n

奇物，非普通

这副水晶镜片适合戴在眼前。佩戴着这副镜片期间，你依赖视力进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势。另外，在视野清晰的情况下，你可以在距离极远之处看清小至 2 尺的生物与物件的细节。

original:
Nuisance Trap (Levels 1–4)

Trigger: A creature crosses a trip wire

Duration: Instantaneous

A falling net trap uses a trip wire to release a weighted, 10-foot-square Net suspended from the ceiling. The trip wire is 3 inches off the ground and stretches between two columns or trees.

The first creature that crosses the trip wire causes the Net to fall on it. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Restrained] condition until it escapes. The target succeeds automatically if it’s Huge or larger. A creature can take an action to make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach from the Net on a successful check.

Detect and Disarm. As a Search action, a creature can examine the trapped area and make a [[/check prc 11]] check, detecting the trip wire and the suspended @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagNet00000000]{Net} on a successful check. Once detected, the trip wire can be easily cut or avoided (no ability check required).

Destroy the Net. Reducing the Net to 0 Hit Points frees any creature trapped in it (see the Player’s Handbook for the Net’s statistics).

Set the Trap. A creature that has Thieves’ Tools and all the trap’s components (including a Net) can try to set a falling net trap, doing so with a successful DC 13 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. Each attempt to set this trap takes 10 minutes.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the trap for higher levels by increasing the weight of the Net, which increases the save DC and the DC of the Strength (Athletics) check as follows: DC 12 at levels 5–10, DC 14 at levels 11–16, or DC 16 at levels 17–20.
translation:
妨碍陷阱 （等级1-4）

触发： 生物穿过绊线时

持续时间： 立即

落网陷阱使用绊线来释放悬挂在天花板上的 10 尺见方的捕网。绊线离地面 3 英寸，架在两根立柱或树干之间。

第一个穿过绊线的生物将导致捕网向他落下来。该目标必须成功通过DC 10 的敏捷豁免，否则将陷入束缚状态，直至挣脱。巨型或更大的目标自动通过此豁免。生物可以用动作进行一次DC 10 的力量（运动）检定，成功即可将自己或触及范围内的另一生物从捕网中释放。

侦测与解除。 生物可以用搜索动作检查被设下陷阱的区域并进行 [[/check prc 11]] 检定，检定成功即可侦测到绊线与悬挂的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagNet00000000]。一旦被发现，绊线便可以被轻易地剪断或避开（无需属性检定）。

摧毁捕网。 将 捕网的生命值降至 0 点会释放其中任意被困住的生物（有关捕网的数据，参见 玩家手册）。

设下陷阱。 拥有盗贼工具和陷阱的所有组件的生物可以进行DC 13 的敏捷（巧手）检定，检定成功即可设下落网陷阱。每次设下陷阱的尝试都会花费10分钟。

针对更高等级。 你可以提升捕网的重量，从而提高豁免DC和力量（运动）检定DC，以此提升陷阱对应的等级范围：5-10级时DC 12，11-16级时DC 14，17-20级时DC 16。

original: Reality’s fabric unravels and spins anew, allowing you to avoid or erase one event as if it never happened. You can use the card’s magic as soon as you draw the card or at any other time before you die .
translation: 现实本身的存在被拆散而又重新编就，并以此让你得以避免或抹除某件已经发生的事件，如同它从未发生一般。你可以在抽到此卡时或直至自己死前的任何时间使用此牌的效果。

original: Card's effect occurs upon draw or at any other time before you die
translation: 你可以在抽到此卡时或直至自己死前的任何时间使用此牌的效果

original:
Wondrous Item, Rarity Varies

A Figurine of Wondrous Power is a statuette small enough to fit in a pocket. If you take a Magic action to throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of yourself, the figurine becomes a living creature specified in the figurine’s description below. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn’t enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn’t become a creature.

The creature is Friendly to you and your allies. It understands your languages, obeys your commands, and takes its turn immediately after you on your Initiative count. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if its creature form drops to 0 Hit Points or if you take a Magic action while touching the creature to make it revert to figurine form. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can’t be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine’s description.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFwpBronzeGrif]{Bronze Griffon (Rare)}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFwpEbonyFlyRa]{Ebony Fly (Rare)}

translation:
奇物，多种稀有度

异能塑像 是小到可以装在口袋里的小雕塑。当你用一个魔法动作来将雕像扔到你周围 60 尺以内的某处时，它将变成一只活体生物（见下文对每种雕像的描述）。如果雕像被扔到的地方被其他生物或物件占据，或者周围的空间不足以容纳该雕像变成的生物，则它将不会变成生物。

雕像变成的生物对你和你的盟友态度为友善。它能听懂你的语言并会按你的口头命令行事，使用你的先攻并在你回合结束后立即执行其回合。如果你不下达任何命令，则该生物会保护自己而不作其他动作。

生物存在的时间依雕像而不同。持续时间结束时，生物将变回异能塑像形态。当它的生命值降至 0，或是你在触碰它期间用一个魔法动作令其变回雕像时，它亦将提前变回雕像状态。变回雕像后，异能塑像的词条必须经过一段时间后才能再次启动（见下文对每种雕像的描述）。

original:
Ring, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

Each Ring of Elemental Command is linked to one of the four Elemental Planes. The DM chooses or randomly determines the linked plane. For example, a Ring of Elemental Command (air) is linked to the Elemental Plane of Air.

Every Ring of Elemental Command has the following two properties:

Elemental Bane. While wearing the ring, you have Advantage on attack rolls against Elementals and they have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Elemental Compulsion. While wearing the ring, you can take a Magic action to try to compel an Elemental you see within 60 feet of yourself. The Elemental makes a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the Elemental has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start your next turn, and you determine what it does with its move and action on its next turn.

Elemental Focus. While wearing the ring, you benefit from additional properties corresponding to the ring’s linked Elemental Plane:

Fire. You know Ignan, and you have Immunity to Fire damage.

Spellcasting. The ring has 5 charges and regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can cast a spell from it. Choose the spell from the list of available spells based on the Elemental Plane the ring is linked to, as shown in the following table. The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell, which has a save DC of 18.

Plane

Spells (Charges)

Fire

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBurningHan]{Burning Hands} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireStorm0]{Fire Storm} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire} (3 charges)
translation:
戒指，传说（需同调）

每枚命令元素戒指都连接着四个元素位面之一。由DM选择或随机决定连接着的位面。例如，一枚命令元素戒指（气）连接着气元素位面。

每枚命令元素戒指都具有以下两种词条：

元素灾厄。 着装戒指期间，你对元素的攻击检定具有优势，且元素对你的攻击具有劣势。

元素强令。 着装戒指期间，你可以执行魔法动作来尝试强迫一个可见的，位于你 60 尺内的元素服从于你。该元素进行一次DC18的感知豁免。豁免失败时，该元素直到你的下个回合开始前陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态，且你决定其下一回合他将使用移动和动作做什么。

元素集中。 着装戒指期间，你受益于与该戒指连接的元素位面对应的额外词条：

火。 你懂火族语，你对火焰伤害具有免疫。

施法。 这枚戒指具有 5 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d4 + 1 已消耗的充能。着装戒指期间，你可以从中施展法术。根据戒指连接的元素位面，从以下表格中选择对应的法术，施展相应法术所需的充能数如该表所示，法术的豁免DC为 18。

位面

法术（充能数）

火

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBurningHan] (1 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00] (2 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireStorm0] (4 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire] (3 充能)

original:
Deadly Trap (Levels 1–4)

Trigger: A creature moves onto a pressure plate

Duration: Instantaneous, and the trap resets at the start of the next turn

When a creature moves onto this trap’s pressure plate for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, a nearby statue exhales a 15-foot Cone of magical flame. The statue can look like anything, such as a dragon or a wizard. Each creature in the Cone must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Detect and Disarm. A Detect Magic spell reveals an aura of Evocation magic around the statue. As a Search action, a creature within 5 feet of the statue can examine it and make a [[/check DC prc 10]] check, detecting a tiny glyph on the statue on a successful check. Once the glyph is found, a character can take a Study action to examine it and make a [[/check arc 15]] check, ascertaining that the glyph means “fire” on a successful check. As an action, a character can use a sharp tool to deface the glyph, which disarms the trap.

As a Search action, a creature can examine the section of floor that forms the pressure plate and make a [[/check prc 15]] check, detecting the pressure plate on a successful check. Wedging an Iron Spike or similar object under the pressure plate prevents the trap from triggering.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the trap for higher levels by increasing the damage and the area of effect, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Fire Damage

Area of Effect

5–10

22 (4d10)

30-foot Cone

11–16

55 (10d10)

60-foot Cone

17–20

99 (18d10)

120-foot Cone
translation:
致命陷阱（等级1-4）

触发： 生物移至压力板上时

持续时间： 立即，且陷阱在下一回合开始时重置

当生物在一回合中初次移动至该陷阱的压力板上，或在其上开始自己的回合时，一座临近的雕像会喷吐出 15 尺锥状的魔法烈焰。雕像可能有着各式各样的外观，例如一条龙或一位法师。锥形区域内的每个生物都必须进行DC 15 的敏捷豁免，失败则受到11（2d10）火焰伤害，成功则伤害减半。

侦测与解除 Detect and Disarm. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi] 法术会揭示雕像周身的塑能系魔法灵光。以搜索动作，雕像5尺内的生物可以检查它并进行 [[/check DC prc 10]] 检定，成功时则发现雕像上的微小雕文。一旦找到雕文，角色可以执行研究动作以检查雕文并进行 [[/check arc 15]] 检定，成功时则查明该雕文意味着“火焰”。以一个动作，角色可以使用利器来刮花雕文，解除陷阱。

生物可以用搜索动作检查构成压力板的地面部分并进行 [[/check prc 15]] 检定，成功时则侦测到压力板。在压力板下插入铁钉或类似物件则可以阻止陷阱触发。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提高伤害与效应范围来提高陷阱对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级

火焰伤害

效应区域

22 (4d10)

30 尺 锥状

11–16

55 (10d10)

60 尺 锥状

17–20

99 (18d10)

120 尺 锥状

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 5–10)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgFireballFungu]{Fireball Fungus}

A fireball fungus is a Small, inanimate mushroom that can grow anywhere fungi are found in abundance. Its luminous, orange cap sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

A fireball fungus has AC 10, HP 6, and to Immunity Psychic damage. When it drops to 0 Hit Points, the fungus explodes as if a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} spell (save DC 15) had been centered on it.

At Higher Levels. The explosion of a fireball fungus causes other fireball fungi in the area of effect to explode as well. You can scale the hazard for higher levels by adding one additional fungus at levels 11–16 or three additional fungi at levels 17–20.
translation:
致命危害（等级5-10）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgFireballFungu]{火球菇}

火球菇是一种小型的、不会活动的菌菇，可以在任何真菌繁盛的地方生长。其发光的橙色菌盖为 15 尺半径范围内提供明 亮光照，并在额外的 15 尺范围内提供微光光照。

一株火球菇拥有AC10，6点生命值，并且对心灵伤害具有免疫。当火球菇生命值降至0点时，火球菇将爆炸，效果如同一道以其为源点施展的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]（豁免DC15）。

针对更高等级。 一株火球菇的爆炸将会使其爆炸范围内的其余火球菇也一并爆炸。你可以通过额外添加一株火球菇，来将危害对应等级范围提高到11-16级 ，增加三株火球菇可以将等级范围提高到17-20级。

original:
Weapon (Any Melee Weapon), Rare (Requires Attunement)

While holding this magic weapon, you can take a Bonus Action and use a command word to cause flames to engulf the damage-dealing part of the weapon. These flames shed Bright Light in a 40-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 40 feet. While the weapon is ablaze, it deals an extra 2d6 Fire damage on a hit. The flames last until you take a Bonus Action to issue the command again or until you drop, stow, or sheathe the weapon.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（任意近战武器），珍稀（需同调）

持握此魔法武器时，你可以用一个附赠动作说出命令语，以让这把武器用来造成伤害的部分被烈焰所包覆。武器的火焰散发出 40 尺范围的明亮光照，以及额外 40 尺的微光光照。

武器燃烧期间将对其命中的目标造成额外 2d6 点火焰伤害。火焰将持续燃烧到你丢下武器、将它收起或入鞘，或是用一个附赠动作说出命令语为止。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: A powerful devil becomes your enemy. The devil seeks your ruin and torments you, savoring your suffering before attempting to slay you. This enmity lasts until either you or the devil dies.
translation: 一名强大的魔鬼将成为你的敌人。它会试图摧毁你，折磨你，让你品尝痛苦的滋味，然后杀掉你。这份敌意将持续至它和你中的一方死去。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

来源：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDmtFlames0000]{火焰}

直到你或者魔鬼死去。

original:
Large Object

Armor Class: 19 Hit Points: 100

Flamethrower. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 14 (4d6) Fire damage, and the creature starts burning. Success: Half damage only.

Powered by magic, this iron coach has a flamethrower turret mounted atop it.

The coach can accommodate up to two Medium creatures. An iron hatch in the vehicle’s underbelly grants access. Narrow slits in the front, sides, and back of the coach allow its occupants to see outside. A creature in the coach has Three-Quarters Cover against attacks and other effects that originate outside it.

The coach is designed for a crew of two: a driver and a gunner. The driver can take the Utilize action to move and turn the coach, which has a Speed of 30 feet, using levers and pedals inside. The gunner can use the Flamethrower action to aim and fire it.
translation:
大型物件

AC: 19 HP: 100

烈焰喷射。

敏捷豁免： DC15，60 尺长、5 尺宽的线状区域内的所有生物。

失败： 14（4d6）火焰伤害，且该生物开始燃烧。

成功： 半伤。

这种覆着铁甲的战车由魔法驱动，其上装有能喷射烈焰的炮塔。

战车中的空间至多能容纳两名中型生物，由底部的舱门进出。战车的前后左右皆设有可供其操作手观察外界的狭缝。车内的生物对任何来自外界的攻击和其它效应都具有四分之三掩护。

喷火战车需要两名操作手驱动：一位驾驶员和一位炮手。驾驶员可以执行操作动作控制战车内的操纵杆与踏板，令战车移动或转向（其速度为 30 尺）。炮手则可以使用烈焰喷射动作来瞄准并发射火焰。

key: entries->Fochlucan Bandore Instrument of the Bards->name
original: Fochlucan Bandore Instrument of the Bards

key: entries->Fochlucan Bandore Instrument of the Bards->description
original:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgInstrumentOfT]{Instrument of the Bards}

An Instrument of the Bards is superior to an ordinary instrument in every way.

A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d4 type=psychic]] damage.

You can play the instrument to cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spell, it can’t be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC.
translation:
参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgInstrumentOfT]

吟游诗人乐器在各方面都优于普通乐器。

在未与乐器完成同调的情况下，尝试演奏乐器的生物必须进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] ，豁免失败则会受到 [[/damage 2d4 type=psychic]] 伤害。

你可以通过演奏乐器来施展它的一个法术。一旦该乐器被用来施展了某一个法术，则其直至次日黎明前都无法再被用来施展该法术。这些法术使用你的施法属性和法术豁免DC。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

This object appears as a wooden box that measures 12 inches long, 6 inches wide, and 6 inches deep. It weighs 4 pounds and floats. It can be opened to store items inside. This item also has three command words, each requiring a Magic action to use:

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBoatUtility00 caption=false]
translation:
奇物，珍稀

该物件外观看起来是个长 12 寸，宽 6 寸，深 6 寸的木盒。它重 4 磅且能在水面上漂浮，也可以像普通木盒一样装东西。该物品有三个命令语，使用每道命令语都需要一个魔法动作：

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBoatUtility00 caption=false]

original: You have Disadvantage on D20 Tests for the next 72 hours. Draw another card; this draw doesn’t count as one of your declared draws.
translation: 你的 D20 检定具有劣势，持续 72 小时。另外抽一张卡牌，这次抽卡不计入你声明的数量。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original: You have Disadvantage on D20 Tests for the next 72 hours.
translation: 你的 D20 检定具有劣势，持续 72 小时。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000]{Glaive}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

When you hit with an attack roll using this magic weapon, the target takes an extra 1d6 Cold damage. In addition, while you hold the weapon, you have Resistance to Fire damage.

In freezing temperatures, the weapon sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

When you draw this weapon, you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of yourself. Once used, this property can’t be used again for 1 hour.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]），极珍稀（需同调）

当你用此魔法武器以一次攻击检定命中目标时，目标将受额外受到 1d6 寒冷伤害。此外，持握此武器期间你对火焰伤害具有抗性。

在严寒环境中，此武器将会发出 10 尺明亮光照以及其外 10 尺的微光光照。

拔出此武器时，你可以选择让周围 30 尺内的所有非魔法火焰熄灭。该词条一经使用，直到 1 小时之后才可再次使用。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: One plant in your Greenhouse has three magical fruits growing on it. Any creature that eats one of these fruits gains the benefit of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} spell. Fruits that aren’t eaten within 24 hours of being picked lose their magic. The plant replaces all picked fruits daily at dawn, and it can’t be transplanted without killing it.
translation: 你温室里的一株植物上长有三颗魔法果实。吃下这三颗果实之一的生物将获得@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest] 的增益。如果魔法果实在被摘下后 24 小时内没有被吃掉，它们将失去魔力。这株植物在每天黎明重新长出被摘走的果实。这株植物无法被移植到其他地方，因为这会杀死该植物。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

Your Strength is 19 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect on you if your Strength is 19 or higher without them.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

戴着这双护手期间，你的力量值变为 19。如果未着装该护手时你的力量值已经大于或等于 19，则该护手无效。

original: Twenty-five pieces of jewelry worth 2,000 GP each or fifty gems worth 1,000 GP each appear at your feet.
translation: 二十五枚各价值 2,000 GP的宝石或五十枚各价值 1,000 GP的宝石出现在你的脚边。

translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This prism has 50 charges. While you are holding it, you can take a Magic action and use one of three command words to cause one of the following effects:

First Command Word. The gem sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. This effect doesn’t expend a charge. It lasts until you take a Bonus Action to repeat the command word or until you use another function of the gem.

Second Command Word. You expend 1 charge and cause the gem to fire a brilliant beam of light at one creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition for 1 minute. The creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Third Command Word. You expend 5 charges and cause the gem to flare with intense light in a 30-foot Cone. Each creature in the Cone makes a saving throw as if struck by the beam created with the second command word.

When all of the gem’s charges are expended, the gem becomes a nonmagical jewel worth 50 GP.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这块棱形宝石有 50 发充能。持握该宝石时，你可以用一个魔法动作来使用宝石的三个命令语之一，造成如下效应：

第一命令语。 宝石发出亮光，提供 30 尺的明亮光照和其外 30 尺的微光光照。该效应不会消耗充能。此效应将持续到你用一个附赠动作再次说出该命令语，或你使用宝石的另一能力为止。

第二命令语。 你消耗 1 充能，令宝石向 60 尺内你能看见的一个生物发出一道耀眼的光束。该生物必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免否则陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态 1 分钟。该生物在其每个回合结束时可以重复此豁免，豁免成功则结束其身上的此效应。

第三命令语。 你消耗 5 充能，令宝石以自身为原点对30尺锥状区域放出刺眼的光芒。区域内的每个生物必须进行豁免，如同它们被以第二命令语创造的射线击中一般。

耗尽充能后，此宝石变为价值 50 GP的非魔法宝石。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This gem has 3 charges. As a Magic action, you can expend 1 charge. For the next 10 minutes, you have &Reference[Truesight] out to 120 feet when you peer through the gem.

The gem regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.
translation:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

这块宝石有 3 发充能。以一个魔法动作，你可以消耗 1 发充能。接下来的 10 分钟内，你在透过宝石观察周围时具有 120 尺的 &Reference[Truesight]。

该宝石在每天黎明时恢复 1d3 发已消耗的充能。

translation: 与同等价值的钱币相比，宝石体积更小，重量更轻，携带更安全。

original:
Weapon (Any Simple or Martial), Rare

You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

When you hit a Giant with this weapon, the Giant takes an extra 2d6 damage of the weapon’s type and must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（任意简易武器或军用武器），珍稀

你用此魔法武器发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +1 加值。

你用此武器命中一名巨人时，该巨人额外受到与武器伤害类型相同的 2d6 点伤害，且必须成功通过一次DC 15 的力量豁免否则陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

original: On Hit: [[/save ability=str dc=15]] or fall &Reference[prone]
translation: 命中时：[[/save ability=str dc=15]] 或者失败 &Reference[prone]

original:
Armor (Studded Leather Armor), Rare

While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class. You can also take a Bonus Action to cause the armor to assume the appearance of a normal set of clothing or some other kind of armor. You decide what it looks like—including color, style, and accessories—but the armor retains its normal bulk and weight. The illusory appearance lasts until you use this property again or doff the armor.
translation:
护甲（镶钉皮甲），珍稀

穿着这件护甲期间，你的AC获得 +1 加值。你还可以用一个附赠动作使这件护甲的外观幻化为任何非金属的衣物或其他种类的护甲。幻化后的外观由你决定——包括颜色、样式和配饰——但其体积和重量不变。幻化外观的效应持续到你脱掉此护甲或再次改变护甲外观。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

If you’re hit by an attack roll made with a Ranged or Thrown weapon while wearing these gloves, you can take a Reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 plus your Dexterity modifier if you have a free hand. If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the ammunition or weapon if it is small enough for you to hold in that hand.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

在你穿戴该手套期间被远程或投掷武器造成的攻击检定命中时，若你至少空着一只手，则你可以用反应来减少 1d10 + 你的敏捷调整值的伤害。如果你把伤害减少到 0，则你可以选择抓住击中你的抛掷物（前提是它的尺寸足够让你用手抓住）。

original: Hit by an attack roll with a Ranged or Thrown weapon
translation: 在你穿戴该手套期间被远程或投掷武器造成的攻击检定命中时

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While wearing these gloves, you have a Climb Speed and a Swim Speed equal to your Speed, and you gain a +5 bonus to Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb or swim.

Foundry Note

The Gloves On Active Effect increases your Climb and Swim speed by 1 to indicate its equivalence to your Speed. The +5 bonus to checks made to climb or swim should be added as a situational bonus when applicable.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

穿戴该手套期间，你获得等同于你速度的游泳速度和攀爬速度。你进行攀爬与游泳相关的力量（运动）检定时获得 +5 的加值。

Foundry Note

穿戴手套 的被动效应会将你的攀爬和游泳速度加 1 ，表示攀爬和游泳速度与你的速度等同。当适用时，攀爬或游泳检定的 +5 加值应作为环境加值添加。

Wondrous Item, Uncommon

These gloves are imperceptible while worn. While wearing them, you gain a +5 bonus to Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks.

Foundry Note

The Gloves On Active Effect automates the +5 to your Sleight of Hand checks.

奇物，非普通

这双手套穿戴在手上时看起来毫不起眼。穿戴该手套期间，你进行的敏捷（巧手）检定获得 +5 的加值。

Foundry Note

穿戴手套 被动效应自动为敏捷（巧手）检定添加 +5 加值。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

While wearing these dark lenses, you have Darkvision out to 60 feet. If you already have Darkvision, wearing the goggles increases its range by 60 feet.
translation:
奇物，非普通

佩戴着这副暗色镜片期间，你具有 60 尺范围的黑暗视觉。如果你本就拥有黑暗视觉，则其在佩戴着这副夜视镜期间范围再扩大 60 尺。

original:
See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]{Figurine of Wondrous Power}

These gold statuettes of lions are always created in pairs. You can use one figurine or both simultaneously. Each can become a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobLion000000]{Lion} for up to 1 hour. Once a lion has been used, it can’t be used again until 7 days have passed.

Foundry Note

Each Use Lion activity has limited uses which represent the 7 days required before that particular paired figurine can be used again.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]

这尊黄金制成的狮子雕像总是成对制造。你可以只使用其中一只，也可以同时使用这两只。每只狮子雕像都可以变为一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobLion000000]{狮子} ，其存在至多维持 1 小时。每只狮子雕像都需要经过 7 日才能再次启动。

Foundry Note

每个 使用狮子 行动都有使用次数限制，特定玩偶再次使用前需 7 天时间。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This bag made from gray, rust, or tan cloth appears empty. Reaching inside the bag, however, reveals the presence of a small, fuzzy object.

You can take a Magic action to pull the fuzzy object from the bag and throw it up to 20 feet. When the object lands, it transforms into a creature you determine by rolling on the table that corresponds to the bag’s color. See the Monster Manual for the creature’s stat block. The creature vanishes at the next dawn or when it is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

The creature is Friendly to you and your allies, and it acts immediately after you on your Initiative count. You can take a Bonus Action to command how the creature moves and what action it takes on its next turn, such as attacking an enemy. In the absence of such orders, the creature acts in a fashion appropriate to its nature.

Once three fuzzy objects have been pulled from the bag, the bag can’t be used again until the next dawn.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgGrayBagOfTric rollable]
translation:
奇物，非普通

这种布袋有三种不同颜色的版本：灰色、铁锈色、棕褐色。布袋看起来空无一物，但把手伸进去会摸到一个小小的毛绒物件。

你能够以一个魔法动作取出布袋里的毛绒物件，并把它扔出至多20尺远。当物件落地时，投骰子参考对应颜色布袋的表格决定物件变成的生物。相关生物的资料见怪物图鉴 Monster Manual 。该生物在次日黎明时分或者其生命值降至 0 时消失。

扔出的生物对你和你的盟友态度 友善，且会在你的回合结束后行动。你能够以一个附赠动作命令该生物在其下一回合执行特定的移动方式，做特定的动作，例如攻击你的敌人。没接到命令时，该生物按自己天性行动。

一旦袋子抽出三件毛绒物件后，直至次日黎明才可再次使用。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgGrayBagOfTric rollable]

translation: 由DM决定或通过掷骰子来确定变成的生物

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgGreenSlime000]{Green Slime}

Acidic green slime devours flesh, organic material, and metal on contact. Bright green, wet, and sticky, it clings to walls, floors, and ceilings in patches.

One patch of green slime covers a 5-foot square. Green slime has Blindsight with a range of 30 feet, and it drops from walls and ceilings when it detects movement below itself. Beyond that, it can’t move. A creature aware of the slime’s presence can avoid being struck by it with a successful DC 10 Dexterity saving throw.

A creature that comes in contact with green slime takes 5 (1d10) Acid damage. The creature takes the damage again at the start of each of its turns until the slime is scraped off (requiring an action) or destroyed. Against wood or metal, green slime deals 11 (2d10) Acid damage each round, and any nonmagical wood or metal item used to scrape off the green slime is destroyed.

Direct sunlight or any amount of Cold, Fire, or Radiant damage destroys a patch of green slime.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgGreenSlime000]{绿软泥}

这种酸性的绿色软泥会吞噬接触到的血肉、有机物和金属。它呈现明绿色，黏滑潮湿，成片地附着在墙壁、地板以及天花板上。

一片绿软泥覆盖 5 尺方形区域，其拥有 30 尺范围的盲视感官，当检测到其下有移动物体时，绿软泥将从天花板或墙壁上掉落。除此之外，绿软泥不具有任何活动能力。注意到绿软泥存在的生物可以成功通过一次DC 10 的敏捷豁免来避免被其击中。

与绿软泥接触的生物会受到 5（1d10）点强酸伤害。该生物在每个自己的回合开始时再次受到该伤害，直至将软泥摧毁或将其从身上刮除（需要一个动作）。绿软泥对木材和金属造成每轮 11（2d10）点强酸伤害，并且任何用于刮除软泥的木质或金属质非魔法物品都将被摧毁。

阳光直射或者任何寒冷、火焰或光耀伤害都将立刻摧毁一块绿软泥。

original:
As an action, you can use a Grenade Launcher to propel a grenade to a point up to 1,000 feet away. The grenade explodes at that point, creating a particular effect in a 20-foot-radius Sphere.

Fragmentation Grenade. Each creature in the Sphere makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) Piercing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Smoke Grenade. The area of the Sphere is Heavily Obscured by smoke for 1 minute. A strong wind (such as the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind} spell) disperses the smoke.
translation:
以一个动作，你可以将一枚榴弹掷到至多 60 尺远的一点（借助榴弹发射器时则是至多 1000 尺远）。榴弹随即在该点处爆炸，在 20 尺半径球状区域内产生特定效果：

破片榴弹。 区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次DC 15 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败者受到 17（5d6）穿刺伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

烟雾弹。 区域被烟雾笼罩，变为重度遮蔽，持续 1 分钟。烟雾可以被一阵强风（如@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]）吹散。

original:
As an action, you can throw a grenade at a point up to 60 feet away. The grenade explodes at that point, creating a particular effect in a 20-foot-radius Sphere.

Each creature in the Sphere makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) Piercing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
translation:
以一个动作，你可以将一枚榴弹掷到至多 60 尺远的一点（借助榴弹发射器时则是至多 1000 尺远）。榴弹随即在该点处爆炸，在 20 尺半径球状区域内产生特定效果：

区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次DC 15 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败者受到 17（5d6）穿刺伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

original:
As an action, you can throw a grenade at a point up to 60 feet away. The grenade explodes at that point, creating a particular effect in a 20-foot-radius Sphere.

The area of the Sphere is &Reference[Heavily Obscured] by smoke for 1 minute. A strong wind (such as the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind} spell) disperses the smoke.
translation:
以一个动作，你可以将一枚榴弹掷到至多 60 尺远的一点（借助榴弹发射器时则是至多 1000 尺远）。榴弹随即在该点处爆炸，在 20 尺半径球状区域内产生特定效果：

区域被烟雾笼罩，变为 &Reference[Heavily Obscured] ，持续 1 分钟。烟雾可以被一阵强风（如@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]）吹散。

original: Setting fire to a container full of Gunpowder causes it to explode. When a container explodes, each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on the container makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
translation: 给填满火药的容器点火引燃就会使其爆炸。火药容器爆炸时，以容器为原点、半径 10 尺的球状区域内的所有生物都必须进行一次DC 12 敏捷豁免，豁免失败者将受到伤害：若容器为角瓶则是 10（3d6）火焰伤害；若容器为小桶则是 24（7d6）火焰伤害；豁免成功则伤害减半。

original: Setting fire to a container full of Gunpowder causes it to explode. When a container explodes, each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on the container makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw taking 10 (3d6) Fire damage (for a powder horn) on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
translation: 给填满火药的容器点火引燃就会使其爆炸。火药容器爆炸时，以容器为原点、半径 10 尺的球状区域内的所有生物都必须进行一次DC 12 敏捷豁免，豁免失败者将受到伤害：若容器为角瓶则是 10（3d6）火焰伤害。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

A Hag Eye has 3 charges. While wearing or holding this item, you can expend 1 charge to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkvision]{Darkvision} (targeting yourself only) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSeeInvisib]{See Invisibility}. The Hag Eye regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

Coven Sensor. The Hag Eye is usually entrusted to a hag’s minion for safekeeping and transport. As a Magic action, a hag who belongs to the coven that created the Hag Eye can see what the Hag Eye sees if the hag and the Hag Eye are on the same plane of existence. This effect lasts as long as the hag maintains Concentration. Multiple hags in the coven can see through the Hag Eye simultaneously.

Creating a Hag Eye. Only a hag coven can craft this item, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or another wearable item. A hag coven can have only one Hag Eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a special rite. This rite takes 1 hour, and the hags can’t perform it if one or more of them has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. If the hags take any other actions during this rite, the rite fails and ends.
translation:
奇物，非普通

一颗 鬼婆之眼 Hag Eye 具有 3 发充能。你佩戴或持握这件物品期间可以消耗 1 发充能以施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkvision]只能以自身为目标）或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSeeInvisib]。鬼婆之眼在每日黎明时恢复全部已消耗的充能。

集会传感器。鬼婆之眼通常会被托付给鬼婆的仆从以对其进行保护与转移。隶属于创造该鬼婆之眼集会的鬼婆若与鬼婆之眼处于同一存在位面上，则其可以用一个魔法动作透过鬼婆之眼视物。只要该鬼婆维持专注，则该效应将会一直持续。同一集会中的多个鬼婆可以同时透过该鬼婆之眼视物。

创造鬼婆之眼。 只有鬼婆集会才能够制造此物品，其成品由裹在清漆中的真实眼球制成，并通常镶在吊坠或其他可佩戴的物品之上。一个鬼婆集会在同一时间只能拥有一颗鬼婆之眼，制作一个新的则需全部三位集会成员进行一场特殊仪式。这场仪式耗时 1 小时，且若一名或多名鬼婆陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态，则仪式无法进行。若鬼婆们在仪式期间执行任何其他动作，则仪式失败并终止。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMaul000000]{Maul} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepWarhammer0]{Warhammer}), Legendary (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

The weapon has 5 charges. You can expend 1 charge and make a ranged attack with the weapon, hurling it as if it had the Thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. If the attack hits, the weapon unleashes a thunderclap audible out to 300 feet. The target and every creature within 30 feet of it other than you must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the Stunned condition until the end of your next turn. Immediately after hitting or missing, the weapon flies back to your hand. The weapon regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn.

Giant’s Bane. While you are attuned to the weapon and wearing either a Belt of Giant Strength or Gauntlets of Ogre Power to which you are also attuned, you gain the following benefits:

Giants’ Bane.

When you roll a 20 on the d20 for an attack roll made with this weapon against a Giant, the creature must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or die.

Might of Giants.

The Strength score bestowed by your Belt of Giant Strength or Gauntlets of Ogre Power increases by 4, to a maximum of 30.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMaul000000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepWarhammer0]），传说（需同调）

你用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +1 加值。

此魔法武器具有 5 发充能，你可以消耗 1 发充能并以此武器发动一次远程攻击，如同其具有投掷（射程 20/60）词条一般将其投掷出去。若攻击命中，此武器将发出距你 300 尺内都能听见的雷鸣。目标和位于目标 30 尺内除你以外的每名生物必须成功通过一次DC 17 的体质豁免检定，否则陷入震慑状态直至你的下个回合结束。无论攻击是否命中，此武器立即回到你的手中。此武器在每日黎明时恢复 1d4 + 1 已消耗的充能。

巨人杀手。 与此武器同调期间，若你同时着装 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBeltOfGiantSt] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgGauntletsOfOg] 且与他们同调，你获得以下增益：

戮巨人者。

当你在以此武器对巨人进行的攻击检定的 d20 中掷出 20 时，该生物必须成功通过一次DC 17 的体质豁免检定，否则立即死亡。

巨人伟力。

你的巨人之力腰带 或 食人魔力量护手提供的力量值提升 4，至多提升至 30。

original: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of your next turn.

key: entries->Hammer of Thunderbolts->effects->Giant's Bane: Paired Attunement Bonuses->description
original:
Giant’s Bane. While you are attuned to the weapon and wearing either a Belt of Giant Strength or Gauntlets of Ogre Power to which you are also attuned, you gain the following benefits:

  • Giants’ Bane. When you roll a 20 on the d20 for an attack roll made with this weapon against a Giant, the creature must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or die.

  • Might of Giants. The Strength score bestowed by your Belt of Giant Strength or Gauntlets of Ogre Power increases by 4, to a maximum of 30.
translation:
巨人戮者。 与此武器同调期间，若你同时着装 巨人之力腰带 和 食人魔力量护手 且与他们同调，你获得以下增益：

  • 戮巨人者。 当你在以此武器对巨人进行的攻击检定的 d20 中掷出 20 时，该生物必须成功通过一次DC 17 的体质豁免检定，否则立即死亡。

  • 巨人伟力。 你的 巨人之力腰带 和 食人魔力量护手 提供的力量值提升 4，至多提升至 30。

original: The Strength score bestowed by your Belt of Giant Strength or Gauntlets of Ogre Power increases by 4, to a maximum of 30.
translation: 你的 巨人之力腰带 和 食人魔力量护手 提供的力量值提升 4，至多提升至 30。

original:
Wondrous Item, Artifact (Requires Attunement)

The Eye of Vecna and the Hand of Vecna are separate Artifacts that might be found together or separately. The hand is a shriveled left extremity. See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEyeAndHandOfV]{Eye and Hand of Vecna} if both Artifacts are obtained.

Random Properties of the Hand. The Hand of Vecna has the following @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.iA3mHmvlXvWKlyBo#artifact-properties]{random properties}:

  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorBenefici]{minor beneficial property}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorBenefici]{major beneficial property}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorDetrimen]{minor detrimental property}

Attuning to the Hand. To attune to the hand, you must press it against the stump where your left hand was. The hand grafts itself to your arm and becomes a functioning appendage. If the hand is ever removed, you die.

Properties of the Hand. When you are attuned to the hand, your alignment is Neutral Evil, and you gain the following benefits:

Great Strength.

Your Strength becomes 20 unless it is already 20 or higher.

Icy Touch.

Any melee spell attack you make with the hand and any melee attack made with a weapon held by it deals an extra 2d8 Cold damage on a hit.

Spellcasting.

The hand has 8 charges and regains 1d4 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. You can cast a spell on the Hand of Vecna Spells table from the hand (save DC 18). The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell. Each time you cast a spell from it, the hand casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{Suggestion} on you ([[/save ability=wis dc=18]]{save DC 18}; no Concentration required), demanding that you commit an evil act. The hand might have a specific act in mind or leave it up to you.

Hand of Vecna Spells
SpellCharge Cost
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFingerofDe]{Finger of Death}5
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000]{Sleep}1
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow}2
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTeleport00]{Teleport}3
translation:
奇物，神器（需同调）

维克那法眼 和 维克那魔掌 是独立的神器，可能一起出现也可能被分开发现。@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEyeAndHandOfV]{维克纳法眼}布满血丝，有如刚刚直接从眼眶中抽出。魔掌则是风干萎缩的左肢。

魔掌随机词条。维克那魔掌具有下列随机词条（见本章@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.iA3mHmvlXvWKlyBo#artifact-properties]{神器}”）：

  • 1 项次要减益词条@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorBenefici]{次要增益词条}
  • 1 项次要减益词条@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorBenefici]{主要增益词条}
  • 1 项次要减益词条@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorDetrimen]{次要减益词条}

同调魔掌。 要与魔掌进行同调，你必须将魔掌压在左手断肢的截面。魔掌会自行嫁接入你的手臂并成为一副正常运作的前肢。此后魔掌一旦被取下，你将立即死亡。

魔掌词条。 与魔掌维持同调期间，你的阵营为中立邪恶，且你获得以下增益：

超级力量。

你的力量变为 20，除非其已是 20 或更高。

极寒之抚。

任意你以魔掌进行的近战法术攻击或你以魔掌持握的武器进行的近战攻击命中时，额外造成 2d8 寒冷伤害。

施法。

魔掌具有 8 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d4 + 4 已消耗的充能。你能以魔掌施展维克纳魔掌法术表中的法术（豁免DC 18）。表中表明了你施展对应的法术需要消耗多少充能。每当你以魔掌施展法术时，魔掌会对你施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]（[[/save ability=wis dc=18]]{豁免DC 18}，无需专注）要求你犯下恶行。魔掌可能对恶行有特定的要求，或是由你决定具体的行为。

维克纳魔掌法术
法术 充能消耗
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFingerofDe] 5
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000] 1
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSlow000000] 2
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTeleport00] 3

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this hat, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} spell. The spell ends if the hat is removed.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

着装此帽时，你可以施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]。若帽子被摘下，则法术结束。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare (Requires Attunement by a Wizard)

This pointed hat has the following properties.

Spellcasting Focus. While holding the hat, you can use it as a Spellcasting Focus for your Wizard spells. Any spell you cast using the hat gains a special Somatic component: you must reach into the hat and “pull” the spell out of it.

Unknown Spell. While holding the hat, you can try to cast a level 1+ spell you don’t know. The spell must be on the Wizard spell list, it must be of a level you can cast, and it can’t have Material components costing more than 1,000 GP. Once you decide on the spell, you must expend a spell slot of the spell’s level. Then, to determine whether you cast the spell, make an Intelligence (Arcana) check (DC 10 plus the spell’s level). On a successful check, you cast the spell using its normal casting time, and you can’t use this property again until you finish a Short or Long Rest. On a failed check, you fail to cast the spell and a random effect occurs instead, determined by rolling on the following table.

Any spell you cast from the hat uses your spell save DC and spell attack bonus.

Roll Table

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgHatOfManySpel caption=false rollable]
translation:
奇物，极珍稀（需法师同调）

这顶尖顶帽具有以下词条：

施法法器。 持握这顶帽子期间，你可以将其作为你施展法师法术的施法法器使用。任何你通过这顶帽子施展的法术均具有特殊的姿势成分，即你必须将手伸入帽子之中以将法术从中“拽”出来。

未知法术。 持握这顶帽子期间，你可以尝试施展一道你并未已知的一环或以上法术。所选法术必须位于法师法表中，同时其环阶必须是你能够施展的法术环阶，其也不能具有多于 1000 GP的材料成分。一旦你决定了施展哪道法术，你必须消耗法术环阶所对应的一个法术位。随后，为了决定你是否施展该法术，进行一次智力（奥秘）检定（DC = 10 + 法术环阶）。检定成功，则你以该法术的正常施法时间施展该法术，且你直到完成一次短休或长休之前不能再次使用此词条。检定失败，则你施法失败，转而在下表掷骰以决定触发的随机效应。

你通过帽子施展的所有法术均使用你的法术豁免DC和法术攻击加值。

随机表

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgHatOfManySpel caption=false rollable]

key: entries->Hat of Many Spells->activities->Unknown Spell Check->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This hat has 3 charges. While holding the hat, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 charge and summon your choice of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.qav2dvMIUiMQCCsy]{Bat}, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.EZgiprHXA2D7Uyb3]{Frog}, or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.pozQUPTnLZW8epox]{Rat}. The summoned creature magically appears in the hat and tries to get away from you as quickly as possible. The creature is Indifferent toward you and other creatures, and it isn’t under your control. It behaves as an ordinary creature of its kind and disappears after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 Hit Points. The hat regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
translation:
奇物，普通

这顶帽子有 3 发充能。持握此帽期间，你可以用一个魔法动作消耗 1 发充能，召唤你选择的下述三种生物之一：一只@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.qav2dvMIUiMQCCsy]{蝙蝠}，一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.EZgiprHXA2D7Uyb3]{青蛙}或一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.pozQUPTnLZW8epox]{老鼠}。召唤出的生物魔法性地出现在帽子中，并且会试图尽快远离你。此生物对你和其他生物的态度是冷漠，且不在你的控制之下。它会如其种类的普通生物一般行动，且会在 1 小时或者生命值降至 0 点时消失。此帽在每日黎明时恢复所有已消耗的充能。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common (Requires Attunement by a Wizard)

This cone-shaped hat is adorned with moons and stars. While you are wearing it, you gain the following benefits.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use the hat as a Spellcasting Focus for your Wizard spells.

Unknown Spell. As a Magic action, you can try to cast a cantrip that you don’t know. The cantrip must be on the Wizard spell list and have a casting time of an action, and you make a DC 10 Intelligence (Arcana) check. On a successful check, you cast the spell. On a failed check, the spell fails, and the action used to cast the spell is wasted. In either case, you can’t use this property again until you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
奇物，普通（需法师同调）

这顶锥形帽上点缀着星月。你着装此帽期间，你获得下述增益。

施法法器。 你可以将其作为你施展法师法术的施法法器。

未知法术。 你可以用一个魔法动作尝试施展一道你并未已知的戏法。所选戏法必须位于法师法表中，并且其施法时间必须为动作。你进行一次DC 10 的智力（奥秘）检定。检定成功，则你施展那道法术。检定失败，则你施法失败，用于施法的动作被浪费。无论检定成功与否，此词条一经使用，直到你完成一次长休之前不能再次使用。

key: entries->Hat of Wizardry->activities->Attempt to Cast Spell->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

Your Intelligence is 19 while you wear this headband. It has no effect on you if your Intelligence is 19 or higher without it.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

你着装此帽期间智力值变为19。若你未着装此物品时智力已为19或更高，则此魔法物品对你不产生效应。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

This helm is set with [[/r 1d10 # Diamonds]] diamonds, [[/r 2d10 # Rubies]] rubies, [[/r 3d10 # Fire Opals]] fire opals, and [[/r 4d10 # Opals]] opals. Any gem pried from the helm crumbles to dust. When all the gems are removed or destroyed, the helm loses its magic.

You gain the following benefits while wearing the helm.

Diamond Light. As long as it has at least one diamond, the helm emits a 30-foot Emanation. When at least one Undead is within that area, the Emanation is filled with Dim Light. Any Undead that starts its turn in that area takes 1d6 Radiant damage.

Fire Opal Flames. As long as the helm has at least one fire opal, you can take a Magic action to cause one weapon you are holding to burst into flames. The flames emit Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet. The flames are harmless to you and the weapon. When you hit with an attack using the blazing weapon, the target takes an extra 1d6 Fire damage. The flames last until you take a Bonus Action to extinguish them or until you drop or stow the weapon.

Ruby Resistance. As long as the helm has at least one ruby, you have Resistance to Fire damage.

Spells. You can cast one of the following spells (save DC 18), using one of the helm’s gems of the specified type as a component: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00]{Daylight} (opal), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (fire opal), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrismaticS]{Prismatic Spray} (diamond), or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire} (ruby). The gem is destroyed when the spell is cast and disappears from the helm.

Taking Fire Damage. Roll [[/r 1d20]] if you are wearing the helm and take Fire damage as a result of failing a saving throw against a spell. On a roll of 1, the helm emits beams of light from its remaining gems and is then destroyed. Each creature within a 60-foot Emanation originating from you must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be struck by a beam, taking Radiant damage equal to the number of gems in the helm.

Diamonds:

Rubies:

Fire Opals:

Opals:

Foundry Note

You can track the number of each gem in the description.

If you roll a 1 as part of the Taking Fire Damage property use the Explosive Emanation activity. It will allow you to enter the number of gems remaining in the helm and increase the damage automatically.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀（需同调）

此头盔上镶嵌着 [[/r 1d10 # Diamonds]] 颗钻石， [[/r 2d10 # Rubies]] 颗红宝石，[[/r 3d10 # Fire Opals]] 颗火欧泊和 [[/r 4d10 # Opals]] 颗欧泊。任何从头盔上撬下的宝石都会崩碎成灰。头盔上所有的宝石都被移除或摧毁时，其便会失去魔法。

你着装头盔时获得以下增益。

钻石辉光。 只要头盔上至少有一颗钻石，其便会散发出 30 尺光环区域。至少有一名亡灵位于此区域中时，光环区域便会充满微光光照。任何在此区域中开始其回合的亡灵受到 1d6 光耀伤害。

火欧泊烈焰。 只要头盔上至少有一颗火欧泊，你便可以用一个魔法动作令烈焰包裹在你持握的一把武器上。烈焰散发出 10 尺明亮光照与其外 10 尺微光光照。烈焰对你和武器是无害的。当你使用此武器进行的攻击检定命中时，目标额外受到 1d6 火焰伤害。烈焰持续至你用一个附赠动作熄灭烈焰，你丢下武器或收起武器。 。只要头盔上至少有一颗红宝石，你便具有对火焰伤害的抗性。

红宝石抗性。只要头盔上至少有一颗红宝石，你便具有对火焰伤害的抗性。

法术。 你可以施展以下法术之一（豁免DC 18），使用头盔上其中一颗特定种类的宝石作为法术成分： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00]（欧泊）、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]（火欧泊）、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrismaticS]（钻石）、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]（红宝石）。当法术施放时，宝石就会被摧毁并从头盔上消失。

沐于火中。 若你着装着头盔且因失败于某一法术的豁免而受到了火焰伤害，骰 [[/r 1d20]] 。若骰值为 1，则头盔上剩余的宝石将迸射出光束，随后头盔被摧毁。每名位于以你为原点的 60 尺光环区域内的生物必须成功于一次DC 17 的敏捷豁免检定，否则被光束击中并受到等同于头盔上剩余宝石数量的光耀伤害。

钻石：

红宝石：

火欧泊：

欧泊：

Foundry Note

你可以在描述中跟进每种宝石的数量。

若在使用 火焰伤害 属性时掷出 1 点，则需使用 爆炸辐射 行动。该行动将允许你输入头盔中剩余的宝石数量，并自动提升伤害数值。

original: Take Fire damage from failing a saving throw
translation: 因失败于某一法术的豁免而受到了火焰伤害

奇物，非普通

着装此头盔期间，你可以用其施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplComprehend]。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this helm, you have telepathy with a range of 30 feet, and you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{Suggestion} (save DC 13) from the helm. Once either spell is cast from the helm, that spell can’t be cast from it again until the next dawn.
