奇物，非普通（需同调）

着装此头盔期间，你具有 30 尺心灵感应，且你可以用头盔施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]（豁免DC 13）。其中任意一道法术一经施展，那道法术直至次日黎明前都无法再次用头盔施展。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This helm has 3 charges. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTeleport00]{Teleport} from it. The helm regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.
translation:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

This backpack has a central pouch and two side pouches, each of which is an extradimensional space. Each side pouch can hold up to 200 pounds of material, not exceeding a volume of 25 cubic feet. The central pouch can hold up to 500 pounds of material, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet. The haversack always weighs 5 pounds, regardless of its contents.

Retrieving an item from the haversack requires a Utilize action or a Bonus Action (your choice). When you reach into the haversack for a specific item, the item is always magically on top.

If any of its pouches is overloaded, pierced, or torn, the haversack ruptures and is destroyed. If the haversack is destroyed, its contents are lost forever, although an Artifact always turns up again somewhere. If the haversack is turned inside out, its contents spill forth unharmed, and the haversack must be put right before it can be used again.

Each pouch of the haversack holds enough air for 10 minutes of breathing, divided by the number of breathing creatures inside.

Placing the haversack inside an extradimensional space created by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBagOfHolding0]{Bag of Holding}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgPortableHole0]{Portable Hole}, or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate and not behind Total Cover is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can’t be reopened.
translation:
奇物，珍稀

此背包有一个中袋和两个侧袋，每个袋子都是一个异次元空间。每个侧袋可容纳重量不超过 200 磅，体积不超过25立方尺的物体。中袋可容纳重量不超过 500 磅，体积不超过 64 立方尺的物体。无论装了多少东西，背包总是重 5 磅。

从背包中取出一件物品需要一个操作动作或一个附赠动作（由你选择）。当你伸进背包中寻找一件特定物品时，该物品总会魔法性的出现在最上面。

如果背包中的任何一个袋子超过其负载，被戳破，或撕裂，背包就会破裂并被摧毁。如果背包被摧毁，其装载的东西将永远消失，不过一件神器总会在某个地方重新出现。如果背包被内外翻转，则其所装载的东西也将安全的掉落出来，但再次使用背包之前必须将其恢复原状。

背包的每个袋子都容纳有足够其中需呼吸生物呼吸 10 除以该袋内呼吸生物的数量分钟数的空气。

将背包放入 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBagOfHolding0]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgPortableHole0] 或其他类似物品产生的异次元空间时，将立即摧毁这两件物品并打开一扇通往星光位面的门扉。门扉会产生在被放入另一件物品的前一件物品所在的空间位置。任何位于门扉 10 尺内且不处于全掩护后的生物将被吸入门内并送到星光位面的随机位置，随后该门关闭。这扇门扉只能单向通过且无法被再次打开。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This belt pouch appears empty and has 10 charges. While holding the pouch, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 charge, name any nonmagical food seasoning (such as salt, pepper, saffron, or cilantro), and remove a pinch of the desired seasoning from the pouch. A pinch is enough to season a single meal. The pouch regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn.
translation:
奇物，普通

这个腰包看起来是空的，并具有 10 充能。持握此小包期间，你可以用一个魔法动作消耗 1 充能，说出任何一种非魔法的食物调味料的名字（例如盐、胡椒、藏红花、或香菜），并从腰包中取出一撮所需的调味料。一撮调料就足以调味一顿单人份食物。小包会在每日黎明时恢复 1d6 + 4 已消耗的充能。

original:
Nuisance Trap (Levels 1–4)

Trigger: A creature moves onto the pit’s lid

Duration: Instantaneous

This 10-foot-deep pit has a hinged lid constructed from material identical to the surrounding floor. When a creature moves onto the lid, it swings open like a trapdoor, causing the creature to fall into the pit. The lid remains open thereafter.

A creature that falls into the pit takes 3 (1d6) Bludgeoning damage from the fall.

Detect and Disarm. As a Study action, a creature can examine the section of floor that forms the pit’s lid and make a [[/check inv 15]] check, detecting the pit on a successful check. Once the pit is detected, an Iron Spike or a similar object can be wedged between the pit’s lid and the surrounding floor to prevent the lid from opening, thereby making it safe to cross. The cover can also be held shut using Arcane Lock or similar magic.

Escape. A creature needs a Climb Speed, climbing gear, or magic such as Spider Climb to scale the pit’s smooth walls. You can make the pit easier to escape by adding cracks in the walls big enough to serve as handholds and footholds.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the trap for higher levels by increasing the pit’s depth and damage, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Pit Depth

Bludgeoning Damage

5–10

30 feet

10 (3d6)

11–16

60 feet

21 (6d6)

17–20

120 feet

42 (12d6)
translation:
妨碍陷阱（1-4级）

触发： 生物移动到陷坑盖上时

持续时间： 立即

这个 10 尺深的陷坑具有一块铰链式顶盖，顶盖使用的材料与周边的地板一致。当生物移动到陷坑盖上时，它会如活板门一般敞开，使得该生物坠落进陷坑中。那之后，盖子将保持开启。

掉入陷坑的生物因坠落而受到3（1d6）钝击伤害。

侦测与解除。 生物可以用搜索动作检查地板上构成陷坑顶盖的部分并进行 [[/check inv 15]] 检定，成功则侦测到陷坑。找到陷坑后，便可以用铁钉或类似物件插入陷坑盖和周边地面之间的缝隙，以避免陷坑盖开启，从而确保安全通过。使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplArcaneLock] 或类似魔法也可以让盖子保持关闭。

逃脱。 生物需要攀爬速度、攀爬工具或例如蛛行术的魔法，才可以攀上陷坑的光滑墙壁。你可以在墙壁上增加足够大的裂缝，作为抓手和支点，使陷坑变得更容易逃脱。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过增加陷阱的深度与伤害来提高陷阱对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级

original:
Weapon (Any Simple or Martial), Legendary (Requires Attunement by a Paladin)

You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit a Fiend or an Undead with it, that creature takes an extra 2d10 Radiant damage.

While you hold the drawn weapon, it creates a 10-foot Emanation originating from you. You and all creatures Friendly to you in the Emanation have Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If you have 17 or more levels in the Paladin class, the size of the Emanation increases to 30 feet.

[[10 + floor(@classes.paladin.levels / 17) * 20]]{Emanation Size (feet)}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（任意简易或军用），传说（需圣武士同调）

你用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值。当你用此武器命中邪魔或亡灵时，该生物额外受到 2d10 光耀伤害。

持握此武器并将其出鞘期间，它以你为源点产生 10 尺光环区域。你和与你友好的所有生物身处光环区域内时对抗法术和其他魔法效应进行的豁免检定具有优势。如果你的圣武士职业不低于17级，光环区域提升至 30 尺。

[[10 + floor(@classes.paladin.levels / 17) * 20]]{光环尺寸 （尺）}

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

You can take a Magic action to blow the horn, which emits a thunderous blast in a 30-foot Cone that is audible out to 600 feet. Each creature in the Cone makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d8 Thunder damage and has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. Glass or crystal objects in the Cone that aren’t being worn or carried take 10d8 Thunder damage.

Each use of the horn’s magic has a 20 percent chance of causing the horn to explode. The explosion deals 10d6 Force damage to the user and destroys the horn.

Foundry Note

The Roll for Explosion Chance activity will return 1 if it explodes otherwise it will return 0.
translation:
奇物，珍稀

每次使用号角的魔法都有 20% 的概率导致其爆炸。爆炸会对吹响它的人造成 10d6 力场伤害并摧毁号角。

Foundry Note

爆炸几率检定 行动若触发爆炸则结果为1，否则结果为0。

key: entries->Horn of Blasting->activities->Roll for Explosion Chance->name
entries->Horn of Blasting->activities->Roll for Explosion Chance->roll

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This horn has 4 charges and regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn. As a Magic action, you can blow the horn while expending 1 charge. One creature of your choice hears the horn’s blare, provided that creature is within 600 feet of the horn. No other creature hears the horn.
translation:
奇物，普通

这个号角具有 4 发充能，且在每日黎明时恢复 1d4 已消耗的充能。你可以用一个魔法动作消耗 1 发充能吹响它。一名 600 尺范围内由你选择的生物将能听到其声音。除此之外的任何其他生物都无法听见这个号角的声音。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Silver or Brass), Very Rare (Bronze), or Legendary (Iron)

You can take a Magic action to blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of you. Each spirit uses the Berserker stat block and returns to Ysgard after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 Hit Points. The spirits look like living, breathing warriors, and they have Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions. Once you use the horn, it can’t be used again until 7 days have passed.

Four types of Horn of Valhalla are known to exist, each made of a different metal. The horn’s type determines how many spirits it summons, as well as the requirement for its use. The DM chooses the horn’s type or determines it randomly by rolling on the following table.

If you blow the horn without meeting its requirement, the summoned spirits attack you. If you meet the requirement, they are Friendly to you and your allies and follow your commands.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgHornOfValhall rollable]
translation:
奇物，珍稀(白银或黄铜)、极珍稀(青铜)、传说(黑铁)

你可以用一个魔法动作吹响号角。作为回应，伊斯加德的武者英灵们将在你周围60尺内未占据的空间出现。这些英灵使用怪物图鉴上 狂战士 的数据，它们将会在 1 小时之后或HP降低到 0 时返回伊斯加德。英灵们看起来就像是活着的，能够呼吸的战士，且它们免疫魅惑与恐慌状态。号角一经使用，需要经过 7 天才能再次使用。

已知共有四种类型的 瓦尔哈拉号角 存在，分别由不同的金属制成。号角的类型决定了使用它能召唤多少英灵及其使用条件。号角的类型由DM决定或通过投掷下表来随机决定。

如果你在不满足条件的情况下吹响了号角，召唤出的英灵们将攻击你。如果你满足条件，他们会对你和你的盟友持友善态度，并听从你的命令。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgHornOfValhall rollable]

key: entries->Horn of Valhalla->effects->Horn of Valhalla: Condition Immunity->name
translation: 瓦尔哈拉号角：状态免疫

key: entries->Horn of Valhalla->effects->Horn of Valhalla: Condition Immunity->description
original: The spirits look like living, breathing warriors, and they have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions.
translation: 英灵们看起来就像是活着的，能够呼吸的战士，且它们免疫 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 和 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare

These horseshoes come in a set of four. As a Magic action, you can touch one of the horseshoes to the hoof of a horse or similar creature, whereupon the horseshoe affixes itself to the hoof. Removing a horseshoe also takes a Magic action.

While all four shoes are affixed to the hooves of a horse or similar creature, they allow the creature to move normally while floating 4 inches above a surface. This effect means the creature can cross or stand above nonsolid or unstable surfaces, such as water or lava. The creature leaves no tracks and ignores &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. In addition, the creature can travel for up to 12 hours a day without gaining &Reference[Exhaustion] levels from extended travel.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀

这些马蹄铁四个为一套。你可以用一个魔法动作将其中一个马蹄铁与一匹马或类似生物的蹄子接触，随后马蹄铁就会附着在蹄子上。移除一个马蹄铁也需要一个魔法动作。

四个马蹄铁同时附着在一匹马或类似的生物身上期间，它将悬浮在离地面 4 寸的高度，并可以如常移动。这使得该生物可以穿过或站在非固态或非稳定的平面上，例如水面或岩浆。它无视困难地形并且不会留下足迹。此外，该生物每天最多可以旅行 12 个小时，并且不会因为长时间旅行而获得力竭等级。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

These horseshoes come in a set of four. As a Magic action, you can touch one of the horseshoes to the hoof of a horse or similar creature, whereupon the horseshoe affixes itself to the hoof. Removing a horseshoe also takes a Magic action.

While all four horseshoes are attached to the same creature, its Speed is increased by 30 feet.
translation:
奇物，珍稀

这些马蹄铁四个为一套。你可以用一个魔法动作将其中一个马蹄铁与一匹马或类似生物的蹄子接触，随后马蹄铁就会附着在蹄子上。移除一个马蹄铁也需要一个魔法动作。

当四个马蹄铁都附着在同一生物身上期间，其速度增加 30 尺。

original:
Reload (5 shots)

Foundry Note

This item includes a max use of 5 for ammunition tracking. The Reload activities can be used to reset that amount.
translation:
弹容（5 发）

Foundry Note

此物品包含用于弹药跟进的 5 次使用次数。装填行动可将该次数重置回最大值。

original:
Rod, Uncommon

This iron rod has a button on one end. You can take a Utilize action to press the button, which causes the rod to become magically fixed in place. Until you or another creature takes a Utilize action to push the button again, the rod doesn’t move, even if it defies gravity. The rod can hold up to 8,000 pounds of weight. More weight causes the rod to deactivate and fall. A creature can take a Utilize action to make a DC 30 Strength (Athletics) check, moving the fixed rod up to 10 feet on a successful check.
translation:
权杖，非普通

这根铁质权杖的一端具有一枚按钮。你可以执行操作动作按下按钮，让这根权杖魔法性地固定在原处。直到你或另一生物执行操作动作再次按下按钮前，即使违反了重力定律，权杖也不会移动。权杖最多能负载 8000 磅的重量。更重的负载则会让权杖的效应失效并掉落在地。一个生物可以执行操作动作来进行一次DC 30 的力量（运动）检定，成功则可以将固定住的权杖移动最多 10 尺。

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 5–10) or Nuisance Hazard (Levels 11–16)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgInferno000000]{Inferno}

Whenever an uncontrolled fire spreads, it can create an inferno that quickly engulfs creatures, objects, and vegetation.

An inferno consists of at least four contiguous 10-foot Cubes of fire. Each of the inferno’s 10-foot Cubes can be doused with 10 gallons of water. Exposure to a strong wind for 1 minute causes the inferno to grow, adding [[/r 1d4]] new 10-foot Cubes to its volume. An inferno deprived of fuel burns itself out after 1d10 minutes.

An inferno damages any vegetation or object that isn’t being worn or carried that it touches, dealing 22 (4d10) Fire damage immediately and again at the end of each minute. Any creature that enters the inferno for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 22 (4d10) Fire damage and is burning.
translation:
致命危害（等级5-10）或妨碍危害（等级11-16）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgInferno000000]{燎原烈火}

当火焰不受控制地蔓延时，就能制造出一片燎原烈火，迅速地吞噬生物、物件和植物。

一片燎原烈火由至少四个 10 尺立方的火焰相连组成。每 10 尺立方的火焰可以被 10 加仑的水扑灭。暴露在一阵强风中1分钟后，燎原烈火会扩张，额外增加 1d4 个 10 尺立方的火焰。一片失去燃料的燎原烈火将在 1d10 分钟后燃尽。

燎原烈火会立即对任何它接触到的，未被穿戴的植物或物件造成 22（4d10）点火焰伤害，并且 每一分钟会再次造成该伤害。生物在一回合内首次进入燎原烈火范围内，或者在范围内开始其回合时，将受到 22（4d10）点火焰伤害，并开始燃烧。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

While you are playing this musical instrument, you can take a Magic action to create harmless, illusory visual effects within a 5-foot Emanation originating from the instrument. If you are a Bard, the size of the Emanation increases to 15 feet. Sample visual effects include luminous musical notes, a spectral dancer, butterflies, and gently falling snow. The magical effects have neither substance nor sound, and they are obviously illusory. The effects end when you stop playing.
translation:
奇物，普通

在你使用这把乐器进行演奏期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作在以乐器为源点的 5 尺光环区域内创造出无害的、幻象般的视觉效应。如果你是一名吟游诗人，则光环的范围将提升至 15 尺。简单的视觉效应包括了幻光的音符、虚幻的舞者、舞动的蝴蝶、以及飘散的雪花。这种魔法效应既无触感亦无声音，且它们显然是幻象。你终止演奏的同时，此效应结束。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This musical instrument has 3 charges and regains all expended charges daily at dawn. While you are playing it, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 charge and write a magical message on a nonmagical object or surface that you can see within 30 feet of yourself. The message can be up to six words long and is written in a language you know. If you are a Bard, you can scribe an additional seven words and make the message glow faintly, allowing it to be seen in nonmagical Darkness. Casting the Dispel Magic spell on the message erases it. Otherwise, the message fades away after 24 hours.
translation:
奇物，普通

这把乐器具有 3 发充能，并在每日黎明时重获所有已消耗的充能。在你使用这把乐器进行演奏期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作消耗 1 发充能，在你周边 30 尺范围内一个可见的非魔法物件或表面上写下一段魔法信息。这段信息以一种你熟知的语言书写，且其最长六个单词。如果你是一名吟游诗人，则你可写的单词上限增加七个，并且你可以使信息发出微弱光芒，使其在非魔法黑暗中清晰可见。信息会在 24 小时后消失，也可用法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi] 将其抹去。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rarity Varies (Requires Attunement by a Bard)

An Instrument of the Bards is superior to an ordinary instrument in every way. Seven types of these instruments exist, each named after a bard college. The Instruments of the Bards table lists the spells common to all instruments, as well as the spells specific to each one and its rarity. A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d4 type=psychic]] damage.

You can play the instrument to cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spell, it can’t be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC.

Instruments of the Bards
InstrumentRaritySpells
All—@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLevitate00]{Levitate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good}, plus the spells listed for the particular instrument
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAnstruthHarpI]{Anstruth harp}Very Rare@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} (level 5), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIceStorm00]{Ice Storm}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofThor]{Wall of Thorns}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgCanaithMandol]{Canaith mandolin}Rare@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} (level 3), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbProtectionFro]{Protection from Energy} (Lightning damage only)
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgCliLyreInstru]{Cli lyre}Rare@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneShape]{Stone Shape}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWindWall00]{Wind Wall}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDossLuteInstr]{Doss lute}Uncommon@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbProtectionFro]{Protection from Energy} (Fire damage only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplProtection]{Protection from Poison}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFochlucanBand]{Fochlucan bandore}Uncommon@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShillelagh]{Shillelagh}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithA]{Speak with Animals}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMacfuirmidhCi]{Mac-Fuirmidh cittern}Uncommon@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBarkskin00]{Barkskin}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgOllamHarpInst]{Ollamh harp}Legendary@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConfusion0]{Confusion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplControlWea]{Control Weather}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireStorm0]{Fire Storm}
translation:
奇物，多种稀有度（需吟游诗人同调）

吟游诗人乐器在各方面都优于普通乐器。吟游诗人乐器共有七种，每种都以一所吟游诗人学院的名字命名。吟游诗人乐器列表中列出了所有乐器的通用法术，以及每种乐器的独有法术和其稀有度。在未与乐器完成同调的情况下，尝试演奏乐器的生物必须进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] ，豁免失败则会受到 [[/damage 2d4 type=psychic]] 伤害。

你可以通过演奏乐器来施展它的一个法术。一旦该乐器被用来施展了某一个法术，则其直至次日黎明前都无法再被用来施展该法术。这些法术使用你的施法属性和法术豁免DC。

吟游诗人乐器
乐器 稀有度 法术
所有 — @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLevitate00]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]，外加以下为每种乐器列出的法术
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAnstruthHarpI] 极珍稀 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds](5环版本)、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIceStorm00]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofThor]
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgCanaithMandol] 珍稀 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds] (3环版本)、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbProtectionFro] (仅闪电伤害)
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgCliLyreInstru] 珍稀 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneShape]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWindWall00]
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDossLuteInstr] 非普通 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbProtectionFro] (仅火焰伤害)、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplProtection]
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFochlucanBand] 非普通 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShillelagh]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithA]
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMacfuirmidhCi] 非普通 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBarkskin00]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]

original:
Wondrous Item, Rarity Varies (Requires Attunement)

Roughly marble sized, Ioun Stones are named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of Ioun Stones exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

When you take a Magic action to toss an Ioun Stone into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of 1d3 feet, conferring its benefit to you while doing so. You can have up to three Ioun Stones orbiting your head at the same time.

Each Ioun Stone orbiting your head is considered to be an object you are wearing. The orbiting stone avoids contact with other creatures and objects, adjusting its orbit to avoid collisions and thwarting all attempts by other creatures to attack or snatch it.

As a Utilize action, you can seize and stow any number of Ioun Stones orbiting your head. If your Attunement to an Ioun Stone ends while it’s orbiting your head, the stone falls as though you had dropped it.

The type of stone determines its rarity and effects.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAbsorptionIou]{Absorption} (Very Rare). While this pale lavender ellipsoid orbits your head, you can take a Reaction to cancel a spell of level 4 or lower cast by a creature you can see. A canceled spell has no effect, and any resources used to cast it are wasted. Once the stone has canceled 20 levels of spells, it burns out, turns dull gray, and loses its magic.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAgilityIounSt]{Agility} (Very Rare). Your Dexterity increases by 2, to a maximum of 20, while this deep-red sphere orbits your head.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAwarenessIoun]{Awareness} (Rare). While this dark-blue rhomboid orbits your head, you have Advantage on Initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFortitudeIoun]{Fortitude} (Very Rare). Your Constitution increases by 2, to a maximum of 20, while this pink rhomboid orbits your head.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgGreaterAbsorp]{Greater Absorption} (Legendary). While this marbled lavender and green ellipsoid orbits your head, you can take a Reaction to cancel a spell of level 8 or lower cast by a creature you can see. A canceled spell has no effect, and any resources used to cast it are wasted. Once the stone has canceled 20 levels of spells, it burns out, turns dull gray, and loses its magic.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgInsightIounSt]{Insight} (Very Rare). Your Wisdom increases by 2, to a maximum of 20, while this incandescent blue sphere orbits your head.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIntellectIoun]{Intellect} (Very Rare). Your Intelligence increases by 2, to a maximum of 20, while this marbled scarlet and blue sphere orbits your head.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgLeadershipIou]{Leadership} (Very Rare). Your Charisma increases by 2, to a maximum of 20, while this marbled pink and green sphere orbits your head.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMasteryIounSt]{Mastery} (Legendary). Your Proficiency Bonus increases by 1 while this pale green prism orbits your head.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgProtectionIou]{Protection} (Rare). You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class while this dusty-rose prism orbits your head.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgRegnerationIo]{Regeneration} (Legendary). You regain 15 Hit Points at the end of each hour this pearly white spindle orbits your head if you have at least 1 Hit Point.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgReserveIounSt]{Reserve} (Rare). This vibrant purple prism stores spells cast into it, holding them until you use them. The stone can store up to 4 levels of spells at a time. When found, it contains 1d4 levels of stored spells chosen by the DM.

Any creature can cast a spell of level 1 through 4 into the stone by touching it as the spell is cast. The spell has no effect, other than to be stored in the stone. If the stone can’t hold the spell, the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.

While this stone orbits your head, you can cast any spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original caster but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the stone is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgStrengthIounS]{Strength} (Very Rare). Your Strength increases by 2, to a maximum of 20, while this pale blue rhomboid orbits your head.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgSustenanceIou]{Sustenance} (Rare). You don’t need to eat or drink while this clear spindle orbits your head.
translation:
奇物，多种珍稀度（需同调）

每一颗艾恩石的大小都和一枚弹珠相仿。这种石头是以知识与预言之神——艾恩之名命名的，祂在某些世界中备受敬仰。艾恩石分为很多种，不同种类的艾恩石具有不同的颜色和外观。

当你用一个魔法动作将艾恩石扔向空中时，此石会环绕在距离你头顶 1d3 尺高之处，并为你带来其增益。同一时间内至多只能有 3 颗艾恩石环绕在你的头顶。

同一时间内至多只能有 3 颗艾恩石环绕在你的头顶。

环绕在你头顶的每颗艾恩石都视为你正在穿戴着的物件。正在环绕着的艾恩石会避免与其他生物和物件接触，调整自己环绕的轨道以避免碰撞，并能使其他生物对艾恩石的攻击与抢夺无效。

你可以用一个操作动作，抓住并收起环绕在你头顶的任意颗艾恩石。如果你结束正环绕在你头顶的艾恩石的同调，石头就会如同你将其丢弃一样掉落下来。

石头的种类决定了它的稀有度和效果：

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAbsorptionIou]{吸收}(极珍稀)。 在这颗淡紫色的椭球形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你可以用一个反应，使一名你能看到的生物即将施展的一道四环或更低环阶的法术无效化。被无效化的法术不会产生任何效应，且用于施展此法术的资源也会被浪费掉。此石无效化了总计 20 环的法术过后，它就会变成黯淡的灰色并失去魔力。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAgilityIounSt]{机敏}（极珍稀）。 在这颗深红色的球形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的敏捷属性增加2，最多增加至20。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAwarenessIoun]{警觉} （珍稀）。 在这颗暗蓝色的长菱形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的先攻掷骰和察觉（感知）检定都具有优势。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFortitudeIoun]{坚韧} （极珍稀）。 在这颗粉色的长菱形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的体质属性增加2，最多增加至 20。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgGreaterAbsorp]{高等吸收}（传说）。 在这颗具有紫绿双色大理石花纹的椭球形艾恩石环绕着在你头顶期间，你可以用一个反应，使一名你能看到的生物即将施展的一道八环或更低环阶的法术无效化。被无效化的法术不会产生任何效应，且用于施展此法术的资源也会被浪费掉。此石无效化了总计 20 环的法术过后，它就会变成黯淡的灰色并失去魔力。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgInsightIounSt]{洞悉}（极珍稀）。 在这颗炽蓝色的球形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的感知属性增加 2，最多增加至 20。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIntellectIoun]{才智}（极珍稀）。 在这颗具有红蓝双色大理石花纹的球形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的智力属性增加 2，至多为 20。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgLeadershipIou]{统御}（极珍稀）。 在这颗具有粉绿双色大理石花纹的球形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的魅力属性增加 2，至多为 20。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMasteryIounSt]{精通}（传说）。 在这颗淡绿色的棱柱形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的熟练加值增加 1。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgProtectionIou]{防护}（珍稀）。 在这颗烟灰玫瑰色的棱柱形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的AC获得 +1 加值。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgRegnerationIo]{再生}（传说）。 在这颗珍珠白色的纺锤形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，每个小时结束时，若你至少拥有 1 点生命值，你便恢复 15 点生命值。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgReserveIounSt]{储法}（珍稀）。 这颗艳紫色的棱柱形艾恩石能够储存对其施展的法术，直到你使用之。该艾恩石同时只能储存总计不超过 4 环的法术。这个艾恩石在被发现时存储有 1d4 环由DM决定的法术。

任何生物都可以在施展一个一到四环的法术时触碰该艾恩石，以将该法术储于石中。此时法术将被储存，而非直接产生效应。如果石头无法储存该法术，则该法术不生效且被消耗。被储存的法术以其所耗用的法术位环阶来决定其在石头中占用的空间。

在这颗艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你可以施展任何储存在其中的法术。该法术使用原施法者的法术位、法术豁免DC、法术攻击加值和施法关键属性，但其他方面则视为由你施放。法术施放后，它将从艾恩石内消失，并解放其占用的空间。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgStrengthIounS]{力量}（极珍稀）。 在这颗淡蓝色长菱形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的力量属性增加 2，最多增加至 20。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgSustenanceIou]{维生}（珍稀）。 在这颗无色透明的纺锤形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你无需饮食也能生存。

original:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIounStone0000]{Ioun Stone}

When you take a Magic action to toss an Ioun Stone into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of 1d3 feet, conferring its benefit to you while doing so. You can have up to three Ioun Stones orbiting your head at the same time.

As a Utilize action, you can seize and stow any number of Ioun Stones orbiting your head. If your Attunement to an Ioun Stone ends while it’s orbiting your head, the stone falls as though you had dropped it.

While this pale lavender ellipsoid orbits your head, you can take a Reaction to cancel a spell of level 4 or lower cast by a creature you can see. A canceled spell has no effect, and any resources used to cast it are wasted. Once the stone has canceled 20 levels of spells, it burns out, turns dull gray, and loses its magic.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIounStone0000]

当你用一个魔法动作将艾恩石扔向空中时，此石会环绕在距离你头顶 1d3 尺高之处，并为你带来其增益。同一时间内至多只能有 3 颗艾恩石环绕在你的头顶。

你可以用一个操作动作，抓住并收起环绕在你头顶的任意颗艾恩石。如果你结束正环绕在你头顶的艾恩石的同调，石头就会如同你将其丢弃一样掉落下来。

在这颗淡紫色的椭球形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你可以用一个反应，使一名你能看到的生物即将施展的一道四环或更低环阶的法术无效化。被无效化的法术不会产生任何效应，且用于施展此法术的资源也会被浪费掉。此石无效化了总计 20 环的法术过后，它就会变成黯淡的灰色并失去魔力。

When you take a Magic action to toss an Ioun Stone into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of 1d3 feet, conferring its benefit to you while doing so. You can have up to three Ioun Stones orbiting your head at the same time.

As a Utilize action, you can seize and stow any number of Ioun Stones orbiting your head. If your Attunement to an Ioun Stone ends while it’s orbiting your head, the stone falls as though you had dropped it.

This vibrant purple prism stores spells cast into it, holding them until you use them. The stone can store up to 4 levels of spells at a time. When found, it contains [[/r 1d4#Spell Levels]] levels of stored spells chosen by the DM.

Any creature can cast a spell of level 1 through 4 into the stone by touching it as the spell is cast. The spell has no effect, other than to be stored in the stone. If the stone can’t hold the spell, the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.

While this stone orbits your head, you can cast any spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original caster but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the stone is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIounStone0000]

当你用一个魔法动作将艾恩石扔向空中时，此石会环绕在距离你头顶 1d3 尺高之处，并为你带来其增益。同一时间内至多只能有 3 颗艾恩石环绕在你的头顶。

你可以用一个操作动作，抓住并收起环绕在你头顶的任意颗艾恩石。如果你结束正环绕在你头顶的艾恩石的同调，石头就会如同你将其丢弃一样掉落下来。

这颗艳紫色的棱柱形艾恩石能够储存对其施展的法术，直到你使用之。该艾恩石同时只能储存总计不超过 4 环的法术。这个艾恩石在被发现时存储有 [[/r 1d4#Spell Levels]] 环由DM决定的法术。

任何生物都可以在施展一个一到四环的法术时触碰该艾恩石，以将该法术储于石中。此时法术将被储存，而非直接产生效应。如果石头无法储存该法术，则该法术不生效且被消耗。被储存的法术以其所耗用的法术位环阶来决定其在石头中占用的空间。

在这颗艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你可以施展任何储存在其中的法术。该法术使用原施法者的法术位、法术豁免DC、法术攻击加值和施法关键属性，但其他方面则视为由你施放。法术施放后，它将从艾恩石内消失，并解放其占用的空间。

key: entries->Ioun Stone of Reserve->activities->Store Spell by Level->name

original:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIounStone0000]{Ioun Stone}

When you take a Magic action to toss an Ioun Stone into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of 1d3 feet, conferring its benefit to you while doing so. You can have up to three Ioun Stones orbiting your head at the same time.

As a Utilize action, you can seize and stow any number of Ioun Stones orbiting your head. If your Attunement to an Ioun Stone ends while it’s orbiting your head, the stone falls as though you had dropped it.

Your Strength increases by 2, to a maximum of 20, while this pale blue rhomboid orbits your head.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIounStone0000]

当你用一个魔法动作将艾恩石扔向空中时，此石会环绕在距离你头顶 1d3 尺高之处，并为你带来其增益。同一时间内至多只能有 3 颗艾恩石环绕在你的头顶。

你可以用一个操作动作，抓住并收起环绕在你头顶的任意颗艾恩石。如果你结束正环绕在你头顶的艾恩石的同调，石头就会如同你将其丢弃一样掉落下来。

在这颗淡蓝色长菱形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的力量属性增加 2，最多增加至 20。

key: entries->Ioun Stone of Strength->effects->Enhanced Strength: Strength Bonus->name
entries->Ioun Stone of Strength->effects->Enhanced Strength: Strength Bonus->description
original: Your Strength increases by 2, to a maximum of 20, while this pale blue rhomboid orbits your head.
translation: 在这颗淡蓝色长菱形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你的力量属性增加 2，最多增加至 20。

original:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIounStone0000]{Ioun Stone}

When you take a Magic action to toss an Ioun Stone into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of 1d3 feet, conferring its benefit to you while doing so. You can have up to three Ioun Stones orbiting your head at the same time.

As a Utilize action, you can seize and stow any number of Ioun Stones orbiting your head. If your Attunement to an Ioun Stone ends while it’s orbiting your head, the stone falls as though you had dropped it.

You don’t need to eat or drink while this clear spindle orbits your head.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIounStone0000]

当你用一个魔法动作将艾恩石扔向空中时，此石会环绕在距离你头顶 1d3 尺高之处，并为你带来其增益。同一时间内至多只能有 3 颗艾恩石环绕在你的头顶。

你可以用一个操作动作，抓住并收起环绕在你头顶的任意颗艾恩石。如果你结束正环绕在你头顶的艾恩石的同调，石头就会如同你将其丢弃一样掉落下来。

在这颗无色透明的纺锤形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你无需饮食也能生存。

original: You don’t need to eat or drink while this clear spindle orbits your head.
translation: 在这颗无色透明的纺锤形艾恩石环绕在你头顶期间，你无需饮食也能生存。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

This rusty iron sphere measures 3 inches in diameter and weighs 1 pound. You can take a Magic action to throw the sphere at a Huge or smaller creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself. As the sphere moves through the air, it opens into a tangle of metal bands.

Make a ranged attack roll with an attack bonus equal to your Dexterity modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus. On a hit, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until you take a Bonus Action to issue a command that releases it. Doing so or missing with the attack causes the bands to contract and become a sphere once more.

A creature that can touch the bands, including the one Restrained, can take an action to make a DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check to break the iron bands. On a successful check, the item is destroyed, and the Restrained creature is freed. On a failed check, any further attempts made by that creature automatically fail until 24 hours have elapsed.

Once the bands are used, they can’t be used again until the next dawn.
translation:
奇物，珍稀

这颗锈迹斑斑的铁球直径 3 寸，重 1 磅。你可以使用一个魔法动作将铁球扔向 60 尺内一个你可见的巨型或更小体型的生物。铁球会在空中飞行时展开成为一团铁索。

进行一次远程攻击检定，将你的熟练加值和敏捷调整值加到这次攻击检定中。如果攻击命中，目标会陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，直至你使用一个附赠动作下令释放它。如果攻击未命中，或是你下达了释放命令，铁索会重新收缩为铁球。

一个能触及到铁索的生物（包括被铁索束缚的生物）可以使用一个动作进行一次DC 20 的力量（运动）检定来尝试打破铁索。如果检定成功，此物品将被摧毁，被束缚的生物将被释放。如果检定失败，进行此次检定的生物在随后的 24 小时内进行的任何进一步尝试都会自动失败。

此铁索一经使用，直至次日黎明前它都无法再次被使用。

key: entries->Iron Bands of Bilarro->effects->Restrained by Iron->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary

While holding this brass-stoppered iron flask, you can take a Magic action to target a creature that you can see within 60 feet of yourself. If the flask is empty and the target is native to a plane of existence other than the one you’re on, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be trapped in the flask. If the target has been trapped by the flask before, it has Advantage on the save. Once trapped, a creature remains in the flask until released. The flask can hold only one creature at a time. A creature trapped in the flask doesn’t age and doesn’t need to breathe, eat, or drink.

You can take a Magic action to remove the flask’s stopper and release the creature in the flask. The creature then obeys your commands for 1 hour, understanding those commands even if it doesn’t know the language in which the commands are given. If you issue no commands or give the creature a command that is likely to result in its death or imprisonment, it defends itself but otherwise takes no actions. At the end of the duration, the creature acts in accordance with its normal disposition and alignment.

An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify} spell reveals if the flask contains a creature, but the only way to determine the type of creature is to open the flask. A newly discovered Iron Flask might already contain a creature chosen by the DM or determined randomly by rolling on the following table (see the Monster Manual for the creature’s stat block).

Possible Creatures Roll Table

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgIronFlaskCont caption=false rollable]

Foundry Note

This item has one limited use for tracking whether or not a creature has been trapped in the flask.

The Add Trapped Creature activity expends a usage to indicate it is currently full.

The Release Trapped Creature activity is a summon activity which restores a usage to indicate it can now contain another creature. You can edit the activity, change to the "Summon" tab and drag the captured creature's Actor onto the tab so it can be summoned later.
translation:
奇物，传说

持握这个带着黄铜瓶塞的铁瓶期间，你能够以一个魔法动作，指定一名位于你 60 尺内，你可见的生物为目标。若瓶子是空的，且目标来自你正所处的存在位面以外的位面，则目标必须成功通过一次DC 17 的感知豁免，否则将被困入瓶中。如果目标先前曾经被困入瓶中过，则它进行该豁免时具有优势。一旦被瓶子困住，该生物将留在瓶中，直至被释放。收妖瓶同时只能容纳最多一名生物。困在瓶中的生物不再衰老，也不需要呼吸、进食或饮水。

你能够以一个魔法动作拔掉瓶塞释放瓶中的生物。然后该生物将服从你的命令，持续 1 小时，即使该生物不懂得你下达命令时使用的语言，它也能听懂你的命令。如果你没有下达命令或你的命令可能导致该生物死亡或被囚禁，则它除自卫外不会执行任何动作。持续时间结束后，该生物将按其正常的性格和阵营行动。

法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00]可以辨别瓶中是否有囚禁生物，但只有打开瓶塞才能确定其中的生物具体是什么。一个新发现的收妖瓶可能已经囚禁了一名由DM决定或根据下表随机决定的生物（以下生物的数据见怪物图鉴）。

可能生物掷骰表

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgIronFlaskCont caption=false rollable]

Foundry Note

该物品具有单一囚禁容量，用于跟进瓶中是否困有生物。

囚禁生物行动将消耗使用次数，标记为满载状态。

释放囚徒行动为召唤类行动，可重置使用次数并清空容器。通过编辑该动作，在行动的召唤标签页中拖入被囚生物的角色实例，即可实现后续召唤。

original:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgHornofValhall]{Horn of Valhalla}

Requirement: Proficiency with all Martial weapons

Spirits: 5

You can take a Magic action to blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of you. Each spirit uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.kz1t6xeXVwODpYb2]{Berserker} stat block and returns to Ysgard after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 Hit Points. The spirits look like living, breathing warriors, and they have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions. Once you use the horn, it can’t be used again until 7 days have passed.

If you blow the horn without meeting its requirement, the summoned spirits attack you. If you meet the requirement, they are Friendly to you and your allies and follow your commands.
translation:
参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgHornofValhall]

条件：熟练于所有军用武器

英灵：5

你可以用一个魔法动作吹响号角。作为回应，伊斯加德的武者英灵们将在你周围60尺内未占据的空间出现。这些英灵使用怪物图鉴上 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmBerserker00000] 的数据，它们将会在 1 小时之后或HP降低到 0 时返回伊斯加德。英灵们看起来就像是活着的，能够呼吸的战士，且它们免疫 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 和 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态。号角一经使用，需要经过 7 天才能再次使用。

如果你在不满足条件的情况下吹响了号角，召唤出的英灵们将攻击你。 如果你满足条件，他们会对你和你的盟友持友善态度，并听从你的命令。

key: entries->Iron Horn of Valhalla->effects->Horn of Valhalla: Condition Immunity->name
translation: 瓦尔哈拉号角：状态免疫

key: entries->Iron Horn of Valhalla->effects->Horn of Valhalla: Condition Immunity->description
original: The spirits look like living, breathing warriors, and they have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions.
translation: 英灵们看起来就像是活着的，能够呼吸的战士，且它们免疫 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 和 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态。

original:
See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]{Figurine of Wondrous Power}

These ivory statuettes of goats are always created in sets of three. Each goat looks unique and functions differently from the others. Their properties are as follows:

Goat of Terror. This figurine can become a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobGiantGoat0]{Giant Goat} for up to 3 hours. The goat can’t attack, but you can (harmlessly) remove its horns and use them as weapons. One horn becomes a +1 Lance , and the other becomes a +2 Longsword. Removing a horn requires a Magic action, and the weapons disappear and the horns return when the goat reverts to figurine form. While you ride the goat, any Hostile creature that starts its turn within a 30-foot Emanation originating from the goat must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition for 1 minute, until you are no longer riding the goat, or until the goat reverts to figurine form. The Frightened creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the save, a creature is immune to this effect for the next 24 hours. Once the figurine has been used, it can’t be used again until 15 days have passed.

Goat of Traveling. This figurine can become a Large goat with the same statistics as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRidingHors]{Riding Horse}. It has 24 charges, and each hour or portion thereof it spends in goat form costs 1 charge. While it has charges, you can use it as often as you wish. When it runs out of charges, it reverts to a figurine and can’t be used again until 7 days have passed, when it regains all expended charges.

Foundry Note

The Revert or Recall Goat of Traveling activity is optionally provided to aid in tracking the non-contiguous 24 hours the figurine can remain in goat form. When reverting to a figurine, the scaling value for consumption represents the number of hours spent in goat form. When recalling the figurine to goat form, uncheck the "Consume Item Use?" checkbox when using this activity.

Goat of Travail. This figurine can become a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobGiantGoat0]{Giant Goat} for up to 3 hours. Once it has been used, it can’t be used again until 30 days have passed.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]

这种象牙制成的山羊雕像总是三个为一组制造。每个山羊雕像都有独特的外形和功能，如下所述：

可怖山羊。该塑像可以变为一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobGiantGoat0]{巨山羊} 并至多维持 3 小时。它无法发动攻击，但你可以（不造成伤害地）卸下它的角作为武器。其中一只角变为 +1 骑枪，而另一只角则变为 +2 长剑。卸下一只角需要一个魔法动作。当山羊变回雕像时，角变成的武器也将随之消失，而山羊的角会恢复原状。另外，当你骑乘这头巨山羊时，它将散发出 30 尺半径的光环，任何在光环范围内开始其回合的敌对生物都必须进行一次DC 15 的感知豁免，豁免失败则陷入恐慌状态 1 分钟，当你不再骑乘山羊、或是山羊变回雕像后该恐慌也会提前结束。该受恐慌生物可以在它的每个回合结束时再次进行该豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。生物豁免成功时，它将在随后的 24 小时里免疫该效应。使用后，此雕像需要经过 15 日才能再次启动。

客运山羊。 该塑像可以变为一只数据和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRidingHors]{乘用马} 相同的大型山羊。它有 24 发充能，处于野兽形态下时每小时（不足 1 小时按 1 小时计）将消耗 1 发充能。只要雕像还有充能，你就能随意使用它。当充能耗尽时，它将变回雕像且需要等到 7 日后充能完全恢复时才能再次启动。

Foundry Note

客运山羊复原或召回行动是可选，用于帮助跟进该小雕像非持续的 24 小时的化为山羊。当变回小雕像时，消耗的数值代表了化为山羊的小时数。当把小雕像化为山羊时，使用该行动时，取消勾选“消耗物品使用次数？”复选框。

苦力山羊。 该塑像可以变为一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobGiantGoat0]{巨山羊} ，其存在至多维持 3 小时。使用后，此雕像需要经过 30 日才能再次启动。

original: Revert or Recall Goat of Traveling

key: entries->Ivory Goats->activities->Revert or Recall Goat of Traveling->chatFlavor
original: Each hour or portion thereof it spends in goat form costs 1 charge.
translation: 每小时（不足 1 小时按 1 小时计）将消耗 1 充能。

original:
Each time you make an attack roll with this magic weapon and hit, you can have it deal Lightning damage instead of Piercing damage.

Lightning Bolt. When you throw this weapon at a target no farther than 120 feet from you, you can forgo making a ranged attack roll and instead turn the weapon into a bolt of lightning. This bolt forms a 5-foot-wide Line between you and the target. The target and each other creature in the Line (excluding you) makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Immediately after dealing this damage, the weapon reappears in your hand. This property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Foundry Note

The Attack activity allows you to choose between Lightning and Piercing when rolling damage and will remember your last choice.
translation:
武器（标枪），非普通

当你用该武器发动的攻击检定命中时，你可以选择令其造成闪电伤害而非穿刺伤害。

闪电束。 当你向至多 120 尺内的一个目标投掷该武器时，你可以选择不进行远程攻击检定，而是改为将该武器变为一道闪电束。该闪电束会在你和目标之间形成一个 5 尺线状区域，目标及该区域内的每个生物（除你之外）都必须进行一次DC 13 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败者受到 4d6 闪电伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。该武器会在造成该伤害后立即回到你的手中。直到次日黎明前，该词条都无法再使用。

Foundry Note

攻击行动允许你在伤害掷骰时选择闪电或穿刺伤害，并会记住你上次的选择。

original: You have Advantage on D20 Tests for the next 72 hours, or you can draw two additional cards beyond your declared draws.
translation: 你的 D20 检定具有优势，持续 72 小时，或者你可以在声明的抽卡数量外再抽取两张卡牌。

original: Card's chosen effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌选定的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original: Card's chosen effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌选定的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Large Object

Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 30

Toxic Keg (Requires Load and Aim). Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point 30 to 300 feet from the launcher. Failure: 14 (4d6) Poison damage. Success: Half damage.

A back-mounted, wooden catapult flings small kegs of toxic gas. Loading a Keg Launcher requires the Utilize action, and aiming it requires another Utilize action. Then a crew member can take the Toxic Keg action.
translation:
大型物件

AC: 15 HP: 30

毒爆桶投掷（需要装填与瞄准）。

体质豁免： DC 15，以 30 尺外、300 尺内任意一点为圆心半径 20 尺球状区域内的所有生物。

失败： 14（4d6）毒素伤害。

成功： 半伤。

毒桶抛掷器是一种可搭载于驮兽背部的投掷装置，能够抛出装满毒气的小桶。装填和瞄准毒桶抛掷器各需要一次操作动作，随后组员之一便可执行毒爆桶投掷动作。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This glass jar, 3 inches in diameter, contains 1d4 + 1 doses of a thick mixture that smells faintly of aloe. The jar and its contents weigh 1/2 pound.

As a Utilize action, you can swallow one dose of the ointment or apply it to a creature within 5 feet of yourself. The creature that receives it regains 2d8 + 2 Hit Points and ceases to have the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.

Foundry Note

The Determine Doses activity is provided for optional use and will consume item uses to produce a total of 1d4 + 1 remaining uses as described above. Once the number of doses has been determined, that activity may be deleted.

The Use Ointment activity can be used for the healing roll but it does not automatically end the Poisoned condition.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这个直径 3 寸的玻璃瓶中装着 1d4 + 1 剂闻起来隐约有芦荟气味的混合剂。瓶子和混合剂共重 1/2 磅。

以一个操作动作，你可以自己吞下一剂软膏，或将一剂软膏涂在你 5 尺内的一个生物身上。软膏将为受用者恢复 2d8 + 2 点生命值，并解除其 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态。

Foundry Note

确剂量定行动为可选流程，将消耗物品使用次数并按上述规则生成 1d4 + 1 次剩余用量。确定完成后可删除该确定行动。

使用灵药行动可进行治愈掷骰，但不会自动解除中毒状态。

original: A Rare or rarer magic weapon with which you are proficient appears on your person. The DM chooses the weapon.
translation: 一把由DM选择的，稀有度为珍稀及以上的且你具有熟练的魔法武器出现在你的手中。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original: You gain the service of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.D5UqYD1EnTrJaMTO]{Knight}, who magically appears in an unoccupied space you choose within 30 feet of yourself. The knight has the same alignment as you and serves you loyally until death, believing the two of you have been drawn together by fate. Work with your DM to create a name and backstory for this NPC. The DM can use a different stat block to represent the knight, as desired.
translation: 你获得一名 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.D5UqYD1EnTrJaMTO]{骑士}侍从，其将魔法性地出现在位于你 30 尺内由你选择的未占据空间。这名骑士和你阵营相同，相信你们之间被命运相系并向你效忠至死。与你的DM一同为该NPC取名并撰写背景。DM可以根据需要使用其他的数据卡代表骑士。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

While lit, this hooded lantern burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oil, shedding Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. &Reference[Invisible apply=false] creatures and objects are visible as long as they are in the lantern’s Bright Light. You can take a Utilize action to lower the hood, reducing the lantern’s light to Dim Light in a 5-foot radius.
translation:
显像提灯

这盏附盖提灯在点亮期间会发出 30 尺半径的明亮光照以及额外 30 尺微光光照，并且仅需 1 品脱燃油即可燃烧 6 小时。位于提灯明亮光照范围内的&Reference[Invisible apply=false] 生物或物件将被其显形。你可以使用一个操作动作放下附盖，让提灯仅在 5 尺范围内提供微光光照。

original:
Reload (50 shots)

Foundry Note

This item includes a max use of 50 for ammunition tracking. The Reload activities can be used to reset that amount.
translation:
弹容（50 发）

Foundry Note

此物品包含用于弹药跟进的 50 次使用次数。装填行动可将该次数重置回最大值。

original:
Reload (30 shots)

Foundry Note

This item includes a max use of 30 for ammunition tracking. The Reload activities can be used to reset that amount.
translation:
弹容（30 发）

Foundry Note

此物品包含用于弹药跟进的 30 次使用次数。装填行动可将该次数重置回最大值。

original:
Medium Object

Armor Class: 19 Hit Points: 30

Lightning Ball (Requires Aim). Ranged Attack Roll: +6, range 300/1,200 ft. Hit: 22 (4d10) Lightning damage.

A Lightning Cannon is a small, bronze cannon inlaid with arcane runes and mounted on a heavy tripod device. It launches balls of crackling electricity. Aiming a Lightning Cannon requires the Utilize action, then a crew member can take the Lightning Ball action.
translation:
中型物件

AC: 19 HP: 30

闪电炮击（需要瞄准）。

远程攻击： +6，射程300/1200 尺。

命中： 22（4d10）闪电伤害。

闪击炮是一种镶嵌着奥法符文的小型青铜火炮，安装于重型三角炮架上。这种火炮射出的是霹雳般的电能炮弹。为闪击炮瞄准需要一次操作动作，随后操作手便可执行闪电炮击动作。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This lock appears to be an ordinary @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLock0000000]{Lock} and comes with a single key. The tumblers in this lock magically adjust to thwart burglars. Dexterity checks made to pick the lock have Disadvantage.
translation:
奇物，普通

这把锁看上去就像是一把普通的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLock0000000]（见玩家手册第 6 章），并配备有一把唯一的钥匙。这把锁里的锁齿会魔法性的拒斥那些撬锁的窃贼。任何为撬开这把锁而进行的敏捷检定都会具有劣势。

original:
Injury Poison

A creature subjected to Lolth's Sting must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have the &reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. If the creature fails the save by 5 or more, the creature also has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition while Poisoned in this way. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
translation:
损伤型毒药

遭受这种毒药影响的生物必须成功通过一次DC 13 的体质豁免，否则陷入 &reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态 1 小时。若该生物豁免失败且骰值比DC低 5 或更多，则该生物还会在以此法中毒期间陷入昏迷。该生物会在受到伤害、或是其它生物用一个动作来将其摇醒时苏醒。

original: The long compartment holds up to 6 long objects, such as bows, Quarterstaffs, or Spears.
translation: 长隔层可收纳至多 6 件长型物品，例如弓、长棍或矛。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000]{Glaive}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSickle0000]{Sickle}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}), Legendary (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. While the weapon is on your person, you also gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.

Luck. If the weapon is on your person, you can call on its luck (no action required) to reroll one failed D20 Test if you don’t have the Incapacitated condition. You must use the second roll. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Wish. The weapon has [[/r 1d3#Initial Charges]] charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge and cast Wish from it. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn. The weapon loses this property if it has no charges.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSickle0000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]），传说（需同调）

你用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得+1加值。携带此武器期间，你进行的豁免检定具有+1加值。

幸运 Luck. 在你携带此武器于身上期间，只要你未陷入失能状态，你就可以向它祈求好运（无需动作），重骰一次失败的D20检定。你必须使用重骰的结果。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。

许愿 Wish. 此武器具有 [[/r 1d3#Initial Charges]] 充能。持握此武器期间，你可以消耗1充能，从此武器中施展 祈愿术。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。充能耗尽时，此武器失去该词条

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: While the weapon is on your person, you also gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.
translation: 携带此武器期间，你进行的豁免检定具有 +1 加值。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepClub000000]{Club}), Very Rare

This reinforced lute can be wielded as a magic Club that deals an extra 2d8 Thunder damage on a hit.

Sing and Swing. If you’re a Bard, you can use your Charisma modifier instead of your Strength modifier when making a melee attack roll with the lute, provided you sing or hum while making the attack.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepClub000000]），极珍稀

这把加固过的鲁特琴可以作为一把魔法短棒持用，且在命中时额外造成 2d8 雷鸣伤害。

音律联击。 若你是一位吟游诗人，你可以在用该鲁特琴发动近战攻击检定时，使用魅力调整值来代替力量调整值，但此时你必须哼歌或唱曲。

key: entries->Mac-Fuirmidh Cittern Instrument of the Bards->name
original: Mac-Fuirmidh Cittern Instrument of the Bards

key: entries->Mac-Fuirmidh Cittern Instrument of the Bards->description
original:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgInstrumentOfT]{Instrument of the Bards}

An Instrument of the Bards is superior to an ordinary instrument in every way.

A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d4 type=psychic]] damage.

You can play the instrument to cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spell, it can’t be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC.
translation:
参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgInstrumentOfT]

吟游诗人乐器在各方面都优于普通乐器。

在未与乐器完成同调的情况下，尝试演奏乐器的生物必须进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] ，豁免失败则会受到 [[/damage 2d4 type=psychic]] 伤害。

你可以通过演奏乐器来施展它的一个法术。一旦该乐器被用来施展了某一个法术，则其直至次日黎明前都无法再被用来施展该法术。这些法术使用你的施法属性和法术豁免DC。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}), Rare (Requires Attunement)

When you hit a Fiend or an Undead with this magic weapon, that creature takes an extra 2d6 Radiant damage. If the target has 25 Hit Points or fewer after taking this damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be destroyed. On a successful save, the creature has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of your next turn.

Light. While you hold this weapon, it sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]），珍稀（需同调）

当你使用这把魔法武器命中一位邪魔或亡灵时，该生物会额外受到 2d6 光耀伤害。如果目标因受到该伤害而生命值被降至 25 及以下，则目标必须进行一次DC 15 的感知豁免，豁免失败则被摧毁，豁免成功则该生物陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，持续至你的下一回合结束。

照明。 在你持握这把武器期间，它会散发出 20 尺半径的明亮光照以及额外 20 尺微光光照。
伤害加值：2d6 光耀伤害（对邪魔/亡灵生效）

original: On a successful save, the creature has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of your next turn.
translation: 该生物陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，持续至施加者的下一回合结束。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}), Rare

You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. The bonus increases to +3 when you use the weapon to attack a Construct.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, the target takes an extra 7 Bludgeoning damage, or 14 Bludgeoning damage if it’s a Construct. If a Construct has 25 Hit Points or fewer after taking this damage, it is destroyed.

Foundry Note

The Attack Construct activity automatically includes the additional bonuses.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]），珍稀

你使用这把魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰具有 +1 加值。如果你使用这把武器攻击一个构装生物，则加值提升为 +3。

当你使用这把武器进行一次攻击检定并掷出 20 时，目标会额外受到 7 钝击伤害。如果目标为构装生物，则其受到的额外钝击伤害为 14。如果一个构装生物因受到该伤害而生命值被降至 25 及以下，则该生物被摧毁。

Foundry Note

攻击构装行动将自动计入额外加值。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}). Rare (Requires Attunement)

This magic weapon has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While holding the weapon, you can take a Magic action and expend 1 charge to release a wave of terror from it. Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute. While Frightened in this way, a creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can’t make Opportunity Attacks. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If it has nowhere it can move, the creature can take the Dodge action. At the end of each of its turns, a creature repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}），珍稀（需同调）

这把魔法武器具有 3 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d3 已消耗的充能。持握这把武器期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作并消耗 1 充能，来从该武器中释放出一股恐惧波动。30 尺内每个你所选择的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 15 的感知豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，持续 1 分钟。以这种方式陷入恐慌的生物在其回合内必须尽可能的向远离你的方向移动，并且它不能发动借机攻击。它只能选择进行疾走动作，或尝试摆脱一个阻止其移动的效应。如果无处可逃，则它可以执行回避 动作。该生物在每个自己的回合结束时可以再次进行此豁免，豁免成功则其身上的该效应提前结束。

original:
Inhaled Poison

A creature subjected to Malice must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. The creature also has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition while Poisoned in this way.
translation:
吸入型毒药

吸入这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态 1 小时，以此中毒期间该生物还会陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态。

original:
Large Object

Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 100

Mangonel Stone (Requires Load and Aim). Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 200/800 ft. (can’t hit targets within 60 feet of itself). Hit: 27 (5d10) Bludgeoning damage.

A Mangonel is a catapult that hurls heavy projectiles in a high arc, so it can hit targets behind walls. Loading a Mangonel requires two Utilize actions, and aiming it requires two more Utilize actions. Then a crew member can take the Mangonel Stone action.

Foundry Note

This item has 2 limited uses for tracking loading. Aiming must be tracked manually.

The Load activity grants one use so after two uses you can use the Mangonel Stone activity.
translation:
大型物件

AC: 15 HP: 100

弹射投石（需要装填与瞄准）。

远程攻击： +5，射程200/800 尺（无法命中 60 尺内的目标）。

命中： 27（5d10）钝击伤害。

弹射投石机是一种抛射重型投石的攻城器，其弹道为极高的抛物线，故而投出的石弹可以越过城墙打击目标。装填和瞄准弹射投石机各需要两次操作动作，随后操作手便可执行弹射投石动作。

Foundry Note

此物品有 2 次的有限使用次数跟进装填。瞄准必须手动跟进。

装填行动可提供 1 次物品使用次数，所以使用其 2 次后，您就可以使用 投石机石行动了。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)

You have Advantage on saving throws against spells while you wear this cloak.
translation:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

穿着这件斗篷期间，你为抵抗法术进行的豁免具有优势。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare

This book contains health and nutrition tips, and its words are charged with magic. If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book’s contents and practicing its guidelines, your Constitution increases by 2, to a maximum of 30. The manual then loses its magic but regains it in a century.

Foundry Note

This item includes 48 max uses for tracking hours read.

The Read activity includes a scaling value that lets you enter the amount of hours you've read. Once you hit 48 you can use the included Active Effect to increase your Constitution.

The Reset Progress activity resets your uses to 0 if you fail to complete the book within 6 days and need to start over.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀

这本书记载了健康和营养的建议，其文字蕴含魔力。如果你在不长于 6 日的时间段内花费了 48 小时研读这本书并实践其中的方针，则你的体质提升 2，至多提升至 30。之后这本手册将失去魔力，直到一个世纪后才能恢复。

Foundry Note

该物品包含 48 次最大使用次数用于记录阅读时长。

阅读行动包含可调节数值输入功能，允许录入实际阅读时长。累计达到 48 小时后，可触发内置的主动效应提升体质属性。

重置进度行动可将使用次数归零（若未能在 6 日内完成书籍阅读需重新计时）。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare

This book describes fitness exercises, and its words are charged with magic. If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book’s contents and practicing its guidelines, your Strength increases by 2, to a maximum of 30. The manual then loses its magic but regains it in a century.

Foundry Note

This item includes 48 max uses for tracking hours read.

The Read activity includes a scaling value that lets you enter the amount of hours you've read. Once you hit 48 you can use the included Active Effect to increase your Strength.

The Reset Progress activity resets your uses to 0 if you fail to complete the book within 6 days and need to start over.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀

这本书记载了健身和运动的方法，其文字蕴含魔力。如果你在不长于 6 日的时间段内花费了 48 小时研读这本书并实践其中的方针，则你的力量提升 2，至多提升至 30。之后这本手册将失去魔力，直到一个世纪后才能恢复。

Foundry Note

该物品包含 48 次最大使用次数用于记录阅读时长。

阅读行动包含可调节数值输入功能，允许录入实际阅读时长。累计达到 48 小时后，可触发内置的主动效应提升力量属性。

重置进度行动可将使用次数归零（若未能在 6 日内完成书籍阅读需重新计时）。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare

This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of golem. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly by rolling on the accompanying table. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two level 5 spell slots. A creature that can’t use a Manual of Golems and attempts to read it takes [[/damage 6d6 type=psychic]] damage.

To create a golem, you must spend the time shown on the table, working without interruption with the manual at hand and resting no more than 8 hours per day. You must also pay the specified cost to purchase supplies.

Once you finish creating the golem, the book is consumed in eldritch flames. The golem becomes animate when the ashes of the manual are sprinkled on it. See the Monster Manual for the golem’s stat block. The golem is under your control, and it understands and obeys your commands.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgManualOfGolem rollable]

Foundry Note

After determining the type of golem this manual creates, you may delete the other unneeded activities.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀

这本手册记载了制造某种特定类型魔像所必需的知识和秘文，魔像的类型由DM选择或在表格中随机掷骰决定。只有拥有至少 2 个五环法术位的施法者才能解读并使用这本书。若无法解读这本书的生物尝试阅读魔像手册，该生物将受到[[/damage 6d6 type=psychic]] 伤害。

要制造一个魔像，你必须花费表格中标注的时间，将魔像手册放在手头并不间断地工作，每天的休息时间不超过8小时。此外，你还要付出表格中标注的金钱用以购买材料。

魔像完工后，魔像手册将被魔焰吞噬。当你把手册的灰烬洒在魔像上时，魔像将被活化。它服从你的控制，理解并听从你的命令。各个魔像的数据见怪物图鉴。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgManualOfGolem rollable]

Foundry Note

在确定该手册创建的魔像类型后，可移除其他无需的制造行动。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare

This book contains coordination and balance exercises, and its words are charged with magic. If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book’s contents and practicing its guidelines, your Dexterity increases by 2, to a maximum of 30. The manual then loses its magic but regains it in a century.

Foundry Note

This item includes 48 max uses for tracking hours read.

The Read activity includes a scaling value that lets you enter the amount of hours you've read. Once you hit 48 you can use the included Active Effect to increase your Dexterity.

The Reset Progress activity resets your uses to 0 if you fail to complete the book within 6 days and need to start over.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀

这本书记载了训练协调和平衡的方法，其文字蕴含魔力。如果你在不长于 6 日的时间段内花费了 48 小时研读这本书并实践其中的方针，则你的敏捷提升 2，至多提升至 30。之后这本手册将失去魔力，直到一个世纪后才能恢复。

Foundry Note

该物品包含 48 次最大使用次数用于记录阅读时长。

阅读行动包含可调节数值输入功能，允许录入实际阅读时长。累计达到 48 小时后，可触发内置的主动效应提升敏捷属性。

重置进度行动可将使用次数归零（若未能在 6 日内完成书籍阅读需重新计时）。

key: entries->Manual of Quickness of Action->activities->Reset Progress->name
entries->Manual of Quickness of Action->effects->Quick Acting->name

original:
See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]{Figurine of Wondrous Power}

This marble statuette resembles a trumpeting elephant. It can become an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobElephant00]{Elephant} for up to 24 hours. Once it has been used, it can’t be used again until 7 days have passed.

Foundry Note

This item's limited uses represent the 7 days required before the figurine can be used again.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]

这尊大理石雕像的造型是一只吼叫的大象。它可以变为一头 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobElephant00]{象} ，存在至多维持 24 小时。使用后，雕像需要经过 7 日才能再次启动。

Foundry Note

此物品的使用次数有限，用于跟进需要 7 天的充能周期。

original:
Armor (Any Light, Medium, or Heavy), Uncommon

While wearing this armor, you have a Swim Speed equal to your Speed. In addition, if you start your turn underwater with 0 Hit Points, you immediately regain 1d4 Hit Points. The armor can’t heal anyone again until the next dawn.

The armor is decorated with fish and shell motifs.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
护甲（任意轻甲、中甲、或重甲），非普通

着装这套护甲期间，你获得等同于你速度的游泳速度。此外，当你在水下以 0 生命值开始你的回合时，你立即恢复 1d4 生命值。直至次日黎明前，该护甲无法再治疗任何人。

这套护甲饰有鱼群和贝壳的纹样。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

translation: 当你在水下以 0 生命值开始你的回合时

original: While wearing this armor, you have a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.
translation: 着装这套护甲期间，你获得等同于你速度的游泳速度。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

The medallion has 5 charges. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts} (save DC 13) from it. The medallion regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

这块勋章具有 5 充能。佩戴它期间，你可以消耗 1 充能从中施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]（豁免DC 13）。这块勋章在每日黎明时重获 1d4 已消耗的充能。

original:
Ingested Poison

A creature that ingests Midnight Tears suffers no effect until the stroke of midnight. Any effect that ends the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition neutralizes this poison. If the poison hasn't been neutralized before midnight, the creature makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 31 (9d6) Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
translation:
服用型毒药

服用这种毒药的生物不会立即出现异样，其症状会一直潜伏到午夜钟声敲响时。任何能够解除 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态的效应都可以在此之前中和午夜之泪，然而如果毒素在午夜之前尚未中和，该生物就要进行一次DC 17 的体质豁免，豁免失败则受到 31（9d6）点毒素伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

original: The midsize compartment holds up to 18 Javelins or similar objects.
translation: 中隔层可收纳至多 18 件中型物品，例如标枪或类似物件。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare

When this 4-foot-tall, 2-foot-wide mirror is viewed indirectly, its surface shows faint images of creatures. The mirror weighs 50 pounds, and it has AC 11, HP 10, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage, and Vulnerability to Bludgeoning damage. It shatters and is destroyed when reduced to 0 Hit Points.

If the mirror is hanging on a vertical surface and you are within 5 feet of it, you can take a Magic action and use a command word to activate it. It remains activated until you take a Magic action and repeat the command word to deactivate it.

Any creature other than you that sees its reflection in the activated mirror while within 30 feet of the mirror must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be trapped, along with anything it is wearing or carrying, in one of the mirror’s twelve extradimensional cells. A creature that knows the mirror’s nature makes the save with Advantage, and Constructs succeed on the save automatically.

An extradimensional cell is an infinite expanse filled with thick fog that reduces visibility to 10 feet. Creatures trapped in the mirror’s cells don’t age, and they don’t need to eat, drink, or sleep. A creature trapped within a cell can escape using magic that permits planar travel. Otherwise, the creature is confined to the cell until freed.

If the mirror traps a creature but its twelve extradimensional cells are already occupied, the mirror frees one trapped creature at random to accommodate the new prisoner. A freed creature appears in an unoccupied space within sight of the mirror but facing away from it. If the mirror is shattered, all creatures it contains are freed and appear in unoccupied spaces near it.

While within 5 feet of the mirror, you can take a Magic action to name one creature trapped in it or call out a particular cell by number. The creature named or contained in the named cell appears as an image on the mirror’s surface. You and the creature can then communicate.

In a similar way, you can take a Magic action and use a second command word to free one creature trapped in the mirror. The freed creature appears, along with its possessions, in the unoccupied space nearest to the mirror and facing away from it.

Placing the mirror inside an extradimensional space created by a Bag of Holding, Portable Hole, or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate and not behind Total Cover is sucked through it to a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can’t be reopened.

Foundry Note

This item has a max uses of 12 which can be used to track the number of creatures trapped within the mirror. The Add/Free Trapped Creature activities can be used to increment/decrement that number.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀

当以间接的方式看向这面 4 尺高，2 尺宽的镜子时，其表面会显示出生物的模糊影像。这面镜子重50磅，AC11，HP10，免疫毒素和心灵伤害，对钝击伤害具有易伤。当生命值降至0时，镜子会粉碎且被摧毁。

如果镜子悬挂于一处垂直表面，且你在镜子周边5尺范围内时，你可以执行一个魔法动作并使用一个命令语激活它。它会一直保持激活状态，直至你执行一个魔法动作并重复命令语来取消激活。

如果除你之外的任何生物在镜子周边 30 尺范围内看到自己在已激活镜面中的倒影，该生物必须成功通过一次DC 15 的魅力豁免，否则将会连同自己着装或携带的所有物品一起被困入镜中的十二个异次元牢房之一。了解摄心镜本质的生物在进行该豁免时具有优势，构装生物在进行该豁免时直接成功。

每个异次元牢房都是一处无限广阔的空间，里面充满了浓雾，能见度只有10尺。被困入镜中牢房的生物不会衰老，也无需饮食和睡眠。被困于牢房的生物可以使用位面旅行魔法进行逃脱，无法做到这件事的生物将被永远囚禁在牢房中，直至被释放为止。

如果镜子困住一个生物，而十二个异次元牢房又已被占满，则它将随机释放一名被困生物以容纳新囚犯。一个被释放的生物会背对镜子出现在镜子视野范围内一处未被占据的空间中。如果镜子被打碎，它囚禁的所有生物都会被释放，并出现在它附近未被占据的空间里。

位于镜子周边 5 尺范围内时，你可以使用一个魔法动作说出一位被囚禁生物的名字或呼喊一个特定牢房的编号。被说出名字或被囚禁于该编号牢房的生物会以一幅影像的形式出现在镜子表面，随后你可与该生物进行交流。

以类似的方式，你可以执行一个魔法动作并使用另一个命令语释放一位被困于镜中的生物。被释放的生物会连同其所有物出现离镜子最近的未被占据的空间里，背对着镜子。

将摄心镜放入次元袋、次元洞或其他类似物品产生的异次元空间时，将立即摧毁这两件物品并打开一扇通往星光位面的门扉。门扉会产生在被放入另一件物品的前一件物品所在的空间位置。任何在门扉周边10尺范围内且不在全身掩护之后的生物将被吸入门内并送到星光位面的随机位置，随后该门关闭。这扇门扉只能单向通过且无法被再次打开。

Foundry Note

该物品最大囚禁容量为 12 个生物，镜中囚徒数量可通过囚禁生物/释放生物行动进行增减操作。

Armor (Any Medium or Heavy, Except Hide Armor), Uncommon

Mithral is a light, flexible metal. Armor made of this substance can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength requirement, the mithral version of the armor doesn’t.

护甲（任意中甲或重甲，兽皮甲除外），非普通

秘银是一种轻盈且柔韧的金属。使用这种材料制成的护甲可以穿在普通衣物里面。如果这套护甲本来会使着装者的敏捷（隐匿）检定具有劣势，或是对着装者的力量属性具有要求，则它的秘银版本将不会具有这些限制。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000]{Glaive}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}), Common

In Darkness, the unsheathed blade of this weapon sheds moonlight, creating Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword],@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000],@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]），普通

在黑暗中，这把剑出鞘的刃锋将泄出月光，创造半径 15 尺的明亮光照以及其外 15 尺的微光光照。
