original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}), Legendary (Requires Attunement by a Creature of the Weapon’s Choice)

Of all the magic items created by elves, one of the most prized and jealously guarded is a Moonblade . In ancient times, nearly all elven noble houses claimed one such weapon. Over the centuries, some of these weapons have faded from the world, their magic lost as family lines have become extinct. Others have vanished with their bearers during great quests. Thus, only a few of these weapons remain.

Every Moonblade longs for a bearer whose disposition and goals are compatible with its own. If you try to attune to a Moonblade that doesn’t want you as its bearer, the weapon not only rejects you but also places a curse on you, causing you to make D20 Tests with Disadvantage for 24 hours or until the curse is ended by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse} spell or similar magic. If you’re accepted by the weapon and try to attune to it, you become attuned to it instantly, and a new rune appears on it. You remain attuned to the weapon until you die or the weapon is destroyed. A Moonblade functions like a nonmagical weapon of its kind for anyone other than its chosen bearer.

A Moonblade has one rune on it for each bearer it has willingly served (typically [[/r 1d6 + 1]]). The @UUID[.ActiveEffect.o2IcKz2aAooQr7EK]{first rune} grants a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Each rune beyond the first grants the Moonblade an additional property. The DM chooses each property or determines it randomly by rolling on the Moonblade Properties table.

Minor Property.

In addition to its aforementioned properties, each Moonblade has a minor property determined by rolling on the Magic Item’s @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMagicItemsMin]{Minor Property} table.

Sentience.

A Moonblade is a sentient weapon with an Intelligence of 12, a Wisdom of 10, and a Charisma of 12. It has hearing and Darkvision out to 120 feet. Its alignment matches that of its creator.

The weapon communicates by transmitting emotions, sending a tingling sensation through the wielder’s hand when it wants to communicate something it has sensed. It can communicate through visions or dreams when the wielder is either in a trance or asleep.

Personality.

A Moonblade has a personality similar to that of its creator. Once a Moonblade has decided on an owner, it believes that only that person should wield it, even if the bearer’s alignment differs from that of the weapon’s or the bearer’s goals later clash with the weapon’s goals.

Moonblade Properties.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMoonbladeProp rollable caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{巨剑}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{长剑}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{刺剑}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{弯刀}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{短剑}），传说（需武器选择的生物同调）

在所有由精灵制造的魔法物品当中，最有价值也最受严格保护的物品之一就是月刃。在远古时期，几乎每个精灵贵族家族都拥有这样一柄武器。经过数个世纪的时间，其中一些月刃已经不存于世，他们的魔力随着家族血脉的消亡而消失。还有一些则伴随其持有者消失在伟大征途的路上。因为这些原因，如今只有少数月刃还留存于世。

每柄月刃都渴望着一名与其秉性相合、目标相通的持有者。如果你尝试与一柄不想让你成为持有者的月刃同调，月刃不仅会拒绝你的同调，还会对你施加诅咒，使你的D20检定具有劣势，持续 24 小时，或在法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]或类似魔法效应终止该诅咒时提前结束。如果此武器接受你，你尝试与之同调时立即同调成功，并且一枚新的符文出现在此武器上。你与此武器的同调持续至你死亡 或武器被摧毁。对于月刃持有者外的任何人来说，月刃只会像同类的非魔法武器一样发挥作用。

月刃每有过一名它自愿侍奉的持有者，便多出一枚符文（通常有 1d6 + 1 枚）。 @UUID[.ActiveEffect.o2IcKz2aAooQr7EK]{第一枚符文}令此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +1 加值。第二枚往后的符文赋予月刃额外的词条。每条词条由DM选择或根据月刃词条表随机决定。

次级词条。

除了上述词条外，每柄月刃都具有一条次级词条，根据魔法物品的次级词条表随机决定。

智能。

月刃是一柄智能魔法武器，智力为 12，感知 10，魅力 12。它具有 120 尺听觉及120尺黑暗视觉。其阵营与其创造者相同。

月刃通过传递自己的情绪来进行沟通，当它想要传达其感知到的东西时，它会向持用者的手传递一阵刺痛。在持用者出神或睡觉时，月刃可以通过梦境或幻象与之交流。

个性。

月刃的性格与其创造者相似，一旦月刃决定了其主人，即使该持用者的阵营与月刃相悖，或是后来持用者的目标与月刃相违背，它也坚信只有那个人才能挥舞它。

月刃词条。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMoonbladeProp rollable caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: Increase the weapon’s bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls by 1, to a maximum of +3. Reroll if the Moonblade already has a +3 bonus.
translation: 以此武器进行攻击检定和伤害掷骰的加值提升 1，至多提升至 +3。若月刃已具有 +3 加值则重骰。

original: When you hit with an attack roll using the Moonblade, you deal an extra 1d6 Force damage. Each time the weapon gains this property after the first, the extra damage increases by 1d6, to a maximum of 3d6. Reroll if the Moonblade already deals an extra 3d6 Force damage on a hit.
translation: 当你以月刃 进行的攻击检定命中时，你额外造成 1d6 力场伤害。在此武器第一次获得该词条后，每当其再次获得该词条，额外伤害提升 1d6，至多提升至 3d6。若月刃已具有 3d6 额外伤害则重骰。

original: The Moonblade gains the Thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. Each time you throw the weapon, it flies back to your hand after the attack.
translation: 月刃获得投掷（射程20/60尺）词条，每当你投掷此武器进行攻击后，此武器回到你的手中。

original: The Moonblade scores a &Reference[CriticalHits]{Critical Hit} on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.
translation: 你以月刃进行的攻击检定在 d20 中掷出 19 或 20 时造成&Reference[CriticalHits]{重击}。

original: A creature repeats the [[/save ability=con dc=15]]{save} at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
translation: 生物在其每个回合结束时重新进行该 [[/save ability=con dc=15]]{豁免} ，豁免成功则其身上的该效应提前结束。

original: You can take a Bonus Action to cause the Moonblade to flash brightly. Each other creature that is within 30 feet of you and not behind Total Cover must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Blinded condition for 1 minute. A creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. You can’t use this property again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.
translation: 你能够以一个附赠动作令月刃闪烁光芒。位于你 30 尺内的未处于全身掩护后的所有其他生物必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免，否则陷入目盲状态，持续一分钟。陷入目盲的生物在其每个回合结束时重新进行该豁免，豁免成功则其身上的该效应提前结束。该词条一经使用，直至完成短休或长休你都无法再次使用。

original: The Moonblade has the properties of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgRingOfSpellSt]{Ring of Spell Storing}.
translation: 月刃 获得@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgRingOfSpellSt]{储法戒指} 的词条。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

A question mark is worked into the head of this key. The key has a 5 percent chance of unlocking any lock into which it’s inserted. Once it unlocks something, the key disappears.

Foundry Note

The Roll for Chance activity will return "1" if its successful and "0" otherwise.
translation:
奇物，普通

这把钥匙的头部添有一个问号样式的装饰。钥匙有 5% 的几率解开任何一个被其插入的锁。此钥匙一旦成功解锁了某个东西就会消失。

Foundry Note

概率检定行动将返回“1”（成功）或“0”（失败）。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement by a Druid or Ranger)

This cloak shifts color and texture to blend with the terrain surrounding you. While wearing the cloak, you can use it as a Spellcasting Focus for your Druid and Ranger spells.

While you are in an area that is &Reference[Lightly Obscured], you can Hide as a Bonus Action even if you are being directly observed.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需德鲁伊或游侠同调）

这件斗篷的颜色和材质会随着你周围的环境而改变。穿着这件斗篷期间，你可以将其作为你施展德鲁伊和游侠法术的法器。

身处 &Reference[Lightly Obscured] 的区域时，你可以用一个附赠动作 来执行躲藏动作，即便你能被直接观察到。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this necklace, you can breathe normally in any environment, and you have Advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

佩戴此项链期间，你能在任何环境中正常呼吸，并且你在为避免或结束 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态的豁免中具有优势。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

This necklace has 1d6 + 3 beads hanging from it. You can take a Magic action to detach a bead and throw it up to 60 feet away. When it reaches the end of its trajectory, the bead detonates as a level 3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (save DC 15).

You can hurl multiple beads, or even the whole necklace, at one time. When you do so, increase the damage of the Fireball by 1d6 for each bead after the first (maximum 12d6).

Foundry Note

This item includes 9 limited uses. The Determine Number of Beads activity can be used to determine how many beads (equivalent to 1d6 + 3) are on the necklace.

The Throw Bead activity allows you to scale the Fireball up to a max of 12d6.
translation:
奇物，珍稀

这条项链挂着 1d6 + 3 颗珠子。你可以执行魔法动作取下一颗珠子并将其投掷最多60尺距离。珠子会在投掷轨迹的末端引爆，效果等同于 3 环 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]（豁免DC 15）。

你可以同时把多枚珠子，甚至把整条项链一起投掷出去。这么做时，每有一颗额外投掷出的珠子，火球术的伤害就增加 1d6 点（最大 12d6）。

Foundry Note

该物品具有 9 次使用次数上限，可通过确定珠子数量动作判定项链当前宝珠数量（等效 1d6 + 3 颗）。

投掷珠子动作可使火球术威力提升至最高 12d6。

key: entries->Necklace of Fireballs->activities->Determine Number of Beads->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement by a Cleric, Druid, or Paladin)

This necklace has [[/r 1d4 + 2#Magic beads]] magic beads made from aquamarine, black pearl, or topaz. It also has many nonmagical beads made from stones such as amber, bloodstone, citrine, coral, jade, pearl, or quartz. If a magic bead is removed from the necklace, that bead loses its magic.

Six types of magic beads exist. The DM decides the type of each bead on the necklace or determines it randomly by rolling on the table below. A necklace can have more than one bead of the same type. To use one, you must be wearing the necklace. Each bead contains a spell that you can cast from it as a Bonus Action (using your spell save DC if a save is necessary). Once a magic bead’s spell is cast, that bead can’t be used again until the next dawn.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgNecklaceOfPra caption=false rollable]

Foundry Note

This item includes an activity for each spell with a limited use per dawn. You can remove the activities for the beads that aren't available on this necklace and duplicate ones that are included multiple times before giving it to a player.
translation:
奇物，珍稀（需牧师，德鲁伊或圣武士同调）

这条项链挂着 [[/r 1d4 + 2#Magic beads]] 颗由海蓝宝石、黑珍珠或黄玉制成的魔法念珠。项链上同样串有许多由琥珀、血石、黄水晶、珊瑚石、玉石、珍珠或石英石制成的非魔法性的念珠。魔法念珠从项链中取下时将失去其魔法。

项链的每颗魔法念珠都可能是六种念珠之一，由DM决定或在下表中随机掷骰以确定每颗念珠的种类。一条项链可以拥有多颗同种类的念珠。要使用念珠，你必须佩戴着这条项链。每颗念珠容纳着一道法术，你能够以一个附赠动作从中施展它所容纳的法术（需要豁免的法术使用你的法术豁免DC）。一颗魔法念珠中的法术一经施展，那颗念珠直至次日黎明前都无法再次被使用。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgNecklaceOfPra caption=false rollable]

Foundry Note

该物品为每个法术预设专属动作（含每日黎明充能次数限制）。交付玩家前，你可依项链实际镶嵌的宝珠移除未启用的法术动作，并对重复出现的同源宝珠动作进行复数复制。

original:
Weapon (Any Simple or Martial), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Life Stealing. The weapon has [[/r 1d8 + 1]] charges. When you attack a creature that has fewer than 100 Hit Points with this weapon and roll a 20 on the d20 for the attack roll, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be slain instantly as the sword tears its life force from its body. Constructs and Undead succeed on the save automatically. The weapon loses 1 charge if the creature is slain. When the weapon has no charges remaining, it loses this property.

Foundry Note

The Life Stealing activity should be updated with its max uses set to the number of charges rolled.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（任意简易武器或军用武器），极珍稀（需同调）

你用该魔法武器发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +2 加值。

夺命杀。 该武器有 [[/r 1d8 + 1]] 充能。当你用该武器攻击一名生命值不足 100 的生物且在攻击检定中掷出 20 时，该生物必须成功通过一次DC15的体质豁免否则立刻因生命力被该武器吸干而死（亡灵与构装自动成功于此豁免）。如果该生物因此被杀死，九命夺杀者将失去1充能。该武器会在充能耗尽后失去这一词条。

Foundry Note

更新夺命杀行动，将其最大使用次数设定为本次摇骰所得的充能数。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: when you roll a 20 on an attack against a creature with fewer than 100 Hit Points
translation: 当你用该武器攻击一名生命值不足 100 的生物且在攻击检定中掷出 20 时

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare

This fine wooden box contains 1d4 pots of pigment and a brush (weighing 1 pound in total).

Using the brush and expending 1 pot of pigment, you can paint any number of three-dimensional objects and terrain features (such as walls, doors, trees, flowers, weapons, webs, and pits), provided these elements are all confined to a 20-foot Cube. The effort takes 10 minutes (regardless of the number of elements you create), during which time you must remain in the Cube, and requires Concentration. If your Concentration is broken or you leave the Cube before the work is done, all the painted elements vanish, and the pot of pigment is wasted.

When the work is done, all the painted objects and terrain features become real. Thus, painting a door on a wall creates an actual door, which can be opened to whatever is beyond. Painting a pit creates a real pit, the entire depth of which must lie within the 20-foot Cube.

No object created by a pot of pigment can have a value greater than 25 GP, and the total value of all objects created by a pot of pigment can’t exceed 500 GP. If you paint objects of greater value (such as a large pile of gold), they look authentic, but close inspection reveals they’re made from paste, cookies, or some other worthless material.

If you paint a form of energy such as fire or lightning, the energy dissipates as soon as you complete the painting, doing no harm.

Foundry Note

This item begins with 4 max uses. The Determine the Number of Pots activity can be used to determine how many pots remain in the box.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀

这个精美的木盒里装有 1d4 罐颜料以及一根画笔（共重1磅）。

通过使用画笔并消耗 1 罐颜料，你可以在 20 尺立方的范围内画出任意数量的三维物体和地形特征（例如墙、门、树、鲜花、武器、蛛网和坑洞）。达成此效应需要 10 分钟（无论你创造了多少东西），而且在此期间，你必须留在这一区域中并保持专注。完成绘画前，若你的专注被打断或你离开此区域，你画出的所有东西都将消失，消耗的那罐颜料也会被浪费。

完成绘画时，你绘制的物件和地形将变为真实的事物。因此，画在墙上的门可以正常打开并通过，画在地上的坑也会变成真正的坑，其整个深度都必须在 20 尺立方的范围以内。

颜料不能创造出价值高于 25 金币的单个物件，你以一罐颜料创造出的所有物件的总价值也不能超过 500 金币。如果你试图画出价格更高昂的东西（例如一大堆金子），那么产生的物件仅仅看上去像是真的，但仔细检查就会发现它们是由浆糊、饼干或其他不值钱的材料制成的。

如果你画出某种形式的能量，例如火焰或闪电，则该能量在你完成绘制的那一瞬间消散，且不会造成任何伤害。

Foundry Note

该物品初始最大使用次数为 4 次，可通过罐数核查行动判定盒中剩余颜料罐数量。

key: entries->Nolzur's Marvelous Pigments->activities->Determine Number of Pots->name

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortbow00]{Shortbow}), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

When you nock an arrow on this bow, it whispers in Elvish, “Swift defeat to my enemies.” When you use this weapon to make a ranged attack, you can utter or sign the following command words: “Swift death to you who have wronged me.” The target of your attack becomes your sworn enemy until it dies or until dawn 7 days later. You can have only one such sworn enemy at a time. When your sworn enemy dies, you can choose a new one after the next dawn.

When you make a ranged attack roll with this weapon against your sworn enemy, you have Advantage on the roll. In addition, your target gains no benefit from Half Cover or Three-Quarters Cover, and you suffer no Disadvantage due to long range. If the attack hits, your sworn enemy takes an extra 3d6 Piercing damage.

While your sworn enemy lives, you have Disadvantage on attack rolls with all other weapons.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongbow000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortbow00]），极珍稀（需同调）

当你弯弓搭箭时，誓仇弓会用精灵语悄声念出“速歼敌”。当你用此武器发动远程攻击时，你可以说出命令词“负我者死”，而这次攻击的目标将成为你的仇敌，直到它死亡或直到七日后的黎明之时。你同时只能指明一名这样的仇敌。仇敌死后，你可以在次日黎明后重新选择仇敌。

使用此弓对仇敌发动远程攻击时，你的攻击检定具有优势。另外，目标不会从半身掩护与四分之三掩护中受益，你也不会因为超出常规射程而承受劣势。如果攻击命中，你的仇敌将额外受 3d6 穿刺伤害。

只要你的仇敌还活着，你使用其他武器发动的攻击检定便会承受劣势。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: when you make a ranged attack with this weapon
translation: 当你用此武器发动远程攻击时

original:
When you make a ranged attack roll with this weapon against your sworn enemy, you have Advantage on the roll. In addition, your target gains no benefit from Half Cover or Three-Quarters Cover, and you suffer no Disadvantage due to long range. If the attack hits, your sworn enemy takes an extra 3d6 Piercing damage.

While your sworn enemy lives, you have Disadvantage on attack rolls with all other weapons.
translation:
使用此弓对仇敌发动远程攻击时，你的攻击检定具有优势。另外，目标不会从半身掩护与四分之三掩护中受益，你也不会因为超出常规射程而承受劣势。如果攻击命中，你的仇敌将额外受 3d6 穿刺伤害。

只要你的仇敌还活着，你使用其他武器发动的攻击检定便会承受劣势。

original: After spending a Long Rest in your Observatory, you gain a magical Charm (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]{Supernatural Gifts}) that lasts for 7 days or until you use it. The Charm allows you to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplContactOth]{Contact Other Plane} without expending a spell slot. You can’t gain this Charm again while you still have it.
translation: 你可以用天文台观察到荒宇和星光位面的遥远角落。当你在天文台内完成一次长休后，你获得一个魔法护咒（见第 3 章 “ @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]” 一节），此护咒持续 7 天或持续至你将其使用为止。此护咒允许你施展一次@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplContactOth]，无需消耗法术位。你无法在已拥有该护咒时再次获得它。

original:
See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]{Figurine of Wondrous Power}

This polished obsidian horse can become a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.5SgVGhQBswgWRwsF]{Nightmare} for up to 24 hours. The nightmare fights only to defend itself. Once it has been used, it can’t be used again until 5 days have passed.

The figurine has a [[/r 1d10cs1]]{10 percent chance} each time you use it to ignore your orders, including a command to revert to figurine form. If you mount the nightmare while it is ignoring your orders, you and the nightmare are instantly transported to a random location on the plane of Hades, where the nightmare reverts to figurine form.

Foundry Note

This item's limited uses represent the 5 days required before the figurine can be used again.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]

这个打磨过的黑曜石驹雕像可以变为一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.5SgVGhQBswgWRwsF]{梦魇} ，其存在至多维持 24 小时。梦魇只会为了保护自己而战斗。使用后，此雕像需要经过 5 日才能再次启动。

每次使用此雕像时，它有 [[/r 1d10cs1]]{10% 的概率} 会无视你的命令，包括让它变回雕像的命令。如果你在梦魇无视你命令时骑上它，则你和梦魇会一起立刻被传送到 哈迪斯 位面的随机地点。之后梦魇将变回雕像。

Foundry Note

此物品的使用次数有限，用于跟进需要 5 天的充能周期。

original: [[/r 1d10cs1]]{10 percent chance} of ignoring your orders.
translation: [[/r 1d10cs1]]{ 10% 的概率}会无视你的命令。

original:
Potion, Rare

One vial of this oil can cover one Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it’s wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium). Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness} spell for 1 hour.

Beads of this cloudy, gray oil form on the outside of its container and quickly evaporate.
translation:
药水，珍稀

一扁瓶的以太化之油可以覆盖住连带着其着装与携带的装备的一个中型或小型生物（生物体型每比中型大一级，就需要多用一扁瓶）。抹上油需要花费 10 分钟。被影响的生物将会获得@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEtherealne] 法术的效应，持续 1 小时。

与瓶中油膏类似的浑浊的灰色油珠会在其容器的外壁形成，并迅速蒸发。

original:
Potion, Very Rare

One vial of this oil can coat one Melee weapon or twenty pieces of ammunition, but only ammunition and Melee weapons that are nonmagical and deal Slashing or Piercing damage are affected. Applying the oil takes 1 minute, after which the oil magically seeps into whatever it coats, turning the coated weapon into a +3 Weapon or the coated ammunition into +3 Ammunition.

This clear, gelatinous oil sparkles with tiny, ultrathin silver shards.
translation:
药水，极珍稀

一扁瓶的锐锋之油可以涂抹在一把近战武器或二十发弹药上，但只有在非魔法性且造成挥砍或穿刺伤害的近战武器或弹药上才能发挥效用。抹上油需要花费 1 分钟，那之后油将魔法性地渗入被涂抹的武器或弹药，将其变为 +3 武器或 +3 弹药。

这种透明的凝胶状油膏中掺杂着极其纤细而微小的银色碎片。

key: entries->Oil of Sharpness->activities->Apply Oil to Weapon->name
entries->Oil of Sharpness->activities->Apply Oil to Ammunition->name

original:
Potion, Uncommon

One vial of this oil can cover one Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it’s wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium). Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFreedomofM]{Freedom of Movement} spell for 8 hours.

Alternatively, the oil can be poured on the ground as a Magic action, where it covers a 10-foot square, duplicating the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGrease0000]{Grease} spell in that area for 8 hours.

This sticky, black unguent is thick and heavy, but it flows quickly when poured.
translation:
药水，非普通

一扁瓶的滑溜之油可以覆盖住连带着其着装与携带的装备的一个中型或小型生物（生物体型每比中型大一级，就需要多用一扁瓶）。抹上油需要花费 10 分钟。被影响的生物将会获得@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFreedomofM]法术的效应，持续 8 小时。

此外，以一个魔法动作，油可以被泼到地面上并覆盖 10 尺方形区域，并在此区域内复现出 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGrease0000]法术的效应，持续8小时。

这种粘稠的黑色油膏浑浊且厚重，但在被倒出来时却又流动迅速。

original:
Contact Poison

A creature subjected to Oil of Taggit must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 24 hours. The creature also has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition while Poisoned in this way. It wakes up if it takes damage.
translation:
接触型毒药

接触到这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 13 的体质豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态 24 小时。以此中毒期间该生物还会陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态。该生物会在受到伤害时苏醒。

key: entries->Ollamh Harp Instrument of the Bards->name
original: Ollamh Harp Instrument of the Bards

key: entries->Ollamh Harp Instrument of the Bards->description
original:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgInstrumentOfT]{Instrument of the Bards}

An Instrument of the Bards is superior to an ordinary instrument in every way.

A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d4 type=psychic]] damage.

You can play the instrument to cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spell, it can’t be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC.
translation:
参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgInstrumentOfT]

吟游诗人乐器在各方面都优于普通乐器。

在未与乐器完成同调的情况下，尝试演奏乐器的生物必须进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] ，豁免失败则会受到 [[/damage 2d4 type=psychic]] 伤害。

你可以通过演奏乐器来施展它的一个法术。一旦该乐器被用来施展了某一个法术，则其直至次日黎明前都无法再被用来施展该法术。这些法术使用你的施法属性和法术豁免DC。

original:
See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]{Figurine of Wondrous Power}

This onyx statuette of a dog can become a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobMastiff000]{Mastiff} for up to 6 hours. The mastiff has an Intelligence of 8 and can speak Common. It also has Blindsight with a range of 60 feet. Once it has been used, it can’t be used again until 7 days have passed.

Foundry Note

This item's limited uses represent the 7 days required before the figurine can be used again.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]

这个玛瑙狗狗雕像可以变为一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobMastiff000]{獒犬 Mastiff} ，其存在至多维持 6 小时。这只獒犬智力为 8 并且会说通用语。它还具有 60 尺盲视。使用后，此雕像需要经过 7 日才能再次启动。

Foundry Note

此物品的使用次数有限，用于跟进需要 7 天的充能周期。

original: The mastiff has an Intelligence of 8 and can speak Common. It also has &Reference[Blindsight] with a range of 60 feet.
translation: 这只獒犬智力为8并且会说通用语。它还具有 60 尺&Reference[Blindsight]。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This orb can be used as an Arcane Focus.

While holding this orb, you can take a Magic action to determine which way is magnetic north. Nothing happens if the orb is used in a location that has no magnetic north.
translation:
奇物，普通

这颗法球可用作一个奥术法器。

持握这颗法球期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作 来确认地磁北方的方位。如果在一个没有地磁北方的地方使用这颗法球，则不会发生任何事情。

original:
Wondrous Item, Artifact (Requires Attunement)

Lore

Long ago, in the Dragonlance setting, elves and humans waged a terrible war against chromatic dragons. When the world seemed doomed, the wizards of the Towers of High Sorcery came together and forged five Orbs of Dragonkind to help defeat the dragons. One orb was taken to each of the five towers, and there they were used to speed the war toward a victorious end. The wizards used the orbs to lure dragons to them, then destroyed the dragons with powerful magic.

As the Towers of High Sorcery fell in later ages, the orbs were destroyed or faded into legend, and only three are thought to survive. Their magic has been warped over the centuries. Their primary purpose of calling dragons still functions, but they also allow some measure of control over dragons.

Each orb contains the essence of an evil dragon, a presence that resents any attempt to coax magic from it. Those who try to wield an orb’s magic but lack sufficient force of personality might find themselves under the orb’s control.

While attuned to an orb, you can take a Magic action to peer into the orb’s depths. You must then make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw. On a successful save, you control the orb for as long as you remain attuned to it. On a failed save, the orb imposes the Charmed condition on you for as long as you remain attuned to it.

While you are Charmed by the orb, you can’t voluntarily end your Attunement to it, and the orb casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{Suggestion} on you at will (save DC 18), urging you to work toward the evil ends it desires. The dragon essence within the orb might want many things: the annihilation of a particular society or organization, freedom from the orb, to spread suffering in the world, to advance the worship of Tiamat, or something else the DM decides.

Destroying an Orb. An Orb of Dragonkind has AC 20 and is destroyed if it takes damage from a +3 Weapon or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{Disintegrate} spell. Nothing else can harm it.

An orb is an etched crystal globe about 10 inches in diameter. When used, it grows to about 20 inches in diameter, and mist swirls inside it.

Random Properties. An Orb of Dragonkind has the following @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.iA3mHmvlXvWKlyBo#artifact-properties]{random properties}:

  • 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorBenefici]{minor beneficial properties}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorDetrimen]{minor detrimental property}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorDetrimen]{major detrimental property}

Spells. The orb has 7 charges and regains 1d4 + 3 expended charges daily at dawn. If you control the orb, you can cast one of the spells on the following table from it. The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell.

Spell

Charge Cost

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} (level 9 version)

4

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00]{Daylight}

1

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}

2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}

0

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying} (save DC 18)

3

Call Dragons. While you control the orb, you can take a Magic action to cause the orb to issue a telepathic call that extends in all directions for 40 miles. Chromatic dragons in range feel compelled to come to the orb as soon as possible by the most direct route. Dragon deities such as Tiamat are unaffected by this call. Chromatic dragons drawn to the orb might be Hostile toward you for compelling them against their will. Once you have used this property, it can’t be used again for 1 hour.
translation:
奇物，神器（需同调）

逸闻

很久以前，在龙枪的设定中，精灵与人类对色彩巨龙发动了一场惨烈的战争。在最后世界接近崩溃之际，大法师诸塔的法师们齐聚一堂，铸造了五颗龙珠来帮助击败巨龙。五颗龙珠分给了五座法师塔，他们凭借龙珠的力量克敌制胜。法师们用龙珠引诱龙族，然后以强大的法术轰杀之。

随着大法师诸塔在后来的年代中倒塌，其持有的五颗龙珠也相继被摧毁或遗失在传说之中。相传仍然有三颗保存完好的龙珠流传在世。虽然它们的魔法在几个世纪中被扭曲变换，但其呼唤巨龙的原始功能却依然健全，还能在一定程度上控制龙族。

每颗龙珠内都包含着一条邪恶巨龙的精神，对任何尝试从中引出魔法的企图怀有愤恨。那些试图使用龙珠但意志不坚定的人有时会发现自身实为被龙珠所蛊惑。

与龙珠维持同调期间，你能够以魔法动作窥视龙珠深处。然后你必须进行一次DC 15的魅力豁免。若豁免成功，你将可以控制龙珠直至同调中断。若豁免失败，你将被龙珠魅惑 直至同调中断。

被龙珠魅惑期间，你不能自行中断同调，而龙珠可以对你随意施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]（豁免DC 18），并蛊惑你助推其邪恶目标。龙珠里的巨龙精神有着各种需求：歼灭某个特定社团或组织；从龙珠中解放；四处折磨世人；传播提亚马特信仰，或是由DM决定的其他事情。

摧毁龙珠。 龙珠的AC为20，当其受到 +3 魔法武器或法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisintegra]的伤害时，龙珠被摧毁。其余任何事物都无法摧毁龙珠。

龙珠是一枚直径约10寸的蚀刻水晶球。使用时，其直径增长至20寸，并且在内部萦绕着迷雾。

随机词条。 龙珠具有下列 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.iA3mHmvlXvWKlyBo#artifact-properties]{随机词条}：

  • 2 项@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorBenefici]{次要增益词条}
  • 1 项@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorDetrimen]{次要减益词条}
  • 1 项@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorDetrimen]{主要减益词条}

法术。 龙珠具有 7 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d4 + 3 已消耗的充能。你能以龙珠施展下表中的法术（豁免D C18）。表中表明了你施展对应的法术需要消耗多少充能。

法术

充能消耗

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]（9环版本）

4

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00]

1

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDeathWard0]

2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]

0

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]（豁免DC18）

3

呼唤巨龙。 控制龙珠期间，你能够以魔法动作 令龙珠发出心灵感应呼唤，此呼唤向所有方向延伸40英里。范围内的色彩龙族将被迫以最直接的路线尽可能快的来到龙珠处。龙族神祇（如提亚马特）不受此呼唤影响。被龙珠唤来的色彩龙族可能因其非自愿的到来与你敌对。该词条一经使用，一小时内你都无法再次使用。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This orb can be used as an Arcane Focus.

While holding the orb, you can take a Magic action to determine whether it is morning, afternoon, evening, or nighttime. This property functions only on the Material Plane.
translation:
奇物，普通

这颗法球可用作一个奥术法器。

持握这颗法球期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作 来确认现在是上午、下午、傍晚还是夜晚。这项属性仅在物质位面中有效。

original:
Ingested Poison

A creature subjected to Pale Tincture must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) Poison damage and have the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. The Poisoned creature repeats the save every 24 hours, taking 3 (1d6) Poison damage on a failed save. The damage the poison deals can't be healed by any means while the creature remains Poisoned. After seven successful saves against the poison, the creature is no longer Poisoned.

Foundry Note

The Use Poison activity includes the save and the Poisoned and Reduce Max Active Effect applies the Poisoned condition and can be used for preventing healing as well. Edit the Active Effect on the player, change to the "Effects" tab and adjust the "Effect Value" to be "-X" where X is the total damage they've taken from the poison. This will temporarily reduce their max HP by that value.
translation:
服用型毒药

服用这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 16 的体质豁免，否则将受到3（1d6）毒素伤害并陷入 the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态。以此中毒的生物每过24小时都需要重复此豁免，豁免失败则再受3（1d6）毒素伤害。此毒药造成的伤害在此中毒效应终止前无法以任何方式恢复。该生物累计豁免成功七次后即不再中毒。

Foundry Note

使用毒药行动包含豁免和施加中毒效果，中毒和减少最大生命值效应可以减少最大生命值并施加中毒状态，也可用于阻止治疗。编辑玩家的主动效用，切换到“效用”选项卡，将“效果值”调整为“-X”，其中 X 是他们从毒药中受到的总伤害。这将暂时降低他们的最大生命值。
中毒并减少最大生命值

original: The Poisoned creature repeats the save every 24 hours, taking 3 (1d6) Poison damage on a failed save. The damage the poison deals can't be healed by any means while the creature remains Poisoned. After seven successful saves against the poison, the creature is no longer Poisoned.
translation: 中毒的生物每过 24 小时都需要重复此豁免，豁免失败则再受 3（1d6）毒素伤害。此毒药造成的伤害在此中毒效应终止前无法以任何方式恢复。该生物累计豁免成功七次后即不再中毒。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement by a Spellcaster)

While this pearl is on your person, you can take a Magic action to regain one expended spell slot of level 3 or lower. Once you use the pearl, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需施法者同调）

在你随身携带这颗珍珠期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作来恢复一枚已消耗的三环或更低环阶的法术位。这颗珍珠一经使用，则其直至次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This tiny vial contains magic perfume, enough for one use. You can take a Magic action to apply the perfume to yourself, and its effect lasts 1 hour. For the duration, you have Advantage on all Charisma (Deception and Persuasion) checks made to influence a creature within 5 feet of yourself.

Foundry Note

The Bewitching Scent Active Effect can be used for tracking but does not automate the effects.
translation:
奇物，普通

这个小瓶内装有足够单次使用的魔法香水。你可以使用一个魔法动作将香水喷洒或涂抹在自己身上，其效应会持续 1 小时。在持续时间内，你对试图影响一个位于你周边5尺范围内的生物而进行的所有魅力（欺瞒和游说）检定都具有优势。

Foundry Note

主动效应迷人香气可用于跟进，但不会自动触发效果。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this pendant, you can take a Magic action to regain 2d4 + 2 Hit Points. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

In addition, you have Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition while you wear this pendant.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

佩戴此吊坠期间，你可以执行魔法动作来恢复 2d4 + 2 生命值。一经使用，则其直至次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

此外，佩戴着此吊坠期间，你在为避免或结束 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态的豁免中具有优势。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This delicate silver chain has a brilliant-cut black gem pendant. While you wear it, you have Immunity to the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and Poison damage.
translation:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

这条精致的银链子上有一颗明亮式切割的黑宝石吊坠。佩戴护符期间，你免疫 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态和毒素伤害。

key: entries->Periapt of Proof against Poison->effects->Protected Against Poison->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this pendant, you gain the following benefits.

Life Preservation. Whenever you make a Death Saving Throw, you can change a roll of 9 or lower to a 10, turning a failed save into a successful one.

Natural Healing Boost. Whenever you roll a Hit Point Die to regain Hit Points, double the number of Hit Points it restores.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

佩戴此吊坠期间，你获得以下增益：

维持生命。 每当你进行死亡豁免时，你都可以将掷骰中 9 及以下的出目改为 10，以此让失败的豁免改为成功。

加速自愈。 每当你投掷一颗生命骰来恢复生命值时，其生命值恢复量翻倍。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

The next time you see a creature within 10 minutes after drinking this philter, you are charmed by that creature and have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for 1 hour.

This rose-hued, effervescent liquid contains one easy-to-miss bubble shaped like a heart.
translation:
药水，非普通

饮下这瓶药水的 10 分钟内，你将被下一个看见的生物魅惑并陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态，持续 1 小时。

这种玫瑰色的气泡状药液中包含着一个容易被忽略的心形气泡。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

While smoking this pipe, you can take a Magic action to exhale a puff of smoke that takes the form of a creature, such as a dragon, a flumph, or a slaad. The form must be small enough to fit in a 1-foot cube and loses its shape after a few seconds, becoming an ordinary puff of smoke.
translation:
奇物，普通

用这个烟斗抽烟期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作呼出一股烟雾并使其变成一个生物的形状，例如一条龙、一只呋噜、或者一只史拉蟾。该形状必须小到足以容纳进1尺立方，并且其会在数秒后失去其形状，变回一股普通的烟雾。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

These pipes have 3 charges and regain 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. You can take a Magic action to play them and expend 1 charge to create an eerie, spellbinding tune. Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute. A creature that fails the save repeats it at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on its save is immune to the effect of these pipes for 24 hours.
translation:
奇物，非普通

颤栗乐笙具有 3 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d3 已消耗的充能。你可以使用一个魔法动作演奏该乐笙，并消耗其 1 充能来创作一首怪诞且令人着迷的曲调。你周边 30 尺范围内每个你选择的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 15 的感知豁免，豁免失败者会陷入&Reference[Frightened apply=false]状态，持续 1 分钟。豁免失败的生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复该豁免，豁免成功则结束对自身的影响。豁免成功的生物将在 24 小时内免疫该乐笙的效应。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While these pipes are on your person, ordinary rats and giant rats are Indifferent toward you and won’t attack you unless you threaten or harm them.

The pipes have 3 charges and regain 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. If you play the pipes as a Magic action, you can take a Bonus Action to expend 1 to 3 charges, calling forth one @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.8ihbbjkaOFTPbI73]{Swarm of Rats} with each expended charge if enough rats are within half a mile of you to be called in this fashion (as determined by the DM). If there aren’t enough rats to form a swarm, the charge is wasted. Called swarms move toward the music by the shortest available route but aren’t under your control otherwise.

Whenever a Swarm of Rats that isn’t under another creature’s control comes within 30 feet of you while you are playing the pipes, the swarm makes a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the swarm behaves as it normally would and can’t be swayed by the pipes’ music for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the swarm is swayed by the pipes’ music and becomes Friendly to you and your allies for as long as you continue to play the pipes each round as a Magic action. A Friendly swarm obeys your commands. If you issue no commands to a Friendly swarm, it defends itself but otherwise takes no actions. If a Friendly swarm starts its turn more than 30 feet away from you, your control over that swarm ends, and the swarm behaves as it normally would and can’t be swayed by the pipes’ music for the next 24 hours.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

在你随身携带这只乐笙期间，普通老鼠和巨鼠对你的态度为冷漠。除非你威胁或伤害它们，否则它们不会主动攻击你。

唤鼠乐笙具有 3 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d3 已消耗的充能。你可以使用一个魔法动作演奏该乐笙，并使用一个附赠动作消耗 1~3 充能。如果你周围半里内有足够可供召唤的老鼠（由DM决定），那么每消耗 1 充能就能召唤 1 组@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.8ihbbjkaOFTPbI73]{鼠群}。如果范围内老鼠的数量不足以形成集群，则该次充能被浪费。被召唤的集群会沿着最短的可用路线向音乐移动，但除此之外不受你的控制。

在你演奏乐笙期间，每当一个未被其他生物控制的鼠群进入到你周边 30 尺范围内时，该鼠群就必须进行一次DC 15 的感知豁免。如果豁免成功，该鼠群就会像平常一样行动，并在接下来的 24 小时内不再受到乐笙音乐的影响。如果豁免失败，鼠群就会受到乐笙音乐的影响，并且只要你每轮继续使用一个魔法动作演奏乐笙，鼠群就会对你和你的盟友保持友好态度。一个友好的鼠群会遵从你的命令。当你没对一个友好的鼠群下达命令时，它们会尽力保护自己，但不会执行其他动作。如果一个友好的鼠群在距离你30尺以外的地方开始其回合，则你对该鼠群的控制就会终止，鼠群会像平常一样行动，并在接下来的24小时内不再受到乐笙音乐的影响。

key: entries->Pipes of the Sewers->activities->Call Swarm of Rats->name

original:
Armor (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmHalfPlateA]{Half Plate Armor} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]{Plate Armor}), Legendary (Requires Attunement)

While you’re wearing this armor, you can take a Magic action and use a command word to gain the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness} spell. The spell ends immediately if you remove the armor or take a Magic action to repeat the command word. This property of the armor can’t be used again until the next dawn.

护甲（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmHalfPlateA] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]），传说（需同调）

着装此护甲期间，你能够以一个魔法动作说出其命令语以获得法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEtherealne] 的效应。若你脱下此护甲或以魔法动作再次说出命令语，则法术立即结束。此词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。

original:
Deadly Trap (Levels 1–4)

Trigger: A creature moves onto a pressure plate

Duration: Instantaneous, and the trap resets at the start of the next turn if it has activated fewer than three times

When a creature moves onto this trap’s pressure plate for the first time on a turn, poisoned darts shoot from tubes embedded in the surrounding walls. The holes that house these tubes are obscured by dust and cobwebs or skillfully hidden amid bas-reliefs, murals, or frescoes.

Each creature in the darts’ path must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be struck by [[/r 1d3]] darts, taking 3 (1d6) Poison damage per dart.

Detect and Disarm. As a Search action, a creature can examine the walls and make a [[/check prc 15]] check, detecting the holes on a successful check. Plugging all the holes with wax, cloth, or detritus prevents the darts from firing.

As a Search action, a creature can examine the section of floor that forms the pressure plate and make a [[/check prc 15]] check, detecting the pressure plate on a successful check. Wedging an Iron Spike or a similar object under the pressure plate prevents the trap from triggering.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the trap for higher levels by increasing each dart’s Poison damage as follows: 7 (2d6) at levels 5–10, 14 (4d6) at levels 11–16, or 24 (7d6) at levels 17–20.
translation:
致命陷阱（1-4级）

触发： 生物移动到压力板上时

持续时间： 立即，且如果陷阱触发次数小于三次，则它在下一回合开始时重置

当生物在一回合中初次移动至该陷阱的压力板上时，毒镖将从嵌在周围墙壁里的管道中射出。容纳这些管道的孔洞被尘土和蛛网所遮蔽，也或是巧妙地隐藏在浅浮雕，壁画或墙饰之中。

每个在飞镖路径中的生物都需要成功通过DC 13 的敏捷豁免，否则将被 [[/r 1d3]] 支飞镖击中，每被一支飞镖命中都会受到3（1d6）毒素伤害

侦测与解除。 生物可以用搜索动作检查墙壁并进行 [[/check prc 15]] 检定，成功时则侦测到孔洞。使用蜡，布料或碎屑堵住全部孔洞可以阻止飞镖发射。

生物可以用搜索动作检查构成压力板的地面部分并进行 [[/check prc 15]] 检定，成功时则侦测到压力板。在压力板下插入铁钉或类似物件则可以阻止陷阱触发。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提升每发飞镖的毒素伤害来提高陷阱对应的等级范围：5-10级时为7（2d6），11-16级时为14（4d6），或17-20级时为24（7d6）。

original:
Nuisance Trap (Levels 1–4)

Trigger: A creature opens the trap’s lock improperly or fails to disarm the trap

Duration: Instantaneous

A poisoned needle is hidden in a lock. When a creature opens the lock with any object other than the proper key, the needle springs out and stabs the creature. The creature makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 5 (1d10) Poison damage and has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

Avoid. The trap doesn’t trigger if the lock is opened using a Knock spell or similar magic.

Detect and Disarm. As a Search action, a creature can examine the trapped lock and make a [[/check prc 15]] check, detecting the needle on a successful check. Once the trap is detected, a character can take an action to try to disarm the trap, doing so with a successful [[/check slt 15]] check. On a failed check, the creature triggers the trap.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the trap for higher levels by increasing the damage and the save DC, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Poison Damage

Save DC

5–10

11 (2d10)

13

11–16

22 (4d10)

15

17–20

55 (10d10)

17
translation:
妨碍陷阱（1-4级）

触发： 生物以不恰当的方式打开陷阱锁孔或解除陷阱失败时

持续时间： 立即

毒针隐藏在一把锁中。当生物用除了适配的钥匙以外的物件开锁时，毒针会弹出并刺伤该生物。该生物进行DC 11 的体质豁免，失败则受到5（1d10）毒素伤害并陷入中毒状态，持续1小时；成功则仅受半伤。

避免。 使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplKnock00000] 或类似法术开锁时，陷阱不会触发。

侦测与解除。 生物可以用搜索动作检查陷阱锁孔并进行 [[/check prc 15]] 检定，成功则侦测到针刺。一旦找到陷阱，角色可以用动作尝试进行一次 [[/check slt 15]] 检定，成功则解除陷阱。检定失败时，该生物触发陷阱。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提高伤害与豁免DC来提高陷阱对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级

毒素伤害

豁免 DC

5–10

11 (2d10)

13

11–16

22 (4d10)

15

17–20

55 (10d10)

17

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgPoisonousGas0]{Poisonous Gas}

Poisonous gas is usually encountered in an enclosed space, such as a sewer or sealed tomb. The gas fills as much space as it can, up to a maximum of ten 10-foot Cubes. The transparent gas carries a foul odor. The gas is continuously or periodically replenished by some natural or magical source, though a strong wind disperses the gas for 1 minute.

Any creature that enters poisonous gas for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 5 (1d10) Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures in the gas also have Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the hazard for higher levels by increasing the Poison damage and the save DC, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Poison Damage

Save DC

5–10

11 (2d10)

14

11–16

22 (4d10)

16

17–20

55 (10d10)

18
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgPoisonousGas0]{Poisonous Gas}

毒气常见于封闭空间内，如下水道或者封闭的墓穴中。毒气会尽可能地填满空间，最大覆盖范围为十个 10 尺立方。这种透明的气体带有腐臭味，它会持续地或者周期性地由其天然源头或魔法源头补充，但一阵强风能将毒气驱散长达一分钟，

任何在一回合内首次进入毒气范围、或者在范围内开始其回合的生物，必须进行一次DC 12 的体 质豁免，豁免失败受到5（1d10）点毒素伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。身处毒气中的生物还会在死亡豁免中具有劣势。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提高毒素伤害及其豁免DC来提高毒气对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级范围

毒素伤害

豁免 DC

14

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This item functions as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPole0000000]{Pole}. While holding it, you can take a Magic action to cause it to transform into a fishing pole with a hook, a line, and a reel, or have the fishing pole revert to a Pole.
translation:
奇物，普通

这个物品可用作一根@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPole0000000]。持握该物品期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作将其转变为一根附带鱼钩、鱼线、与卷线盘的钓鱼竿，或者将钓鱼竿恢复成一根长杆。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This item functions as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPole0000000]{Pole}. While holding it, you can take a Magic action to collapse it into a 1-foot-long rod for ease of storage (the pole’s weight doesn’t change) or cause the 1-foot-long rod to revert to a Pole. The rod elongates only as far as the surrounding space allows.
translation:
奇物，普通

这个物品可用作一根 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPole0000000]。持握该物品期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作将其压缩成一根便于储藏 1 尺长权杖（长杆的重量不会改变），或者将该 1 尺长的权杖恢复成一根长杆。权杖的伸长程度仅限于其周围空间允许的距离。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

This fine black cloth, soft as silk, is folded up to the dimensions of a handkerchief. It unfolds into a circular sheet 6 feet in diameter.

You can take a Magic action to unfold a Portable Hole and place it on or against a solid surface, whereupon the Portable Hole creates an extradimensional hole 10 feet deep. The cylindrical space within the hole exists on a different plane of existence, so it can’t be used to create open passages. Any creature inside an open Portable Hole can exit the hole by climbing out of it.

You can take a Magic action to close a Portable Hole by taking hold of the edges of the cloth and folding it up. Folding the cloth closes the hole, and any creatures or objects within remain in the extradimensional space. No matter what’s in it, the hole weighs next to nothing.

If the hole is folded up, a creature within the hole’s extradimensional space can take an action to make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check. On a successful check, the creature forces its way out and appears within 5 feet of the Portable Hole. A closed Portable Hole holds enough air for 1 hour of breathing, divided by the number of breathing creatures inside.

Placing a Portable Hole inside an extradimensional space created by a Bag of Holding, Heward’s Handy Haversack, or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate and not behind &Reference[Total Cover] is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can’t be reopened.
translation:
奇物，珍稀

这块如丝绸般顺滑的精致黑色布料，折叠起来只有手帕大小。布料展开后为直径 6 尺的圆形盖布。

你可以使用一个魔法动作展开次元洞，并将其放置在或靠着一处坚固表面。次元洞会随即打开一个 10 尺深的异次元孔洞。次元洞内的圆柱形空间存在于异位面，因此无法用于创造开放通道。任何位于一个打开的次元洞内的生物都可以通过攀爬从洞口离开。

你可以使用一个魔法动作通过抓住布料的边缘将其折叠起来以关闭次元洞。折叠布料会关闭洞口，里面的任何生物或物件都会留在异次元空间中。无论内部装了什么，次元洞的重量都可以忽略不计。

如果次元洞被折叠起来，一个位于洞内异次元空间的生物可以使用一个动作进行一次DC 10 的力量（运动）检定。如果检定成功，该生物就会强行离开，并出现在次元洞周边5尺范围内。一个关闭的次元洞可容纳足够呼吸 1 小时的空气，除以洞内呼吸生物的数量。

将次元洞放入次元袋、霍华德的便利袋或其他类似物品产生的异次元空间时，将立即摧毁这两件物品并打开一扇通往星光位面的门扉。门扉会产生在被放入另一件物品的前一件物品所在的空间位置。任何在门扉周边 10 尺范围内且不在全掩护之后的生物将被吸入门内并送到星光位面的随机位置，随后该门关闭。这扇门扉只能单向通过且无法被再次打开。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

If you plant an ordinary shrub in this 10-pound clay pot and let it grow for 30 days, the shrub magically transforms into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.gaSTr7DFZJLmgI2J]{Awakened Shrub} at the end of that time. When the shrub awakens, its roots break the pot, destroying it.

The awakened shrub is Friendly toward you and obeys your commands. Absent commands from you, it does nothing.
translation:
奇物，普通

\n

你可以在这个 10 磅重的黏土花盆里种植一株普通灌木，待其生长30天后，这株灌木会魔法性的转化为一株 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmAwakenedShrub0]{启蒙灌木}。当灌木被启蒙时，它的根系会打碎花盆，并导致花盆被摧毁。

\n

这株启蒙灌木会对你友好并服从你的命令。如果没有你的命令，它会什么也不做。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

When you drink this potion, you can cast the level 3 version of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship} spell (save DC 13).

Agitating this potion’s muddy liquid brings little bits into view: a fish scale, a hummingbird feather, a cat claw, or a squirrel hair.
translation:
药水，非普通

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你可以施展三环版本的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]法术（豁免DC 13）。

搅动这瓶药水中的浑浊药液时可以看到细碎的残渣：一片鱼的鳞片、一根蜂鸟的羽毛、一只猫的爪子或是一根松鼠的毛发。

original:
Potion, Rare

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance} spell (no Concentration required).

An eyeball bobs in this potion’s yellowish liquid but vanishes when the potion is opened.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]的效应（无需专注）。

一颗眼球在这瓶药水的泛黄药液中沉浮，但会在容器被打开期间消失。

original:
Potion, Common

When you drink this potion, you gain a Climb Speed equal to your Speed for 1 hour. During this time, you have Advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to climb.

This potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

Foundry Note

The Climber Active Effect can be used for tracking but can not automate the effects.
translation:
药水，普通

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得等同于你速度的攀爬速度，持续1小时。这段时间内，你在为攀爬进行的力量（运动）检定中具有优势。

这瓶药水会分离成类似岩层的褐、银、灰三层颜色。摇晃药水也无法将颜色混合。

Foundry Note

攀爬主动效应可用于进行状态跟进，但无法自动处理相关效应。

original:
Potion, Common

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplComprehend]{Comprehend Languages} spell for 1 hour.

This potion’s liquid is a clear concoction with bits of salt and soot swirling in it.
translation:
药水，普通

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplComprehend]的效应，持续 1 小时。

这瓶药水的药液是透明的调配物，一些盐粒和烟尘在里面旋转。

original:
Potion, Rare

When you drink this potion, you gain the “reduce” effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]{Enlarge/Reduce} spell for 1d4 hours (no Concentration required).

The red in the potion’s liquid continuously contracts to a tiny bead and then expands to color the clear liquid around it. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]中的“缩小”效应，持续 1d4 小时（无需专注）。

药液中的红色部分不断收缩成一个小球，随后又膨胀起来，把周围的清澈药液染红。即使摇晃药水瓶也不会打断这个过程。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

After drinking this potion, you can take a Bonus Action to exhale fire at a target within 30 feet of yourself. The target makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The effect ends after you exhale the fire three times or when 1 hour has passed.

This potion’s orange liquid flickers, and smoke fills the top of the container and wafts out whenever it is opened.
translation:
药水，非普通

在你饮下这瓶药水后，你可以执行附赠动作，向位于你 30 尺内的一名目标喷吐出火焰。目标必须通过DC 13 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 4d6 火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。效应将在你喷吐三次火焰或经过一小时后结束。

这瓶药水里的橙色药液不停闪烁，而容器的顶部被烟雾填满，并在开启时飘散出来。

original:
Potion, Very Rare

When you drink this potion, you gain a Fly Speed equal to your Speed for 1 hour and can hover. If you’re in the air when the potion wears off, you fall unless you have some other means of staying aloft.

This potion’s clear liquid floats at the top of its container and has cloudy white impurities drifting in it.

Foundry Note

The Flyer Active Effect can be used for tracking but can not automate the Speed adjustments.
translation:
药水，极珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得等同于你速度的飞行速度并可以悬浮，持续 1 小时。药水效果消失时，如果你仍在半空中，除非你有其他方式保持在空中，否则随即坠落。

这瓶药水中的透明药液漂浮在容器顶部，些许云雾状的白色杂质在其中飘荡。

Foundry Note

飞行主动效应可用于进行状态跟进，但无法自动处理移速调整。

original:
Potion, Rare

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form} spell for 1 hour (no Concentration required) or until you end the effect as a Bonus Action.

This potion’s container seems to hold fog that moves and pours like water.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]的效应，持续 1 小时（无需专注）或你以附赠动作 结束这个效应为止。

这瓶药水的容器看上去装着流动与倾泻如水般的雾气。

original:
Potion, Rarity Varies

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes for 1 hour. The type of giant determines the score (see the table below). The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of light resembling a giant’s fingernail.

translation:
药水，多种稀有度

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你的力量属性值在1小时内发生改变。巨人的种类决定了改变后的值（见下表）。如果你的力量等于或高于该值，则药水不会对你起效。

这瓶药水的透明药液中漂着一缕像是巨人指甲一般的光线。

original:
Potion, Very Rare

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes for 1 hour to 27. The type of giant determines the score. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of light resembling a giant’s fingernail.
translation:
药水，极珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你的力量属性值在 1 小时内变为 27。巨人的种类决定了改变后的值。如果你的力量等于或高于该值，则药水不会对你起效。

这瓶药水的透明药液中漂着一缕像是巨人指甲一般的光线。
