Potion, Rare

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes for 1 hour to 23. The type of giant determines the score. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of light resembling a giant’s fingernail.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你的力量属性值在 1 小时内变为 25。巨人的种类决定了改变后的值。如果你的力量等于或高于该值，则药水不会对你起效。

这瓶药水的透明药液中漂着一缕像是巨人指甲一般的光线。

key: entries->Potion of Giant Strength (Fire)->effects->Strength of Fire->name

original:
Potion, Rare

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes for 1 hour to 23. The type of giant determines the score. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of light resembling a giant’s fingernail.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你的力量属性值在 1 小时内变为 23。巨人的种类决定了改变后的值。如果你的力量等于或高于该值，则药水不会对你起效。

这瓶药水的透明药液中漂着一缕像是巨人指甲一般的光线。

key: entries->Potion of Giant Strength (Frost)->effects->Strength of Frost->name

translation: 巨人之力药水（山丘巨人）

original:
Potion, Uncommon

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes for 1 hour to 21. The type of giant determines the score. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of light resembling a giant’s fingernail.
translation:
药水，非普通

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你的力量属性值在 1 小时内变为 21。巨人的种类决定了改变后的值。如果你的力量等于或高于该值，则药水不会对你起效。

这瓶药水的透明药液中漂着一缕像是巨人指甲一般的光线。

key: entries->Potion of Giant Strength (Hill)->effects->Strength of Hills->name

original:
Potion, Rare

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes for 1 hour to 23. The type of giant determines the score. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of light resembling a giant’s fingernail.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你的力量属性值在 1 小时内变为 23。巨人的种类决定了改变后的值。如果你的力量等于或高于该值，则药水不会对你起效。

这瓶药水的透明药液中漂着一缕像是巨人指甲一般的光线。

key: entries->Potion of Giant Strength (Stone)->effects->Strength of Stone->name

translation: 巨人之力药水（风暴巨人）

original:
Potion, Legendary

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes for 1 hour to 29. The type of giant determines the score. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of light resembling a giant’s fingernail.
translation:
药水，传说

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你的力量属性值在 1 小时内变为 29。巨人的种类决定了改变后的值。如果你的力量等于或高于该值，则药水不会对你起效。

这瓶药水的透明药液中漂着一缕像是巨人指甲一般的光线。

key: entries->Potion of Giant Strength (Storm)->effects->Strength of Storms->name

original:
Potion, Very Rare

This potion’s container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. When you drink the potion, you have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition for 1 hour.
translation:
药水，极珍稀

这瓶药水的容器看上去像是空的，但感觉上像是装着药液。当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得&Reference[Invisible apply=false]状态，持续1小时。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

When you drink this potion, you gain the “enlarge” effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]{Enlarge/Reduce} spell for 10 minutes (no Concentration required).

The red in the potion’s liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.
translation:
药水，非普通

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]中的“变巨”效应，持续 10 分钟（无需专注）。

药液中的红色部分从一个小球开始膨胀，随后又收缩起来，把周围的清澈药液染红。即使摇晃药水也不会打断这个过程。

original:
Potion, Common

You regain 2d4 + 2 Hit Points when you drink this potion.

Whatever its potency, the potion’s red liquid glimmers when agitated.
translation:
药水，普通

当你饮下这瓶药水时恢复 2d4 + 2 生命值。

无论药效如何，这瓶药水的红色药液在摇晃时都会闪烁。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

You regain 4d4 + 4 Hit Points when you drink this potion.

Whatever its potency, the potion’s red liquid glimmers when agitated.
translation:
药水，非普通

当你饮下这瓶药水时恢复 4d4 + 4 生命值。

无论药效如何，这瓶药水的红色药液在摇晃时都会闪烁。

original:
Potion, Rare

You regain 8d4 + 8 Hit Points when you drink this potion.

Whatever its potency, the potion’s red liquid glimmers when agitated.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时恢复 8d4 + 8 生命值。

无论药效如何，这瓶药水的红色药液在摇晃时都会闪烁。

original:
Potion, Very Rare

You regain 10d4 + 20 Hit Points when you drink this potion.

Whatever its potency, the potion’s red liquid glimmers when agitated.
translation:
药水，极珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时恢复 10d4 + 20 生命值。

无论药效如何，这瓶药水的红色药液在摇晃时都会闪烁。

original:
Potion, Rare

When you drink this potion, you gain 10 Temporary Hit Points that last for 1 hour. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} spell (no Concentration required).

This potion’s blue liquid bubbles and steams as if boiling.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得 10 临时生命值，持续 1 小时。在相同持续时间内，你将受到法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]的效应影响（无需专注）。

这瓶药水的蓝色药液如同沸腾一般冒着气泡与蒸汽。

original: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the effect ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.
translation: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

original:
Potion, Rare

This potion’s container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. When you drink the potion, you have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition for 1 hour. The effect ends early if you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.
translation:
药水，珍稀

这瓶药水的容器看上去像是空的，但感觉上像是装着药液。当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得 &Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态，持续 1 小时。效应将在你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术时提前结束。

original:
Potion, Rare

For 1 minute after you drink this potion, you have Resistance to all damage.

This potion’s syrupy liquid looks like liquefied iron.
translation:
药水，珍稀

饮下这瓶药水后的 1 分钟内，你具有所有伤害的抗性。

这瓶药水的粘稠药液看上去像熔化的铁。

original:
Potion, Very Rare

When you drink this potion, your physical age is reduced by 1d6 + 6 years, to a minimum of 13 years. Each time you subsequently drink a Potion of Longevity, there is 10 percent cumulative chance that you instead age by 1d6 + 6 years.

Suspended in this amber liquid is a tiny heart that, against all reason, is still beating. These ingredients vanish when the potion is opened.
translation:
药水，极珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你的生理年龄减少 1d6 + 6 年，最低降至 13 岁。此后每当你再次饮下延寿药水时，都会累计 10% 的概率让你的年龄增加 1d6 + 6 年，而非减少。

一颗违反常理般跳动着的微型心脏悬浮在琥珀色的药液中。这些成分将在药水被打开时消失。

original:
Potion, Rare

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts} spell (save DC 13) for 10 minutes (no Concentration required).

This potion’s dense, purple liquid has an ovoid cloud of pink floating in it.
translation:
药水，珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]的效应（豁免DC 13），持续 10 分钟（无需专注）。

这瓶药水的粘稠紫色药液中漂浮着一团粉色的卵形云雾。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

This concoction looks, smells, and tastes like a Potion of Healing or another beneficial potion. However, it is actually poison masked by illusion magic. Identify reveals its true nature.

If you drink this potion, you take 4d6 Poison damage and must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.
translation:
药水，非普通

这瓶混合物看起来，闻起来和尝起来都和治疗药水或其他增益药水相似。然而，这实际上是一瓶用幻术魔法伪装的毒药。鉴定术可以揭露其本质。

如果你饮下这瓶药水，你受到4d6毒素伤害并必须通过DC 13 的体质豁免否则陷入中毒状态，持续 1 小时。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

After you drink this potion, each Unarmed Strike you make deals an extra 1d6 Force damage on a hit. This effect lasts 10 minutes.

This potion is a thick green fluid that tastes like spinach.
translation:
药水，非普通

饮下这瓶药水后，你的每次徒手打击命中时都会额外造成 1d6 力场伤害。这个效应持续 10 分钟。

这瓶药水里装着尝起来像菠菜的浓稠绿色流体。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

When you drink this potion, you have Resistance to one type of damage for 1 hour. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly by rolling on the following table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgPotionOfResis caption=false rollable]

Foundry Note

This item includes Active Effects for each type of resistance. Use the AE for the type of damage chosen by your DM.
translation:
药水，非普通

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得一种伤害类型的抗性，持续 1 小时。由DM选择伤害类型或通过投掷下列表格以此随机决定伤害类型。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgPotionOfResis caption=false rollable]

Foundry Note

该物品包含各类伤害抗性对应的主动效应。请根据地下城主(DM)指定的伤害类型选用相应主动效应。

original:
Potion, Very Rare

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHaste00000]{Haste} spell for 1 minute (no Concentration required) without suffering the wave of lethargy that typically occurs when the effect ends.

This potion’s yellow fluid is streaked with black and swirls on its own.
translation:
药水，极珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHaste00000]的效应，持续 1 分钟（无需专注），并且不会遭受通常在效应结束时泛起倦意的影响。

这瓶药水里黄黑相间的流体正自行旋转成漩涡状。

original:
Potion, Very Rare

When you drink this potion, it removes any &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] levels you have and ends the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition on you. For the next 24 hours, you regain the maximum number of Hit Points for any Hit Point Die you spend.

This potion’s crimson liquid regularly pulses with dull light, calling to mind a heartbeat.

Foundry Note

The Full of Vitality Active Effect can be used for tracking.
translation:
药水，极珍稀

当你饮下这瓶药水时，它将移除你具有的任何 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] 等级，并结束你的 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态。在接下来的 24 小时内，你消耗生命骰来恢复生命时将直接取用最大值。

这瓶药水的深红药液发出有节奏的微光，让人联想起心跳。

Foundry Note

活力充盈主动效应可用于进行状态跟进。

original:
Potion, Uncommon

You can breathe underwater for 24 hours after drinking this potion.

This potion’s cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

Foundry Note

The Water Breather Active Effect can be used for tracking.
translation:
药水，非普通

饮下这瓶药水后的 24 小时内，你可以在水下呼吸。

这瓶药水里的浑浊绿色流体闻起来像海水，其中漂浮着一个水母形状的气泡。

Foundry Note

水下呼吸主动效应可用于进行状态跟进。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This magic item replaces a lost limb—a hand, an arm, a foot, a leg, or a similar body part. While the prosthetic is attached, it functions identically to the part it replaces. You can detach or reattach it as a Magic action, and it can’t be removed against your will while you are alive.
translation:
奇物，普通

这件魔法物品能替代一处缺失的肢体——一只手，一条手臂，一条腿，或是类似的身体部位。在假肢已完成安装期间，它能像被代替的肢体一样正常工作。

你可以用一个魔法动作将其装好或者卸除，且只要你活着，它就不能在你非自愿的情况下被移除。

original:
Injury Poison

A creature subjected to Purple Worm Poison makes a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
translation:
损伤型毒药

受该毒药影响的生物需要进行一次DC 21 的体质豁免，豁免失败则受到 35（10d6）毒素伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

original: Permanently reduce your Intelligence or Wisdom by 1d4 + 1 (to a minimum score of 1). You can draw one additional card beyond your declared draws.
translation: 你的智力或感知永久降低 1d4 + 1 点（至多降低至 1 点）。你可以在声明的抽卡数量外再抽取一张卡牌。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Wondrous Item, Rarity Varies

This object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect. The DM chooses the kind of token or determines it randomly by rolling on the Quaal’s Feather Tokens table. The type of token determines its rarity.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgQuaalsFeather caption=false rollable]
translation:
奇物，多种稀有度

这枚物件看上去像一根羽毛。现存于世的羽符有许多种类，且每根都有不同的一次性效应。由DM选择或在夸尔羽符表中随机掷骰以决定饰品的种类。饰品的种类会决定其稀有度。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgQuaalsFeather caption=false rollable]

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon, See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]{Quaal's Feather Token}

You can take a Magic action to touch the token to a boat or ship. For the next 24 hours, the vessel can’t be moved by any means. Touching the token to the vessel again ends the effect. When the effect ends, the token disappears.
translation:
奇物，多种稀有度，参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]

你可以执行魔法动作来用羽符触碰一艘小艇或船只。接下来的 24 小时内，该船不会被任何方式移动。效应结束时，羽符也随之消失。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare, See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]{Quaal's Feather Token}

You can take a Magic action to toss the token 5 feet into the air. The token disappears and an enormous, multicolored bird takes its place. The bird has the statistics of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.p980augbCIdpK9ZX]{Roc}, but it can’t attack. It obeys your simple commands and can carry up to 500 pounds while flying at its maximum speed (16 miles per hour for a maximum of 144 miles per day, with a 1-hour rest for every 3 hours of flying) or 1,000 pounds at half that speed. The bird disappears after flying its maximum distance for a day or if it drops to 0 Hit Points. You can dismiss the bird as a Magic action.
translation:
奇物，多种稀有度，参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]

你可以执行魔法动作将羽符抛至 5 尺高的空中。羽符将消失，并且一只五彩斑斓的巨鸟取而代之。这只鸟使用@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.p980augbCIdpK9ZX]{鹏鸟}的数据，但它无法进行攻击。它会遵从你的简单命令且能在负载至多500磅的同时全速前进（16里/小时，每飞行 3 小时休息 1 小时，最高 144 里/日），或在负载至多 1000 磅的同时以半速前进。鸟将在达到其一日能飞行的最远距离或生命值降为 0 时消失。你也可以用魔法动作将其遣散。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon, See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]{Quaal's Feather Token}

If you are on a boat or ship, you can take a Magic action to toss the token up to 10 feet in the air. The token disappears, and a giant flapping fan takes its place. The fan floats and creates a strong wind. This wind can fill the sails of one ship, increasing its speed by 5 miles per hour for 8 hours. You can dismiss the fan as a Magic action.
translation:
奇物，多种稀有度，参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]

如果你在小艇或船只上，你可以执行魔法动作将羽符抛至 10 尺高的空中。羽符将消失，一把巨大的扇子取而代之。这把扇子会漂浮并制造一股强风。强风会吹满帆船的风帆，使其速度增加 5 里/小时，持续 8 小时。你可以执行魔法动作将扇子遣散。

original: This wind can fill the sails of one ship, increasing its speed by 5 miles per hour for 8 hours. You can dismiss the fan as a Magic action.
translation: 强风会吹满帆船的风帆，使其速度增加 5 里/小时，持续 8 小时。你可以执行魔法动作将扇子遣散。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare, See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]{Quaal's Feather Token}

You can take a Magic action to touch the token to a body of water at least 60 feet in diameter. The token disappears, and a 50-foot-long, 20-foot-wide boat shaped like a swan takes its place. The boat is self-propelled and moves across water at a speed of 6 miles per hour. You can take a Magic action while on the boat to command it to move or to turn up to 90 degrees. The boat remains for 24 hours and then disappears. You can dismiss the boat as a Magic action.
translation:
奇物，多种稀有度，参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]

你可以执行魔法动作来用羽符触碰直径至少 60 尺的水体。羽符将消失，并且一艘 50 尺长， 20 尺宽，形状类似天鹅的船取而代之。这艘船可以自行推进并以 6 英里/小时的速度穿越水体。在船上时，你可以执行魔法动作以命令它移动或转向最多 90 度。这艘船持续 24 小时，随后小时。你可以执行魔法动作遣散这艘船。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon, See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]{Quaal's Feather Token}

You must be outdoors to use this token. You can take a Magic action to touch it to an unoccupied space on the ground. The token disappears, and in its place a nonmagical oak tree springs into existence. The tree is 60 feet tall and has a 5-foot-diameter trunk, and its branches at the top spread out in a 20-foot radius.
translation:
奇物，多种稀有度，参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]

要使用这枚羽符，你必须身处室外。你可以执行魔法动作来用羽符触碰地面上的未占据空间。羽符将消失，取而代之的是该地长出一棵非魔法性的橡树。这棵树高 60 尺，树干直径 5 尺，顶端的树冠以 20 尺半径向外延伸。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare, See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]{Quaal's Feather Token}

You can take a Magic action to throw the token to a point within 10 feet of yourself. The token disappears, and a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgqftFloatingWh]{floating whip} takes its place. You can then take a Bonus Action to make a melee spell attack against a creature within 10 feet of the whip, with an attack bonus of +9. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 + 5 Force damage.

As a Bonus Action, you can direct the whip to fly up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 10 feet of the whip. The whip disappears after 1 hour, when you take a Magic action to dismiss it, or when you die or have the Incapacitated condition.
translation:
奇物，多种稀有度，参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgQuaalsFeather]

你可以执行魔法动作将羽符扔向位于你 10 尺内的一点。羽符消失，取而代之的是一根@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgqftFloatingWh]{漂浮的鞭子}。然后你可以用附赠动作对鞭子 10 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击（攻击加值 +9）。命中时，目标受到 1d6 + 5 力场伤害。

以一个附赠动作，你可以命令鞭子飞行至多20尺并再次攻击其10尺内的一个生物。鞭子将在经过一小时、你执行魔法动作将其遣散、你死亡或陷入失能状态后消失。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff}), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

You have a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

While holding this weapon, you can cause it to emit green Dim Light out to 10 feet, either as a Bonus Action or after you roll Initiative, or you can extinguish the light as a Bonus Action.

While holding this weapon, you can take a Bonus Action to alter its form, turning it into a 6-inch rod (for ease of storage) or a 10-foot pole, or reverting it a Quarterstaff; the weapon will elongate only as far as the surrounding space allows.

In certain forms, the weapon has the following additional properties.

Acrobatic Assist (Quarterstaff or 10-Foot Pole Forms Only). While holding this weapon, you have Advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks.

Attack Deflection (Quarterstaff Form Only). When you are hit by an attack while holding the weapon, you can take a Reaction to twirl the weapon around you, gaining a +5 bonus to your Armor Class against the triggering attack, potentially causing the attack to miss you. You can’t use this property again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.

Ranged Weapon (Quarterstaff Form Only). This weapon has the Thrown property with a normal range of 30 feet and a long range of 120 feet. Immediately after you make a ranged attack with the weapon, it flies back to your hand.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]），极珍稀（需同调）

你以此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰具有 +2 加值。

持握此武器期间，你可以在骰先攻后令该长棍散发出 10 尺微光光照。你也可以用一个附赠动作使其散发出同样的光照，或使该光照熄灭。

持握此武器期间，你可以用一个附赠动作转化其形态，将其变为一根 6 寸短杆（为便于储存）或一根 10 尺长杆，又或者将其恢复至一根长棍。此武器至多只能伸长至其周围空间所允许的长度。

在相应形态下，此武器具有以下额外词条：

援助特技（仅限长棍和10尺长杆形态）。 持握此武器期间，你在敏捷（特技）检定上具有优势。

偏斜攻击（仅限长棍形态）。 若你在持握此武器期间被一次攻击命中，你可以用一个反应让武器盘绕于己身，使你针对触发此反应的攻击中护甲等级 +5，这可能导致该攻击变为未命中。该词条在你完成一次短休或长休前无法再次使用。

远程武器（仅限长棍形态）。此武器具有投掷（30/120）词条。你以此武器进行一次远程攻击之后，它会立即飞回你的手中。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgQuicksandPit0]{Quicksand Pit}

A quicksand pit is 10 feet deep and covers the ground in a 10-foot square. A creature that enters the area sinks [[/r 1d4 + 1]] feet into the quicksand and has the &Reference[Restrained] condition. At the start of each of the creature’s turns, it sinks another [[/r 1d4]] feet. As long as the creature isn’t completely submerged in quicksand, it can take an action to try to escape, doing so with a successful Strength (Athletics) check (DC 10 plus the number of feet the creature has sunk into the quicksand). A creature that is completely submerged in quicksand has &Reference[Total Cover] and the &Reference[Blinded] condition and risks suffocation.

A creature can pull another creature within its reach out of a quicksand pit by taking an action and succeeding on a Strength (Athletics) check (DC 5 plus the number of feet the creature has sunk into the quicksand).

At Higher Levels. You can scale this hazard for higher levels by making the pit deeper and increasing the number of feet a creature sinks at the start of each of its turns, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Pit Depth

Sinking Rate

5–10

15 feet

[[/r 1d6]] feet

11–16

20 feet

[[/r 1d8]] feet

17–20

30 feet

[[/r 1d10]] feet

Foundry Note

The Escape Check and Pull Another Creature Out activities allows you to enter the number of feet the creature has sunk and will increase the DC automatically.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgQuicksandPit0]{流沙陷坑}

一处流沙陷坑有 10 尺深，覆盖 10 尺方形范围的地面。进入区域的生物会在流沙内下陷 [[/r 1d4 + 1]] 尺，并陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态。在该生物每回合开始时，将再次下陷 [[/r 1d4]] 尺。只要生物没有完全被流沙吞没，它就能用一个动作尝试逃脱，进行一次力量（运动）检定（DC为 10 加上生物陷入流沙的英尺数），检定成功则脱困。完全被流沙吞没的生物将陷入 &Reference[Total Cover] 和 &Reference[Blinded] 状态，并有窒息的风险。

生物可以将其触及内的另一位生物拉出流沙陷坑，这需要救援者用其动作进行一次成功的运动（力量）检定（DC为 5 加上生物陷入流沙的英尺数）。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过加深陷坑深度和提高每回合生物下陷的英尺数来提高对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级范围

陷坑深度

下陷速度

5–10

15 尺

[[/r 1d6]] 尺

11–16

20 尺

[[/r 1d8]] 尺

17–20

30 尺

[[/r 1d10]] 尺

Foundry Note

逃脱检定和拉出另一生物行动允许输入生物下沉的尺数，系统会自动提高难度等级。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

Each of the quiver’s three compartments connects to an extradimensional space that allows the quiver to hold numerous items while never weighing more than 2 pounds. The shortest compartment can hold up to 60 Arrows, Bolts, or similar objects. The midsize compartment holds up to 18 Javelins or similar objects. The longest compartment holds up to 6 long objects, such as bows, Quarterstaffs, or Spears.

You can draw any item the quiver contains as if doing so from a regular quiver or scabbard.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这个箭袋有三个大小不一的隔层，每个隔层都连接着一个异次元空间。无论其中存放着多少东西，箭袋的总重量都永远都不会超过 2 磅。最小的隔层可以容纳至多 60 支箭、弩矢或类似的物件；中等大小的隔层可以容纳至多 18 支标枪或类似的物件；最大的隔层可以容纳至多 6 件长条型的物件，例如弓、法杖、矛等。

你可以如同从普通的箭袋或剑鞘中抽出物品一般抽出艾罗娜箭袋中的物品。

original:
Large Object

Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 100

Ram (Requires Position). Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 16 (3d10) Bludgeoning damage.

A Ram consists of a movable gallery equipped with a heavy log suspended from two roof beams by chains. The log is shod in iron and used to batter through doors and barricades. Positioning a Ram requires three Utilize actions. Then a crew member can use the Ram action.

The gallery roof gives the operators &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects from above.

Foundry Note

This item has 3 limited uses for tracking positioning.

The Position activity grants one use so after three uses you can use the Ram activity.
translation:
大型物件

AC: 15 HP: 100

攻城槌（需要校准）.

近战攻击： +8，触及 5 尺。

命中： 16（3d10）钝击伤害。

攻城槌的底座是一个可移动的框架，一根粗原木作为其主体，用铁链装架在两个带盖顶的横梁上。原木前端镶裱着铁皮外壳，用以击穿大门与路障。校准攻城槌需要三次操作动作，随后操作手便可执行攻城槌动作。

攻城槌的顶盖使其对来自上方的攻击和其它效应具有 &Reference[Total Cover] 。

Foundry Note

此物品有 3 次跟进校准的有限使用次数。

“校准 Position” 行动可给予一次物品使用次数，所以使用三次后，您就可以使用 “冲撞 Ram” 行动了。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgRazorvine0000]{Razorvine}

Razorvine is a plant that grows in wild tangles and hedges. It also clings to the sides of buildings and other surfaces as ivy does. A 10-foot-high, 10-foot-wide, 5-foot-thick wall or hedge of razorvine has AC 11; HP 25; and Immunity to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Psychic damage.

When a creature comes into contact with razorvine for the first time on a turn, the creature must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 5 (1d10) Slashing damage from the bladelike thorns.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgRazorvine0000]{利刃藤}

利刃藤是一种生长在野外丛林和灌木丛中的植物。它还可以像常春藤一样，附着在建筑物和其它表面上。一块 10 尺高，10 尺宽，5 尺厚的利刃藤墙或利刃藤篱笆拥有AC 11，25 点生命值，对钝击、穿刺和心灵伤害具有免疫。

生物在一回合内第一次接触利刃藤时，该生物必须成功通过一次DC 10 的敏捷豁免，否则将被其刀锋般的荆棘划伤而受到5（1d10）点挥砍伤害。

original: After spending a Long Rest in your Bastion, you gain a magical Charm (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]{Supernatural Gifts}) that lasts for 7 days or until you use it. The Charm allows you to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} once without expending a spell slot or using Material components. You can’t gain this Charm again while you still have it.
translation: 当你在据点内完成一次长休后，你获得一个魔法护咒（见第 3 章 “@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50] ”一节），该护咒持续 7 天或持续至你将其使用为止。该护咒允许你施展一次@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]，无需消耗法术位也无需材料成分。你无法在已拥有该护咒时再次获得它。

original:
Reload (6 shots)

Foundry Note

This item includes a max use of 6 for ammunition tracking. The Reload activities can be used to reset that amount.
translation:
弹容（6 发）

Foundry Note

此物品包含用于弹药跟进的 6 次使用次数。装填行动可将该次数重置回最大值。

original:
Ring, Rare

This ring has 3 charges, and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can expend 1 charge to cast one of the following spells (save DC 13) from it:

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFear000000]{Fear} (affects Beasts only)
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithA]{Speak with Animals}
translation:
戒指，珍稀

这枚戒指具有 3 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d3 已消耗的充能。着装此戒指期间，你可以消耗 1 充能，从中施展以下法术之一（豁免DC13）：

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFear000000]（只影响野兽）
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithA]

key: entries->Ring of Animal Influence->activities->Fear (Affects Beasts Only)->name

original:
Ring, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this ring, you can take a Magic action to summon a particular @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.5P1VGAZQwOilwZQf]{Djinni} from the Elemental Plane of Air. The djinni appears in an unoccupied space you choose within 120 feet of yourself. It remains as long as you maintain Concentration, to a maximum of 1 hour, or until it drops to 0 Hit Points.

While summoned, the djinni is Friendly to you and your allies, and it obeys your commands. If you fail to command it, the djinni defends itself against attackers but takes no other actions.

After the djinni departs, it can’t be summoned again for 24 hours, and the ring becomes nonmagical if the djinni dies.

Rings of Djinni Summoning are often created by the djinn they summon and given to mortals as gifts of friendship or tokens of esteem.
translation:
戒指，传说（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你能够以一个魔法动作从气元素位面召唤一名特定的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.5P1VGAZQwOilwZQf]{气巨灵}。该气巨灵将出现在位于你 120 尺内你选择的未占据空间中。只要你为之维持专注，气巨灵将持续存在，至多 1 小时，或在其生命值降至0时提前消失。

被召唤期间，气巨灵对你和你的盟友态度友好，并将服从你的命令。如果你没有下达命令，则它除在遭受攻击时自卫外不会执行任何动作。

气巨灵消失后，24 小时内你都无法再次召唤它，若该气巨灵死亡，此戒指变为非魔法的。

召唤气巨灵戒指通常由戒指所召唤的气巨灵制造，用来作为友谊或尊重的象征赠予凡人。

original:
Ring, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

Each Ring of Elemental Command is linked to one of the four Elemental Planes. The DM chooses or randomly determines the linked plane. For example, a Ring of Elemental Command (air) is linked to the Elemental Plane of Air.

Every Ring of Elemental Command has the following two properties:

Elemental Bane. While wearing the ring, you have Advantage on attack rolls against Elementals and they have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Elemental Compulsion. While wearing the ring, you can take a Magic action to try to compel an Elemental you see within 60 feet of yourself. The Elemental makes a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the Elemental has the Charmed condition until the start your next turn, and you determine what it does with its move and action on its next turn.

Elemental Focus. While wearing the ring, you benefit from additional properties corresponding to the ring’s linked Elemental Plane:

Air. You know Auran, you have Resistance to Lightning damage, and you have a Fly Speed equal to your Speed and can hover.

Earth. You know Terran, and you have Resistance to Acid damage. Terrain composed of rubble, rocks, or dirt isn’t Difficult Terrain for you. In addition, you can move through solid earth or rock as if those areas were Difficult Terrain without disturbing the matter through which you pass. If you end your turn in solid earth or rock, you are shunted out to the nearest unoccupied space you last occupied.

Fire. You know Ignan, and you have Immunity to Fire damage.

Water. You know Aquan, you gain a Swim Speed of 60 feet, and you can breathe underwater.

Spellcasting. The ring has 5 charges and regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can cast a spell from it. Choose the spell from the list of available spells based on the Elemental Plane the ring is linked to, as shown in the following table. The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell, which has a save DC of 18.

Plane

Spells (Charges)

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAirRingOfElem]{Air Ring}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChainLight]{Chain Lightning} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeatherFal]{Feather Fall} (0 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWindWall00]{Wind Wall} (1 charge)

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEarthRingOfEl]{Earth Ring}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEarthquake]{Earthquake} (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneShape]{Stone Shape} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneskin0]{Stoneskin} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofSton]{Wall of Stone} (3 charges)

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFireRingOfEle]{Fire Ring}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBurningHan]{Burning Hands} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireStorm0]{Fire Storm} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire} (3 charges)

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgWaterRingOfEl]{Water Ring}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCreateorDe]{Create or Destroy Water} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIceStorm00]{Ice Storm} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTsunami000]{Tsunami} (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{Wall of Ice} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterWalk0]{Water Walk} (2 charges)
translation:
戒指，传说（需同调）

每枚命令元素戒指都连接着四个元素位面之一。由DM选择或随机决定连接着的位面。例如，一枚命令元素戒指（气）连接着气元素位面。

每枚命令元素戒指都具有以下两种词条：

元素灾厄。 着装戒指期间，你对元素的攻击检定具有优势，且元素对你的攻击具有劣势。

元素强令。 着装戒指期间，你可以执行魔法动作来尝试强迫一个可见的，位于你 60 尺内的元素服从于你。该元素进行一次DC18的感知豁免。豁免失败时，该元素直到你的下个回合开始前陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态，且你决定其下一回合他将使用移动和动作做什么。

元素集中。 着装戒指期间，你受益于与该戒指连接的元素位面对应的额外词条：

气。 你懂气族语，你对闪电伤害具有抗性，你获得等于你的速度的飞行速度并且可以悬浮。

土。 你懂土族语，你对强酸伤害具有抗性。你无视因碎石,岩石或泥土造成的困难地形。此外，你可以在固态土地或岩石内部穿行，如同它们是困难地形一般，且不会影响你所穿过的物质。如果你在固态土地或岩石中结束你的回合，你会被推回你先前所处的最近的未占据空间。

火。 你懂火族语，你对火焰伤害具有免疫。

水。 你懂水族语，你获得 60 尺游泳速度并且可以在水下呼吸。

施法。 这枚戒指具有 5 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d4 + 1 已消耗的充能。着装戒指期间，你可以从中施展法术。根据戒指连接的元素位面，从以下表格中选择对应的法术，施展相应法术所需的充能数如该表所示，法术的豁免DC为 18。

位面

法术（充能数）

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgAirRingOfElem]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChainLight] (3 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeatherFal] (0 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind] (2 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWindWall00] (1 充能)

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEarthRingOfEl]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEarthquake] (5 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneShape] (2 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStoneskin0] (3 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofSton] (3 充能)

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFireRingOfEle]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBurningHan] (1 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00] (2 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireStorm0] (4 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire] (3 充能)

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgWaterRingOfEl]

original:
Ring, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This ring has 3 charges, and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. When you fail a Dexterity saving throw while wearing the ring, you can take a Reaction to expend 1 charge to succeed on that save instead.
translation:
戒指，珍稀（需同调）

这枚戒指具有 3 充能，且在每日黎明时恢复 1d3 已消耗的充能。着装戒指期间，当你敏捷豁免失败时，你可以执行反应以消耗 1 充能，来让该豁免改为成功。

original:
Ring, Rare (Requires Attunement)

When you fall while wearing this ring, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling.
translation:
戒指，珍稀（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你在坠落时每轮只会下落 60 尺且不会受到坠落伤害。

original:
Ring, Rare (Requires Attunement)

While you wear this ring, &Reference[Difficult Terrain] doesn’t cost you extra movement. In addition, magic can neither reduce any of your Speeds nor cause you to have the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] or &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.
translation:
戒指，珍稀（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你不会因 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]而损耗额外的移动力。此外，魔法不能减少你的任何速度，也不能使你陷入&Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 或&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态。

original:
Ring, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this ring, you can take a Magic action to give yourself the &Reference[Invisible] condition. You remain Invisible until the ring is removed or until you take a Bonus Action to become visible again.
translation:
戒指，传说（需同调）

佩戴这枚戒指期间，以一个动作，你可以让自己化为 &Reference[Invisible]。任何你着装或携带的东西也将随你隐形。你的隐形持续直至你发动攻击、施展法术、戒指被摘下、或用一个附赠动作主动解除为止。

original:
Ring, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this ring, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplJump000000]{Jump} from it, but can target only yourself when you do so.
translation:
戒指，传说（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你能够以一个魔法动作令自己获得 &Reference[Invisible]状态。隐形持续至戒指被摘下或你以一个附赠动作显形。

original:
Ring, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this ring, you are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts, determine whether you are lying, know your alignment, or know your creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with you only if you allow it.

You can take a Magic action to cause the ring to become imperceptible until you take another Magic action to make it perceptible, until you remove the ring, or until you die.

If you die while wearing the ring, your soul enters it, unless it already houses a soul. You can remain in the ring or depart for the afterlife. As long as your soul is in the ring, you can telepathically communicate with any creature wearing it. A wearer can’t prevent this telepathic communication.
translation:
戒指，非普通（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你免疫能让其他生物阅读你的思想、辨别你在说谎、知晓你阵营或生物类型的魔法。只有在你允许时，生物才能与你进行心灵感应交流。

你可以执行魔法动作来让戒指变的无法被察觉，持续至你脱下戒指、死亡或执行另一个魔法动作使其可被察觉为止。

如果你在着装戒指期间死亡，你的灵魂将进入戒指中，除非其内已寄宿着其他灵魂。你可以留在戒指内或奔向来世。只要你的灵魂处在戒指中，你就可以与着装它的任何生物进行心灵感应交流。着装者无法阻止这种心灵感应交流。

original:
Ring, Rare (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class and saving throws while wearing this ring.
translation:
戒指，珍稀（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你在护甲等级和豁免中获得 +1 加值。

original:
Ring, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this ring, you regain 1d6 Hit Points every 10 minutes if you have at least 1 Hit Point. If you lose a body part, the ring causes the missing part to regrow and return to full functionality after [[/r 1d6 + 1]] days if you have at least 1 Hit Point the whole time.

Foundry Note

The Heal activity allows you to enter the number of 10 minute increments that have passed and will automatically scale the healing formula. For example, if it's been an hour, you can enter 6 and it will roll 6d6.
translation:
戒指，极珍稀（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，如果你至少拥有 1 生命值，则你每 10 分钟恢复 1d6 生命值。如果你失去了一部分肢体，这枚戒指会失去的部位自行再生。只要你在 [[/r 1d6 + 1]] 天的时间里全程保有至少 1 生命值，该部位就会在这段时间后恢复原有的功能。

Foundry Note

使用治疗行动可输入经过的 10 分钟单位数，系统将自动等比缩放治疗公式。例如：若经过 1 小时，输入 6 后系统将自动投掷 6d6。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgsupRingofResi]{Ring}, Rare

You have Resistance to one damage type while wearing this ring. The gemstone in the ring indicates the type, which the DM chooses or determines randomly by rolling on the following table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRingOfResista rollable caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgsupRingofResi]，珍稀

着装此戒指期间，你具有一种伤害类型的抗性。可通过戒指中上的宝石判断其对应的伤害类型，具体类型由DM选择或在下表中掷骰以随机决定。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRingOfResista rollable caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original:
Ring, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

You can cast Dancing Lights or Light from the ring.

The ring has 6 charges and regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn. You can expend its charges to use the properties below.

Faerie Fire. You can expend 1 charge to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire} from the ring.

Lightning Spheres. You can expend 2 charges as a Magic action to create up to four 3-foot-diameter spheres of lightning.

Each sphere appears in an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of yourself. The spheres last as long as you maintain Concentration, up to 1 minute. Each sphere sheds Dim Light in a 30-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move each sphere up to 30 feet, but no farther than 120 feet away from yourself. The first time the sphere comes within 5 feet of a creature other than you that isn’t behind &Reference[Total Cover apply=false], the sphere discharges lightning at that creature and disappears. That creature makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes Lightning damage based on the number of spheres you created, as shown in the following table. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

Number of Spheres

Lightning Damage
1[[/damage 4d12 lightning]]
3[[/damage 2d6 lightning]]
2[[/damage 5d4 lightning]]
4[[/damage 2d4 lightning]]

Shooting Stars. You can expend 1 to 3 charges as a Magic action. For every charge you expend, you launch a glowing mote of light from the ring at a point you can see within 60 feet of yourself. Each creature in a 15-foot Cube originating from that point is showered in sparks and makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d4 Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Foundry Note

The Create Lightning Spheres and Shooting Stars activities allow you to select the the number of spheres/motes you would like to create and places a measured template for each one.
translation:
戒指，极珍稀（需同调）

你可以从戒指中施展舞光术或光亮术。

这枚戒指具有 6 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d3 已消耗的充能。你可以消耗充能以使用以下词条。

妖火。 你可以消耗 1 充能以从戒指中施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]。

球状闪电。 你可以消耗 2 充能，以一个魔法动作创造至多四个3尺直径的闪电球体。

每个球体都出现于 120 尺内你可见的未占据空间中。只要你为它们维持专注，球体就能持续存在至多 1 分钟。每个球体都会散发出半径 30 尺的微光光照。

以一个附赠动作，你可以移动每个球体至多 30 尺，但球体和你的距离不得超过 120 尺。球体初次进入一个除你以外的，未处于全身掩护后的生物 5 尺内时，球体对那个生物放出闪电并消失。该生物进行一次DC 15 的敏捷豁免。豁免失败时，生物受到基于你创造出的球体数量的闪电伤害，如下表所示。豁免成功时，生物受到的伤害减半。

球体数量

 闪电伤害
1 [[/damage 4d12 lightning]]
3 [[/damage 2d6 lightning]]
2 [[/damage 5d4 lightning]]
4 [[/damage 2d4 lightning]]

流星。 以一个魔法动作 ，你可以消耗1至3充能。每一发你消耗的充能都会变为一粒发光尘埃，从戒指处向着你 60 尺内的一点发射。以该点为源点，15 尺立方区域内的所有生物将沐浴在火花之中，并进行一次DC 15 的敏捷豁免，失败则受到 5d4 点光耀伤害，成功则伤害减半。

Foundry Note

通过创造球状闪电与流星行动，可选取拟生成球体/流星的数量，系统将为每个单位自动部署测量模板。

key: entries->Ring of Shooting Stars->activities->Create Lightning Spheres->name
entries->Ring of Shooting Stars->activities->Lightning Sphere Save->name

original:
Ring, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This ring stores spells cast into it, holding them until the attuned wearer uses them. The ring can store up to 5 levels worth of spells at a time. When found, it contains [[/r 1d6 − 1]] levels of stored spells chosen by the DM.

Any creature can cast a spell of level 1 through 5 into the ring by touching the ring as the spell is cast. The spell has no effect other than to be stored in the ring. If the ring can’t hold the spell, the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.

While wearing this ring, you can cast any spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original caster but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the ring is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.

Foundry Note

To store a spell in this ring, drag the spell onto the Activities tab to create a "Cast a Spell" activity. Then change to the "Spell" tab, set the "Casting Level", check the "Override Values" box and enter the relevant Attack Bonus and Save DC from the original caster's values. You will then be able to cast that spell from this ring without expending your own slots. You will then need to delete the activity since each spell is a one-time use.
translation:
戒指，珍稀（需同调）

这枚戒指会储存对其施展的法术，将它们储存起来，直至同调的着装者使用。这枚戒指同时可以储存环阶总和最多为 5 的法术。被发现时，戒指中已储存了由DM选择的共[[/r 1d6 − 1]]环阶的法术。

任何生物都可以向戒指内存入一至五环的法术，这需要施法者在施法的同时触碰该戒指。此时法术会被储存进戒指，不产生任何其他效果。如果戒指无法承载这道法术，则法术会被消耗并不产生任何效果。施展法术时使用的法术位决定其占用戒指中的多少空间。

着装此戒指期间，你可以施展任何其中储存的法术。这道法术使用原施法者的环阶，法术豁免DC，法术攻击加值与施法属性，但其他方面将如同你施展了法术一般处理。戒指中的法术一经施展即消失，释放它原本占用的空间。

Foundry Note

若要将法术存入此戒指，将法术拖至“行动组合”标签页以创建“施法”行动。然后切换至“法术”标签页，设定“施法环阶”，勾选“覆盖数值”框，并输入原施法者数值中的相关攻击加值和豁免 DC 值。这样你就能从这枚戒指施展该法术，而无需消耗你自己的法术位。之后你需要删除该行动，因为每个法术都是一次性使用的。

original:
Ring, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this ring, you have Advantage on saving throws against spells. If you succeed on the save for a spell of level 7 or lower, the spell has no effect on you. If that spell targeted only you and didn’t create an area of effect, you can take a Reaction to deflect the spell back at the spell’s caster; the caster must make a saving throw against the spell using their own spell save DC.
translation:
戒指，传说（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你为对抗法术所进行的豁免具有优势。若你对抗不超过 7 环的法术进行的豁免检定成功，该法术将不会对你产生任何效应；若该法术仅以你为目标且不会创造区域效应，你能够以反应将该法术朝其施法者反弹回去。原施法者必须进行一次豁免检定对抗该法术，该豁免使用原施法者自己的法术豁免DC。

original:
Ring, Uncommon

You have a Swim Speed of 40 feet while wearing this ring.
translation:
戒指，非普通

着装此戒指期间，你获得 40 尺游泳速度。

original:
Ring, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this ring, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis} from it.
translation:
戒指，极珍稀（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你可以从中施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]。

original:
Ring, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This ring has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 to 3 charges to make a ranged spell attack against one creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself. The ring produces a spectral ram’s head and makes its attack roll with a +7 bonus. On a hit, for each charge you spend, the target takes 2d10 Force damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.

Alternatively, you can expend 1 to 3 of the ring’s charges as a Magic action to try to break a nonmagical object you can see within 60 feet of yourself that isn’t being worn or carried. The ring makes a Strength check with a +5 bonus for each charge you spend.
translation:
戒指，珍稀（需同调）

这枚戒指具有 3 充能，且在每日黎明时重获 1d3 已消耗的充能。着装此戒指期间，你可以执行魔法动作并消耗 1 至 3 充能，对 60 尺内的一个可见生物进行一次远程法术攻击。戒指创造出一个灵体公羊脑袋并进行具有 +7 加值的攻击检定。命中时，你每消耗 1 充能，目标就会受到 2d10 点力场伤害并且从你的方向被推离 5 尺。

作为另一种用法，你可以执行魔法动作并消耗 1 至 3 充能，以尝试破坏一件 60 尺内你可见且未被着装或携带的非魔法性的物体。戒指将进行力量检定，你每消耗 1 充能，此检定便具有 +5 加值。

original:
Ring, Legendary

While wearing this ring, you can expend 1 of its 3 charges to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} from it. The ring becomes nonmagical when you use the last charge.
translation:
戒指，传说

这枚戒指具有3充能；着装此戒指期间，你可以消耗1充能，从中施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]。充能耗尽时，此戒指变为非魔法的。

original:
Ring, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

If you take Cold damage while wearing this ring, the ring reduces the damage you take by [[/r 2d8]].

In addition, while wearing this ring, you and everything you wear and carry are unharmed by temperatures of 0 degrees Fahrenheit or lower.
translation:
戒指，非普通（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，当你受到寒冷伤害时，戒指将你所受的伤害减少 [[/r 2d8]]。

此外，着装此戒指期间，你以及你着装和携带的任何东西都不会被 0 华氏度及以下的温度所伤害。

original:
Ring, Uncommon

While wearing this ring, you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterWalk0]{Water Walk} from it, targeting only yourself.
translation:
戒指，非普通

着装此戒指期间，你可以从中施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterWalk0] ，但目标只能为自身。

original:
Ring, Rare (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this ring, you can take a Magic action to gain X-ray vision with a range of 30 feet for 1 minute. To you, solid objects within that radius appear transparent and don’t prevent light from passing through them. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, or up to 3 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances or a thin sheet of lead block the vision.

Whenever you use the ring again before taking a Long Rest, you must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 &Reference[Exhaustion] level.
translation:
戒指，珍稀（需同调）

着装此戒指期间，你可以执行魔法动作以获得范围 30 尺的X射线视觉，持续 1 分钟。对你来说，半径内的固态物件变为透明，并且不会阻碍光线通过。这种视觉可以穿透 1 尺厚的石头，1 寸厚的常见金属或最多 3 尺厚的木头或泥土。更厚的物质或一张薄铅片会阻挡这种视觉。

每当你在完成一次长休前再次使用这枚戒指时，你必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免，否则获得 1 级 &Reference[Exhaustion]。

key: entries->Ring of X-ray Vision->activities->Gain X-Ray Vision->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This gold coin has a creature embossed on each side. The two depicted creatures must be famous rivals or enemies of each other. For example, a Rival Coin might show Iggwilv on one side and Mordenkainen on the other, or Venger on one side and Tiamat on the other. One of these figures is on the “heads” side of the coin, the other on the “tails” side.

The coin has 1 charge and regains its expended charge daily at dawn. You can take a Magic action to toss the coin, expending its charge. Roll any die ([[/r 1d2]]) to determine whether the coin comes up heads (on an even number) or tails (on an odd number). The roll also determines the effect:

Heads. Target one creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself. The target makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 2d4 Psychic damage and has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Tails. You take 1d4 Psychic damage.
translation:
奇物，普通

这枚金币的两面均饰有一个生物的浮雕。这两个被描绘的生物必须为彼此知名的对手或敌人。例如，一枚劲敌硬币的一面可能是伊格薇尔伏，而另一面是魔邓肯；或者一面是温格尔，另一面是提亚马特。其中一个人物在硬币的正面，另一个在反面。

这枚硬币具有 1 充能，并在每日黎明时重获已消耗的充能。你可以使用一个魔法动作抛掷这枚硬币，并消耗其充能。掷一枚任意骰子([[/r1d2]])来确定硬币是正面朝上（若结果为偶数）还是反面朝上（若结果为奇数）。此结果决定了硬币产生的效应：

正面。以位于你 60 尺内一个你可见的生物为目标。目标进行一次DC13 的感知豁免：如果豁免失败，目标会受到 2d4 心灵伤害，并在其下一回合结束前进行的下一次攻击检定中具有劣势；豁免成功则目标仅受半伤。

反面。你受到 1d4 心灵伤害。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 11–16)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgRiverStyx0000]{River Styx}

The River Styx courses through the Lower Planes. Tasting or touching its waters can shatter a creature’s intellect and personality, as well as strip away its memories. Certain Fiends are immune to the river’s effects.

Unless immune to the river’s effects, a creature that drinks from the Styx, enters the river, or starts its turn in the river makes a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 19 (3d12) Psychic damage and can’t cast spells or take the Magic action for 30 days. An affected creature can drink from the Styx and swim in its waters without suffering any additional effects.

The effect can be ended only by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell. If the effect isn’t ended after 30 days, the effect becomes permanent, and the creature loses all its memories. At that point, nothing short of a Wish spell or divine intervention can undo the effect.

Water taken from the River Styx loses its potency after 24 hours, becoming a harmless, foul-tasting liquid. Arcanaloths, night hags, and other fell creatures might know rituals that can prolong the water's potency, at your discretion.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级11-16）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgRiverStyx0000]{冥河}

冥河流经下层位面。品尝或接触其河水将摧毁生物的理智和个性，同时剥夺其记忆。某些邪魔免疫冥河的效果。

从冥河中饮水、走入河水或在河水中开始其回合的生物必须进行一次DC 20 的智力豁免，除非该生物免疫冥河的效果。豁免失败时，生物受到 19（3d12）点心灵伤害，并且在接下来的 30 天内无法施放法术或执行魔法动作。已经受到冥河效果影响的生物可以自由饮用河水或在河水中游泳，不会受到额外的影响。

这一效应只能被 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000], 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000] 所终止。如果此效应在 30 天内没有被终止，它将转化为永久效应，受影响的生物则会失去所有记忆。到了这种程度后，只有 祈愿术 和神圣干预才能将其解除。

从冥河中取出的水，在 24 小时后会失去其效力，成为无害的、有腐烂味道的液体。奥登罗斯魔，夜鬼婆和其它邪恶生物可能知晓延长冥河水效力的仪式，这由你决定。

original:
The creature can’t cast spells or take the Magic action for 30 days. An affected creature can drink from the Styx and swim in its waters without suffering any additional effects.

The effect can be ended only by the Greater Restoration, Heal, or Wish spell. If the effect isn’t ended after 30 days, the effect becomes permanent, and the creature loses all its memories. At that point, nothing short of a Wish spell or divine intervention can undo the effect.
translation:
生物在接下来的30天内无法施放法术或执行魔法动作。已经受到冥河效果影响的生物可以自由饮用河水或在河水中游泳，不会受到额外的影响。

这一效应只能被 高等复原术, 医疗术, 或 祈愿术所终止。如果此效应在 30 天内没有被终止，它将转化为永久效应，受影响的生物则会失去所有记忆。到了这种程度后，只有 祈愿术 和神圣干预才能将其解除。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This robe is adorned with eyelike patterns. While you wear the robe, you gain the following benefits:

All-Around Vision. The robe gives you Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Special Senses. You have Darkvision and Truesight, both with a range of 120 feet.

Drawbacks. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light} spell cast on the robe or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00]{Daylight} spell cast within 5 feet of the robe gives you the &Reference[Blinded] condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of your turns, you make a Constitution saving throw (DC 11 for Light or DC 15 for Daylight), ending the condition on yourself on a success.
translation:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

这件长袍上绘满了眼睛的图案。着装这件长袍期间，你获得以下增益：

全域视野。你在依赖视觉的感知（察觉）检定中具有优势。

特殊感官。你具有120尺的黑暗视觉和真实视觉。

缺点。对法袍施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]或在其周围5尺内施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDaylight00] 将使你陷入&Reference[Blinded]，持续 1 分钟。在你的每个回合结束时，你可以进行一次体质豁免（对光亮术时DC为 11，对昼明术时DC为 15），成功则终止你身上的该效应。

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

This robe has 3 charges, and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While you wear it, you can take a Magic action and expend 1 charge to cause the garment to display a shifting pattern of dazzling hues until the end of your next turn. During this time, the robe sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet, and creatures that can see you have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. Any creature in the Bright Light that can see you when the robe’s power is activated must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the Stunned condition until the effect ends.

Foundry Note

The Display Dazzling Hues activity includes a measured template which can be used for tracking the area of Bright Light.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀（需同调）

这件长袍具有 3 充能，并每日黎明时重获 1d3 已消耗的充能。着装这件长袍期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作并消耗 1 充能，让长袍不断变幻出各种耀眼的色彩图案，持续至你的下个回合结束。在此期间，长袍提供 30 尺明亮光照和额外30尺微光光照，能看到你的生物对你发动的攻击检定具有劣势。此外，长袍效应启用期间，任何处于长袍产生的明亮光照区域内且可以看到你的生物必须进行一次DC 15 的感知豁免，豁免失败则陷入震慑状态，直到长袍的效应终止。

Foundry Note

变换耀眼色彩行动包含一个测量模板，可用于跟进明亮光照的区域。

key: entries->Robe of Scintillating Colors->activities->Display Dazzling Hues->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

This black or dark-blue robe is embroidered with small white or silver stars. You gain a +1 bonus to saving throws while you wear it.

Six stars, located on the robe’s upper-front portion, are particularly large. While wearing this robe, you can take a Magic action to remove one of the stars and expend it to cast the level 5 version of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}. Daily at dusk, 1d6 removed stars reappear on the robe.

While you wear the robe, you can take a Magic action to enter the Astral Plane along with everything you are wearing and carrying. You remain there until you take a Magic action to return to the plane you were on. You reappear in the last space you occupied or, if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.

Foundry Note

The Enter/Exit Astral Plane activity includes a 5 foot measured template that can be used to mark where you exited the Astral Plane for tracking.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀（需同调）

这件黑色或深蓝色的长袍上点缀着白色或银色的星星。着装这件长袍期间，你的豁免具有 +1 加值。

法袍的前襟附近有六枚较大的星星。着装这件长袍期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作消耗其中一颗星星，以此施展五环版本的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]。每日黄昏时分，1d6 颗被消耗的星星将重新出现在法袍上。

着装这件长袍期间，你可以用一个魔法动作使你和你着装或携带的物件一起进入星界，直至你再次使用一个魔法动作回到你原本所在的位面。此时你出现在自己之前占据的空间中，如果该空间已被占据，则你出现在最近的未占据空间。

Foundry Note

进出星光位面行动包含一个 5 尺的测量模板，可用于标记你离开星光位面的位置，以便跟进。

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary (Requires Attunement by a Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard)

This elegant garment is made from exquisite cloth and adorned with runes.

You gain these benefits while wearing the robe.

Armor. If you aren’t wearing armor, your base Armor Class is 15 plus your Dexterity modifier.

Magic Resistance. You have Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

War Mage. Your spell save DC and spell attack bonus each increase by 2.

Foundry Note

The Archmagi Armor Active Effect sets your AC and should be disabled if you're still wearing armor.

The War Mage Active Effect automatically increases you spell save and attack bonus increases.
translation:
奇物，传说（需术士、魔契师或法师同调）

这件典雅的长袍由精美的布料制成，并以符文装饰。

着装此长袍时，你获得下列增益：

护甲。若你未着装护甲，你的基础护甲等级为15+你的敏捷调整值。

魔法抗性。 你对抗法术和其他魔法效应进行的豁免检定具有优势。

战争法师。 你的法术豁免DC和法术攻击加值均提升2。

Foundry Note

大法师护甲主动效应将设定你的护甲等级（AC），若你仍着装护甲则应禁用该效应。

战争法师主动效应会自动提升你的法术豁免DC与法术攻击加值。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This robe has cloth patches of various shapes and colors covering it. While wearing the robe, you can take a Magic action to detach one of the patches, causing it to become the object or creature it represents. Once the last patch is removed, the robe becomes an ordinary garment.

The robe has two of each of the following patches:

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.KZUoiZrigDbovEu7]{Bullseye Lantern} (filled and lit)
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Dagger}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000]{Mirror}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPole0000000]{Pole}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.x8jC9e00t4cUYiKR]{Rope} (coiled)
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagSack0000000]{Sack}

In addition, the robe has [[/r 4d4]] other patches. The DM chooses the patches or determines them randomly by rolling on the following table.

Table

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRobeOfUsefulI rollable]

Foundry Note

This item includes activities for each of the always present patches above which include limited uses for tracking how many are left. They can be duplicated and renamed for the additional patches after rolling for the results.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这件长袍上打着各种颜色和形状的补丁。着装这件长袍期间，你可以使用一个魔法动作拆下其中一块补丁，使其变成它所代表的物件或生物。当长袍上的所有补丁都被拆下后，它将变为一件平凡的衣物。

杂货法袍有着如下补丁各两个：

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLanternBull]（装满燃料且点燃）
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000]
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPole0000000]
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.x8jC9e00t4cUYiKR] （盘绕着的）
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagSack0000000]

此外，杂货法袍还有 [[/r 4d4]] 个其他补丁。由DM选择补丁种类或通过在下表中掷骰以随机决定补丁种类。

表格

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRobeOfUsefulI rollable]

Foundry Note

该物品上的补丁中的每个补丁均设有专属行动，包含用于跟进剩余次数的有限使用次数。完成效果投掷后，可通过复制并重命名这些行动来适配新增补丁。

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgRockslide0000]{Rockslide}

When a rockslide occurs, every creature in its path makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 11 (2d10) Bludgeoning damage, has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition, and moves with the rockslide. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

When the rockslide stops, its space becomes &Reference[Difficult Terrain], and all Prone creatures in its space are buried under rocks and debris. A creature buried in this way has the &Reference[Restrained] condition and has &Reference[Total Cover]. As an action, a creature can try to crawl out from under the rock pile. If the creature succeeds on a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check, it is no longer Restrained; instead, it has the Prone condition and is atop the rock pile. If the check fails, the creature remains buried and gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion] level.

A creature that has neither the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] nor the Restrained condition can spend 1 minute freeing another creature buried by the rockslide.

At Higher Levels. You can scale this hazard for higher levels by increasing the Bludgeoning damage as follows: 22 (4d10) at levels 5–10, 55 (10d10) at levels 11–16, and 99 (18d10) at levels 17–20.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgRockslide0000]{岩崩 Rockslide}

当岩崩发生时，每个处于其路径上的生物必须进行一次DC15的敏捷豁免。豁免失败时，生物受到11（2d10）点钝击伤害 ，并且陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态，随着岩崩移动。豁免成功则生物仅受半伤。

当岩崩停下后，其占据空间变为 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]，所有倒地于其中的生物都会被石头和碎片所掩埋。以此法被掩埋其中的生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，并获得 &Reference[Total Cover]。以一个动作，生物可以尝试从石堆中爬出来：如果该生物成功通过一次DC15的力量（运动）检定，它将不再被束缚，而是来到石堆的表面，同时陷入倒地状态；如果检定失败，该生物依旧被掩埋，且获得1级 &Reference[Exhaustion]。

一个没有处于 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 和束缚状态的生物可以花费一分钟，救出被岩崩掩埋的另一个生物。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提高钝击伤害来提高这一危害所对应的等级范围，按照如此：5-10 级范围受到22（4d10）点伤害，11-16 级范围受到55（10d10）点伤害，17-20 级范围受到99（18d10）点伤害。

original:
Rod, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

While holding this rod, you can take a Reaction to absorb a spell that is targeting only you and doesn’t create an area of effect. The absorbed spell’s effect is canceled, and the spell’s energy—not the spell itself—is stored in the rod. The energy has the same level as the spell when it was cast. A canceled spell dissipates with no effect, and any resources used to cast it are wasted. The rod can absorb and store up to 50 levels of energy over the course of its existence. Once the rod absorbs 50 levels of energy, it can’t absorb more. If you are targeted by a spell that the rod can’t store, the rod has no effect on that spell.

When you become attuned to the rod, you know how many levels of energy the rod has absorbed over the course of its existence and how many levels of spell energy it currently has stored.

If you are a spellcaster holding the rod, you can convert energy stored in it into spell slots to cast spells you have prepared or know. You can create spell slots only of a level equal to or lower than your own spell slots, up to a maximum of level 5. You use the stored levels in place of your slots but otherwise cast the spell as normal. For example, you can use 3 levels stored in the rod as a level 3 spell slot.

A newly found rod typically has [[/r 1d10]] levels of spell energy stored in it. A rod that can no longer absorb spell energy and has no energy remaining becomes nonmagical.

Available: You can track the amount of available energy here.

Foundry Note

This item has a max of 50 uses for tracking the total energy absorbed. You can roll 1d10 and update the expended uses and the Available energy in the description above as desired.

The Absorb Spell activity allows you to select the spell level you're absorbing and expends a number of uses. You should then manually update the Available amount of energy in the description above.

The Restore Slot activity allows you to restore a spell slot. You should then manually update the Available amount of energy in the description above.
translation:
权杖，极珍稀（需同调）

持握这根权杖期间，你可以执行反应来吸收一道仅以你为目标且不会创造范围效应的法术。被吸收的法术将被解除，且法术的能量（而非法术本身）将被储存进权杖中。这些能量与该法术施展时的环阶相同。被解除的法术消散且无效，而施展法术时使用的任何资源都将浪费掉。这根权杖在其被制造出来后最多能吸收并储存共计 50 环的能量。当权杖已经吸收了 50 环的能量后，它将无法再吸收法术。如果你被一道权杖无法储存的法术所选为目标，那么权杖将不会对其产生影响。

当你与权杖同调时，你会知晓权杖已经吸收过多少环的能量，以及它当前储存了多少环的法术能量。

持握此权杖期间，如果你是一名施法者，则你可以将权杖中储存的能量转化为法术位并用其施展你已准备的法术或已知的法术。此法可转化出的法术位其环阶不超过你拥有的最高法术位环阶，且最高为五环。你需要如常施展该法术，只是你消耗的是权杖储存的法术能量而非自己的法术位。例如，你可以将权杖储存的3环能量作为一个3环法术位使用。

新发现的吸收权杖通常已经储存了 [[/r 1d10]] 环的法术能量。一根无法再吸收法术且其中没有剩余能量的吸收权杖将变为非魔法的权杖。

可用能量：您可在此跟进当前可用能量储备量。

Foundry Note

该物品最多可记录 50 次能量吸收充能。您可随时投掷 1d10，并根据需要更新上方描述中的已消耗次数与可用能量数值。

吸收法术行动允许选择吸收的法术环阶，此操作将消耗对应次数的充能。完成操作后请手动更新上方描述中的可用能量数值。

恢复法术位行动可重新激活已消耗的法术位。完成操作后请手动更新上方描述中的可用能量数值。

original:
Rod, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

This rod has the following properties.

Alertness. While holding the rod, you have Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on Initiative rolls.

Spells. While holding the rod, you can cast the following spells from it: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Mzh95utKDPIrjiH8]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectPois]{Detect Poison and Disease}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSeeInvisib]{See Invisibility}.

Protective Aura. As a Magic action, you can plant the haft end of the rod in the ground, whereupon the rod’s head sheds Bright Light in a 60-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 60 feet. While in that Bright Light, you and your allies gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class and saving throws and can sense the location of any Invisible creature that is also in the Bright Light.

The rod’s head stops glowing and the effect ends after 10 minutes or when a creature takes a Magic action to pull the rod from the ground. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Foundry Note

The Plant Rod activity can be used to place a 60 foot template representing the Bright Light radius. It includes an Active Effect which can be applied to the relevant Actors and adds the +1 bonus to AC and Saving Throws.
translation:
权杖，极珍稀（需同调）

这根权杖具有以下词条：

警觉。 持握这根权杖期间，你的感知（察觉）检定和先攻检定具有优势。

法术。 当持握这根权杖时，你可以从中施展以下法术：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Mzh95utKDPIrjiH8], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectPois], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSeeInvisib]。

防护灵光。 以一个魔法动作，你可以将权杖的柄端插入地面，此时权杖的顶部将发出 60 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 60 尺微光光照。身处权杖发出的明亮光照中时，你与你的盟友在护甲等级和豁免中获得 +1 加值，并且可以感知到同样处于此明亮光照中的任何隐形生物的位置。

最多 10 分钟后或直至一个生物执行魔法动作将权杖从地面拔出后，权杖顶部会停止发光并结束这个效应。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明前你都无法再次使用。

Foundry Note

插入权杖行动可放置 60 尺范围的明亮光照测量模板，该行动包含可作用于相关角色的主动效应，为其防御等级(AC)及豁免检定提供 +1 加值。

original:
Rod, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

This rod has a flanged head, and it functions as a magic Mace that grants a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with it. The rod has properties associated with six different buttons that are set in a row along the haft. It has three other properties as well, detailed below.

Buttons. You can press one of the following buttons as a Bonus Action; a button’s effect lasts until you push a different button or until you push the same button again, which causes the rod to revert to its normal form:

Button Effects

Button 1. A fiery blade sprouts from the end opposite the rod’s flanged head. The flames shed Bright Light in a 40-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 40 feet, and the blade functions as a magic Longsword or Shortsword (your choice) that deals an extra 2d6 Fire damage on a hit.

Button 2. The rod’s flanged head folds down and two crescent-shaped blades spring out, transforming the rod into a magic Battleaxe that grants a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with it.

Button 3. The rod’s flanged head folds down, a spear point springs from the rod’s tip, and the rod’s handle lengthens into a 6-foot haft, transforming the rod into a magic Spear that grants a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with it.

Button 4. The rod transforms into a climbing pole up to 50 feet long (you specify the length), though the rod’s buttons remain within your reach. In surfaces as hard as granite, a spike at the bottom and three hooks at the top anchor the pole. Horizontal bars 3 inches long fold out from the sides, 1 foot apart, forming a ladder. The pole can bear up to 4,000 pounds. More weight or lack of solid anchoring causes the rod to revert to its normal form.

Button 5. The rod transforms into a handheld battering ram and grants its user a +10 bonus to Strength (Athletics) checks made to break through doors, barricades, and other barriers.

Button 6. The rod assumes or remains in its normal form and indicates magnetic north. (Nothing happens if this function of the rod is used in a location that has no magnetic north.) The rod also gives you knowledge of your approximate depth beneath the ground or your height above it.

Drain Life. When you hit a creature with a melee attack using the rod, you can force the target to make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes an extra 4d6 Necrotic damage, and you regain a number of Hit Points equal to half that Necrotic damage. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Paralyze. When you hit a creature with a melee attack using the rod, you can force the target to make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition for 1 minute. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Terrify. While holding the rod, you can take a Magic action to force each creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute. A Frightened target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Foundry Note

An activity has been added for each usable button that implements the attack with the relevant bonuses.

The properties are also implemented as activities and track their own uses per dawn.
translation:
权杖，传说（需同调）

这把权杖顶端有尖刺状凸起，其可以被用作一把魔法硬头锤。你用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得+3加值。王者权杖的杖柄上排列着六个不同的按钮，用来启动权杖的相应属性，它还有三个额外词条。词条的描述见下文：

按钮。 你能够以一个附赠动作按压下列按钮之一。按钮的效应将持续生效，直至你按压另一个按钮或再次按压同一个按钮。再次按压同一个按钮将使权杖变回通常形态。

按钮效应

按钮1。 烈焰覆盖的刀刃从权杖凸缘的另一端伸出。火焰发出半径40尺的明亮光照以及额外40尺的微光光照，剑刃可以被用作一柄魔法长剑或短剑（由你选择），命中时额外造成2d6火焰伤害

按钮2。 权杖凸缘头向下折叠，弹出两片月牙状斧刃，这使得权杖变为一柄魔法战斧。你用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值。

按钮3。 权杖凸缘头向下折叠，杖柄顶端弹出矛尖，杖柄伸长至 6 尺，将权杖变为一把魔法矛。你用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值。

按钮4。 权杖将变为一根至多 50 尺长的爬杆（长度由你指定），但权杖的按钮仍在你触及内。在花岗岩一般坚硬的表面上，爬杆尾部的岩钉和顶部的三个爪钩可以固定住爬杆。爬杆上每隔 1 尺向侧面伸展出一根 3 寸长的水平杆，构成一架梯子。爬杆最多可以承受 4000 磅的重量。如果超重或是失去固定点，则爬杆将会变回权杖。

按钮5。 权杖将变为一把手持式攻城锤。用它破坏门、路障或其他障碍时，持用者进行的力量（运动）检定获得 +10 加值。

按钮6。 权杖将变回或维持通常形态，并指出地磁北极。（如果权杖所在的地点并没有地磁北极的概念，则此功能无效。）权杖还会让你了解到自己在地下的大致深度或在地上的高度。

吸取生命。 当你以权杖发动的近战攻击命中一名生物时，你可以迫使目标进行一次DC 17 的体质豁免。豁免失败则目标额外受到 4d6 暗蚀伤害，而你恢复等于此暗蚀伤害值一半的生命值。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。

麻痹。 当你以权杖发动的近战攻击命中一名生物时，你可以迫使目标进行一次DC17的体质豁免。豁免失败则目标陷入&Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，持续 1 分钟。目标在其每回合结束时都可以重新豁免，豁免成功则结束该效应。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。

惊惧。 持握此权杖期间，你能够以一个魔法动作迫使位于你 30 尺内你可见的每名生物进行一次DC 17 的感知豁免。豁免失败则目标将陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，持续 1 分钟。陷入恐慌状态的目标在其每回合结束时都可以重新豁免，豁免成功则结束其身上的该效应。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。

Foundry Note

所有交互按钮均已配置独立行动，可执行附带对应加值的攻击动作。

物品属性实现为行动，配置独立充能计数器(按每日黎明周期重置)。

key: entries->Rod of Lordly Might->activities->Button 2 Versatile Attack->name

original:
Rod, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

The rod has 5 charges. While you hold it, you can cast one of the following spells from it: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftHealer00000]{Heal} (expends 1 charge) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplResurrecti]{Resurrection} (expends 5 charges).

The rod regains 1 expended charge daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the rod disappears in a harmless burst of radiance.
translation:
权杖，传说（需同调）

此权杖具有 5 充能。持握权杖期间，你可以从中施展以下法术之一：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftHealer00000]（消耗 1 充能）或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplResurrecti]（消耗 5 充能）。

权杖在每日黎明时重获 1 已消耗的充能。当权杖充能耗尽时，投掷 1d20。若结果为 1，则权杖在一阵无害的光芒中消失。

original:
Rod, Rare (Requires Attunement)

You can take a Magic action to present the rod and command obedience from each creature of your choice that you can see within 120 feet of yourself. Each target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for 8 hours. While Charmed in this way, the creature regards you as its trusted leader. If harmed by you or your allies or commanded to do something contrary to its nature, a target ceases to be Charmed in this way. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.
translation:
权杖，珍稀（需同调）

你可以执行魔法动作来展示这根权杖，并向你可见的，周身 120 尺内你所指定的每个生物下令服从于你。每个目标必须通过一次DC 15 的感知豁免，否则陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态 8 小时。在以这种方式被魅惑期间，生物将视你为值得托付信赖的领袖。如果你或你的盟友伤害了目标，或命令目标去做违反其天性的行为时，以此法造成的魅惑将终止。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明前你都无法再次使用。

original:
Rod, Very Rare

While holding this rod, you can take a Magic action to activate it. The rod then instantly transports you and up to 199 other willing creatures you can see to a demiplane. You choose the form the demiplane takes. It could be a tranquil garden, a cheery tavern, an immense palace, a tropical island, a fantastic carnival, or whatever else you can imagine. Regardless of its nature, the demiplane contains enough water and food to sustain its visitors, and the demiplane's environment can't harm its occupants. Everything else that can be interacted with there can exist only there. For example, a flower picked from a garden there disappears if it is taken outside the demiplane.

For each hour spent in the demiplane, a visitor regains Hit Points as if it had spent 1 Hit Point Die. Also, creatures don't age while there, although time passes normally. Visitors can remain there for up to 200 days divided by the number of creatures present (round down).

When the time runs out or you take a Magic action to end the effect, all visitors reappear in the location they occupied when you activated the rod or an unoccupied space nearest that location. Once used, this property can't be used again until 10 days have passed.

Foundry Note

The Transport to Demiplane activity will consume a use of this item but the ten day recovery period must be tracked manually.
translation:
权杖，极珍稀

当持握这根权杖时，你可以执行魔法动作来激活它。权杖会立刻将你和你可见的至多199名自愿生物传送入一个半位面。你选择半位面所呈现的形式。它可以是宁静的花园、热闹的酒馆、宏伟的宫殿、热带岛屿、梦幻般的嘉年华，或者任何你能想象的场景。无论性质如何，这个半位面有足够的食物和水供访客享用，并且半位面的任何环境都无法伤害到其中的居住者们。此处一切可交互的事物都只能存在于该半位面中。例如，把半位面中花园里摘的花带出半位面时，该花将消失。

在半位面里每度过一个小时，访客们都能如同花费了 1 个生命骰一般地恢复生命值。并且尽管半位面中时间将正常流动，但其中的生物不会变老。访客们可以在此停留最多 200 除以生物数量的天数（向下取整）。

当停留时间耗尽或你执行魔法动作以结束该效应时，所有访客都会重新出现在权杖激活前的位置或该位置最近的未占据的空间里。该词条被使用后，直至过去 10 天时间才能再次使用。

Foundry Note

半位面传送行动将消耗本物品 1 次使用次数，但十日恢复周期需手动记录。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcRod0000000]{Rod}, Uncommon (+1), Rare (+2), or Very Rare (+3) (Requires Attunement by a Warlock)

While holding this rod, you gain a bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your Warlock spells. The bonus is determined by the rod’s rarity.

In addition, you can regain one spell slot as a Magic action while holding the rod. You can’t use this property again until you finish a Long Rest.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcRod0000000]，非普通（+1），珍稀（+2），极珍稀（+3）（需魔契师同调）

当持握这根权杖时，你的魔契师法术的法术攻击检定和豁免DC获得加值。加值大小取决于权杖的稀有度。

此外，持握这根权杖期间，你能够以一个魔法动作恢复一个法术位。该词条一经使用，你在完成一次长休后都无法再次使用。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
