original:
Deadly Trap (Levels 11–16) or Nuisance Trap (Levels 17–20)

Trigger: A creature moves onto a pressure plate

Duration: Until the stone stops rolling

When a creature moves onto a hidden pressure plate, a 5-foot-radius orb of solid stone is released from a secret compartment and begins to roll. The stone and all creatures nearby roll Initiative; the stone gets a [[/r 1d20 + 8]]{+8} bonus on its Initiative roll.

On its turn, the stone moves 60 feet in one direction, changing course if redirected by an obstacle. The stone can move through creatures’ spaces, and creatures can move through the stone’s space, treating it as &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. Whenever the stone enters a creature’s space for the first time on a turn or a creature enters the stone’s space while the stone is rolling, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 55 (10d10) Bludgeoning damage and have the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

The stone stops when it hits a wall or similar barrier. It can’t go around corners, but creative dungeon builders incorporate curving turns into nearby passages that allow the stone to keep moving.

Detect and Disarm. As a Study action, a creature can examine the section of floor that forms the pressure plate and make a [[/check inv 15]] check, deducing the pressure plate’s function on a successful check. Wedging an Iron Spike or a similar object under the pressure plate prevents the trap from triggering.

Destroy the Stone. The stone is a Large object that has AC 17, HP 100, a Damage Threshold of 10, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage.

Slow the Stone. As an action, a creature can try to slow down the stone with a DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check. If the check is successful, the distance the stone moves on its turn is reduced by 15 feet. If that distance drops to 0, it stops moving and is no longer a threat.
translation:
致命陷阱（11-16级）或妨碍陷阱（17-20级）

触发： 生物移动到压力板上时

持续时间： 直至石头停止滚动

当生物移动至隐藏的压力板上时，一颗巨大的实心石头从秘密隔间中落下并开始滚动，石头大小为5尺半径的球体。滚石与所有临近的生物投掷先攻；石头的先攻掷骰加值为 [[/r 1d20 + 8]]{+8}。

在其回合中，滚石向一个方向移动60尺，如遇障碍物则因此重定向，更改行动轨迹。滚石可以穿越生物所处的空间，而生物也可以穿越石头所处的空间，将其视为 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。滚石在一回合内初次进入生物所处的空间，或生物在其仍滚动时进入其所处的空间时，该生物必须通过DC 15 的敏捷豁免否则受到55（10d10）钝击伤害并陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

滚石在撞到墙壁或类似的屏障时停止。它无法沿着拐角行进，但有些精明的地城建造者会为其设计缓变的弯角，以让其保持滚动。

侦测与解除。 生物可以用搜索动作检查地板上构成压力板的部分并进行 [[/check inv 15]] 检定，成功则推测出压力板的功效。在压力板下插入铁钉或类似物件则可以阻止陷阱触发。

摧毁滚石。 滚石是一个大型物件，具有 AC 17，HP 100，伤害阈值为 10，并免疫毒素与心灵伤害。

减缓滚石。 以一个动作，生物可以尝试DC 20 的力量（运动）检定来让石头慢下来。如检定成功，滚石在自己回合的移动距离降低 15 尺。如果该距离降为 0，则滚石停止移动并不再构成威胁。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This 60-foot length of rope can hold up to 3,000 pounds. While holding one end of the rope, you can take a Magic action to command the other end of the rope to animate and move toward a destination you choose, up to the rope’s length away from you. That end moves 10 feet on your turn when you first command it and 10 feet at the start of each of your subsequent turns until reaching its destination or until you tell it to stop. You can also tell the rope to fasten itself securely to an object or to unfasten itself, to knot or unknot itself, or to coil itself for carrying.

If you tell the rope to knot, large knots appear at 1-foot intervals along the rope. While knotted, the rope shortens to a 50-foot length and grants Advantage on ability checks made to climb using the rope.

The rope has AC 20, HP 20, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. It regains 1 Hit Point every 5 minutes as long as it has at least 1 Hit Point. If the rope drops to 0 Hit Points, it is destroyed.

Foundry Note

The item includes 20 uses for tracking its HP. The Damage Rope activity can be used to apply damage and the Repair Rope activity can be used to restore its HP.
translation:
奇物，非普通

这根 60 尺长的绳索可承受 3000 磅的重量。当你持握这根绳索的一端时，你可以使用一个魔法动作命令绳索的另一端活化并向你指定的目的地移动，目的地与你的距离不能超过绳索的长度。在你第一次命令时，绳索末端会在你的回合内移动 10 尺，并在随后每个你的回合开始时移动 10 尺，直至到达目的地或直至你命令它停止。你也可以命令绳索将自身牢固系绑住一个物件或松绑，将自身打结或解结，或将自身盘卷以便携带。

如果你命令攀爬绳打结，绳索将每隔 1 尺打一个大结。打结将使绳索的长度缩短至50尺，但此时为用此绳索攀爬所进行的属性检定具有优势。

这根绳索具有AC 20、HP 20 以及毒素和心灵伤害免疫。只要绳索还剩至少 1 生命值，它就能每 5 分钟恢复 1 生命值。如果绳索的生命值降至 0，则它被摧毁。

Foundry Note

该物品包含20点用于跟进其生命值（HP）的使用次数。可通过损伤绳索行动施加伤害，或使用修复绳索行动恢复其生命值。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

This rope is 30 feet long. While holding one end of the rope, you can take a Magic action to command the other end to dart forward and entangle one creature you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. You can release the target by letting go of your end of the rope (causing the rope to coil up in the target’s space) or by using a Bonus Action to repeat the command (causing the rope to coil up in your hand).

A target Restrained by the rope can take an action to make its choice of a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. On a successful check, the target is no longer Restrained by the rope. If you’re still holding onto the rope when a target escapes from it, you can take a Reaction to command the rope to coil up in your hand; otherwise, the rope coils up in the target’s space.

The rope has AC 20, HP 20, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. It regains 1 Hit Point every 5 minutes as long as it has at least 1 Hit Point. If the rope drops to 0 Hit Points, it is destroyed.

Foundry Note

The item includes 20 uses for tracking its HP. The Damage Rope activity can be used to apply damage and the Repair Rope activity can be used to restore its HP.

The Escape activity can be used to send an Athletics and Dexterity check to the chat for the target to roll for their escape.
translation:
奇物，珍稀

这根绳索长30尺。当你持握这根绳索的一端时，你可以使用一个魔法动作命令其另一端向前疾冲并缠住位于你 20 尺内一个你可见的生物。目标必须成功通过一次 DC 15 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败则其陷入束缚 状态。你可以通过松开绳索的一端（使绳索盘绕着掉落在目标的空间）或使用一个附赠动作 重复命令（使绳索回到你手中并盘绕起来）来释放目标。

一个被绳索束缚的目标可以使用一个动作进行一次DC 15 的力量（运动）或敏捷（特技）检定。若检定成功，目标不再被绳索束缚。如果目标逃脱时你仍然持握着绳索，则你可以使用一个反应命令绳索回到你手中并盘绕起来；否则，绳索会盘绕着掉落在目标的空间中。

这根绳索具有AC 20、HP 20以及毒素和心灵伤害免疫。只要绳索还剩至少1生命值，它就能每5分钟恢复1生命值。如果绳索的生命值降至0，则它被摧毁。

Foundry Note

修复绳索行动可恢复其生命值。

逃脱行动可向聊天栏发送一项运动与敏捷检定，供目标生物进行逃脱检定。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This 50-foot coil of rope can repair itself when cut into any number of smaller pieces. As a Magic action, you can cause all pieces of the rope that are in contact with each other and not otherwise in use to knit back together. A Rope of Mending is forever shortened if a section of it is lost or destroyed.
translation:
奇物，普通

这根 50 尺长的绳索可以在被切成任意数量的小段后自行修复。以一个魔法动作，你可以让所有相互接触且当前并未以其他方式被使用的绳段重新结合在一起。如果其中一段修补绳丢失或被摧毁，则其长度将永远缩短。

original:
Wondrous Item, Common (Requires Attunement by a Spellcaster)

Etched with eldritch runes, this 1-inch-diameter ruby allows you to use a Simple or Martial weapon as a Spellcasting Focus for your spells. For this property to work, you must attach the ruby to the weapon by pressing the ruby against it for at least 10 minutes. Thereafter, the ruby can’t be removed unless you detach it as a Magic action, the weapon is destroyed, or your Attunement to the ruby ends.

Foundry Note

The Attach Ruby activity allows you to select a single Simple or Martial weapon and marks it as a Focus and appends " of the War Mage" to its name to ease tracking. You can send the Ruby of the War Mage again to see the enchanted item and, optionally, remove it.
translation:
奇物，普通（需施法者同调）

这枚直径 1 寸的红宝石上蚀刻着魔能符文。此红宝石允许你使用一把简易或军用武器作为你施展法术的法器。要使该词条生效，你必须将红宝石按压在该武器上至少 10 分钟，以此将其附着在武器上。随后，除非你使用一个魔法动作将其取下、武器被摧毁或你与红宝石的同调结束，否则红宝石将无法被移除。

Foundry Note

附魔红石行动允许你选择一件简易或军用武器，将其标记为法器，并在其名称后前缀“战法”以便辨析。你可以再次使用附魔红石行动来查看该附魔物品，并可选择将其移除。

key: entries->Ruby of the War Mage->activities->Attach Ruby->name
entries->Ruby of the War Mage->effects->Attached Ruby->name

original: All forms of wealth that you carry or own, other than magic items, are lost to you. Portable property vanishes. Businesses, buildings, and land you own are lost in a way that alters reality the least. If you have a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgBastions00000]{Bastion}, it is destroyed by some calamity beyond your control. Any documentation that proves you should own something lost to this card also disappears.
translation: 你失去除魔法物品外你持有或拥有的一切形式的财产。可动产将直接消失；在最低限度修改现实的前提下，你还将失去你拥有的所有生意、建筑和土地。若你拥有 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgBastions00000]（见第 8 章），它将被你无法控制的灾难摧毁。任何证明你应该拥有因此卡而丢失的财产的文件也将消失。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This bag made from gray, rust, or tan cloth appears empty. Reaching inside the bag, however, reveals the presence of a small, fuzzy object.

You can take a Magic action to pull the fuzzy object from the bag and throw it up to 20 feet. When the object lands, it transforms into a creature you determine by rolling on the table that corresponds to the bag’s color. See the Monster Manual for the creature’s stat block. The creature vanishes at the next dawn or when it is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

The creature is Friendly to you and your allies, and it acts immediately after you on your Initiative count. You can take a Bonus Action to command how the creature moves and what action it takes on its next turn, such as attacking an enemy. In the absence of such orders, the creature acts in a fashion appropriate to its nature.

Once three fuzzy objects have been pulled from the bag, the bag can’t be used again until the next dawn.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRustBagOfTric rollable]
translation:
奇物，非普通

这种布袋有三种不同颜色的版本：灰色、铁锈色、棕褐色。布袋看起来空无一物，但把手伸进去会摸到一个小小的毛绒物件。

你能够以一个魔法动作取出布袋里的毛绒物件，并把它扔出至多20尺远。当物件落地时，投骰子参考对应颜色布袋的表格决定物件变成的生物。相关生物的资料见怪物图鉴 Monster Manual 。该生物在次日黎明时分或者其生命值降至 0 时消失。

扔出的生物对你和你的盟友态度 友善，且会在你的回合结束后行动。你能够以一个附赠动作命令该生物在其下一回合执行特定的移动方式，做特定的动作，例如攻击你的敌人。没接到命令时，该生物按自己天性行动。

一旦袋子抽出三件毛绒物件后，直至次日黎明才可再次使用。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRustBagOfTric rollable]

key: entries->Rust Bag of Tricks->activities->Pull and Throw->name
entries->Rust Bag of Tricks->activities->Pull and Throw->chatFlavor
original: Transformed creature determined by DM or table roll
translation: 由DM决定或通过掷骰子来确定变成的生物

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This saddle confers the following benefits while you are seated in it and astride a mount.

Protected Mount. Attack rolls against the mount have Disadvantage.

Secure Rider. You can’t be dismounted against your will. This property is suppressed while you have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.
translation:
奇物, 非普通

在你骑乘配有这副鞍座的坐骑，并跨坐于此鞍座上期间，此鞍座会提供以下增益：

坐骑保护。 对坐骑进行的攻击检定具有劣势。

稳固骑手。 你不会在非自愿的情况下解除骑乘。此词条在你处于&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态期间失效。

original: At any time you choose within one year of drawing this card, you can ask a question in meditation and mentally receive a truthful answer to that question.
translation: 抽到此卡后一年内的任何时间，你可以在冥想中提出一个问题并在心灵中获得诚实的回答。

original: After spending a Long Rest in your Bastion, you gain a magical Charm (see @UUID[JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]{Supernatural Gifts}) that lasts for 7 days or until you use it. The Charm allows you to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word} once without expending a spell slot. You can’t gain this Charm again while you still have it.
translation: 当你在据点内完成一次长休后，你获得一个魔法护咒（见第三章“@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]”一节），该护咒持续 7 天或持续至你将其使用为止。该护咒允许你施展一次@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]，无需消耗法术位。你无法在已拥有该护咒时再次获得它。

original: After spending a Long Rest in your Bastion, you gain a magical Charm (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]{Supernatural Gifts}) that lasts for 7 days or until you use it. The Charm allows you to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal} once without expending a spell slot. You can’t gain this Charm again while you still have it.
translation: 当你在据点内完成一次长休后，你获得一个魔法护咒（见第三章 “@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]” 一节），该护咒持续 7 天或持续至你将其使用为止。该护咒允许你施展一次 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000] ，无需消耗法术位。你无法在已拥有该护咒时再次获得它。

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

This beetle-shaped medallion provides three benefits while it is on your person.

Defense. You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

Preservation. The scarab has 12 charges. If you fail a saving throw against a Necromancy spell or a harmful effect originating from an Undead, you can take a Reaction to expend 1 charge and turn the failed save into a successful one. The scarab crumbles into powder and is destroyed when its last charge is expended.

Spell Resistance. You have Advantage on saving throws against spells.
translation:
奇物，传说（需同调）

在你携带这枚甲虫形徽章于身上期间，它为你提供三项增益：

防御。 你的护甲等级获得 +1 加值。

保护。 圣甲虫具有12充能，如果你在对抗一道死灵系法术或亡灵造成的有害效应时豁免失败，你能够以反应消耗1充能，令此次豁免改为成功。充能耗尽时，圣甲虫将被摧毁并化为灰烬。

法术抗性。 你对法术进行的豁免具有优势。

original: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class and you have Advantage on saving throws against spells.
translation: 你的护甲等级获得 +1 加值且你对法术进行的豁免具有优势。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, you can make one attack with it as a Bonus Action on each of your turns.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]），极珍稀（需同调）

你用此魔法武器发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +2 加值。此外，你在自己的每个回合中可以用一个附赠动作以该弯刀发动一次攻击。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgsupBasicScrol]{Scroll}, Rare

Each Scroll of Protection works against creatures of a specific creature type chosen by the DM or determined by rolling on the following table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgScrollOfProte rollable caption=false]{Scroll of Protection: Creature Type}

Using a Magic action to read the scroll creates a 5-foot Emanation originating from you. For 5 minutes, creatures of the specified type can’t enter or affect anything in the area. However, if you move in such a way that a creature of the specified type would be inside the area, the effect ends.

As a Magic action, a creature within 5 feet of the Emanation can attempt to overcome it, which forces the creature to make a [[/save ability=cha dc=15 format=long]]. On a successful save, the creature ceases to be affected by the Emanation.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgsupBasicScrol]，珍稀

每张守护卷轴仅针对一种特定生物类型的生物起效。生物类型由DM直接指定或在下表中掷骰决定。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgScrollOfProte rollable caption=false]{守护卷轴：生物类型}

使用一个魔法动作 阅读这张卷轴会创建一个以你为源点的 5 尺光环。在 5 分钟内，指定类型的生物无法进入或影响该区域内的任何东西。但是，如果你移动的方式使得指定类型的生物进入到该区域，则效应结束。

一个位于光环外 5 尺范围的生物可以使用一个魔法动作来尝试克服它，这会迫使该生物进行一次 [[/save ability=cha dc=15 format=long]]豁免。若豁免成功，则该生物不再受这道光环的影响。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: For 5 minutes, creatures of the specified type can’t enter or affect anything in the area. However, if you move in such a way that a creature of the specified type would be inside the area, the effect ends.
translation: 在 5 分钟内，指定类型的生物无法进入或影响该区域内的任何东西。但是，如果你移动的方式使得指定类型的生物进入到该区域，则效应结束。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgsupBasicScrol]{Scroll}, Legendary

When you take a Magic action to read this scroll, a particular titan named in the scroll appears in an unoccupied space on the ground or in water that you can see within 1 mile of yourself. The DM picks a suitable titan or determines it randomly by rolling on the table below (see the Monster Manual for the creature’s stat block).

The titan is Hostile toward all other creatures and disappears when it drops to 0 Hit Points. If the titan is summoned into a space that isn’t large enough to contain it, the summoning fails, and the scroll is wasted.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgScrollOfTitan rollable caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgsupBasicScrol]，传说

当你以一个魔法动作阅读此卷轴时，卷轴指定的特定泰坦会显现在你1里内的地面或水里的未占据空间中。由DM选择合适的泰坦或根据下表随机决定（生物的数据见怪物图鉴）。

泰坦对其他所有生物态度敌对，并将在生命值降至 0 时消失。若泰坦被召唤到不足以容纳它的空间中，则召唤失败且卷轴被浪费。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgScrollOfTitan rollable caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: The titan is Hostile toward all other creatures and disappears when it drops to 0 Hit Points.
translation: 泰坦对其他所有生物态度敌对，并将在生命值降至0时消失。

entries->Scroll of Titan Summoning->effects->Scroll of Titan Summoning: Tarrasque->name
translation: 召唤泰坦卷轴：末日毁灭兽

original:
Reload (15 shots)

Foundry Note

This item includes a max use of 15 for ammunition tracking. The Reload activities can be used to reset that amount.
translation:
弹容（15 发）

Foundry Note

此物品包含用于弹药跟进的 15 次使用次数。装填行动可将该次数重置回最大值。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

Sending Stones come in pairs, with each stone carved to match the other so the pairing is easily recognized. While you touch one stone, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSending000]{Sending} from it. The target is the bearer of the other stone. If no creature bears the other stone, you know that fact as soon as you use the stone, and you don’t cast the spell.

Once Sending is cast using either stone, the stones can’t be used again until the next dawn. If one of the stones in a pair is destroyed, the other one becomes nonmagical.
translation:
奇物, 非普通

讯石两颗一对，这两块石头经过雕刻而相互匹配，因此它们的配对非常容易辨认。触摸其中一块传讯石期间，你可以用它施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSending000]，目标为另一块传讯石的携带者。如果另一块传讯石没有被任何生物携带，则你在使用传讯石时会得知这一情况，而短讯术将不会被施展。

一旦使用其中一块传讯石施展了短讯术，则两块传讯石直至次日黎明前都无法再次被使用。如果一块传讯石被摧毁，则与它配对的另一块石头也会失去其魔法。

original:
Armor (Shield), Uncommon

While holding this Shield, you have Advantage on Initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks. The Shield is emblazoned with a symbol of an eye.
translation:
护甲（盾牌）, 非普通

持握这面盾牌期间，你进行的先攻检定和感知（察觉）检定具有优势。这面盾牌上的纹章是一只眼睛的图案。

original:
Injury Poison

A creature subjected to Serpent Venom must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
translation:
损伤型毒药

受该毒药影响的生物必须成功通过一次DC 11 的体质豁免，否则将受到 10（3d6）毒素伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

original:
See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]{Figurine of Wondrous Power}

This serpentine statuette of an owl can become a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.VVXly3ue0i3YgGrB]{Giant Owl} for up to 8 hours. The owl can communicate telepathically with you at any range if you and it are on the same plane of existence. Once it has been used, it can’t be used again until 2 days have passed.

Foundry Note

This item's limited uses represent the 2 days required before the figurine can be used again.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]

这个蛇纹石鸮雕像可以变为一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.VVXly3ue0i3YgGrB]{巨猫头鹰} ，而其存在至多维持 8 小时。只要你和该猫头鹰在同一位面，它就可以和你通过心灵感应进行沟通。使用后，此雕像需要经过 2 日才能再次启动。

Foundry Note

此物品的使用次数有限，用于跟进需要 2 天的充能周期。

original:
Armor (Shield), Common

The front of this Shield is shaped in the likeness of a face. While bearing the Shield, you can take a Bonus Action to alter the face’s expression.
translation:
护甲（盾牌）, 普通

这面盾牌的正面呈现出一张脸的形状。携带这面盾牌期间，你可以使用一个附赠动作来改变这张脸的表情。

original:
Armor (Shield), Rare (Requires Attunement)

While holding this Shield, you have Resistance to damage from attacks made with Ranged weapons.

Curse. This Shield is cursed. Attuning to it curses you until you are targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse} spell or similar magic. Removing the Shield fails to end the curse on you. Whenever an attack with a Ranged weapon targets a creature within 10 feet of you, the curse causes you to become the target instead.
translation:
护甲（盾牌）, 珍稀（需同调）

持握这面盾牌期间，你对使用远程武器进行的攻击所造成的伤害具有抗性。

诅咒。 这面盾牌被诅咒了。与之同调会使你也被诅咒，直至你成为法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]或类似魔法的目标。每当使用远程武器进行的攻击以你 10 尺内一个生物为目标时，诅咒会使你代替该生物成为目标。

original:
Armor (Shield), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

While holding this Shield, you have a +2 bonus to Armor Class. This bonus is in addition to the Shield’s normal bonus to AC.

The Shield has the following additional properties that you can use while holding it.

Forceful Bash. When you take the Attack action, you can make one of the attack rolls using the Shield against a target within 5 feet of yourself. Apply your Proficiency Bonus and Strength modifier to the attack roll. On a hit, the Shield deals Force damage to the target equal to 2d6 + 2 plus your Strength modifier, and if the target is a creature, you can push it up to 10 feet directly away from yourself. If the creature is your size or smaller, you can also knock it down, giving it the Prone condition.

Protective Field. As a Reaction, when you or an ally you can see within 5 feet of you is targeted by an attack or makes a saving throw against an area of effect, you can use the Shield to create an immobile 5-foot Emanation originating from you. When the Emanation appears, any creatures or objects not fully contained within it are pushed into the nearest unoccupied spaces outside it. The attack or area of effect that triggered the Reaction has no effect on creatures and objects inside the Emanation, which lasts as long as you maintain Concentration, up to 1 minute. Nothing can pass into or out of the Emanation. A creature or object inside the Emanation can’t be damaged by attacks or effects originating from outside, nor can a creature inside the Emanation damage anything outside it. Once this property is used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.
translation:
护甲（盾牌）, 极珍稀（需同调）

持握这面盾牌期间，你的护甲等级获得 +2 加值。这是盾牌原本提供的AC加值外的额外加值。

持握这面盾牌期间，你可以使用以下额外词条。

强力猛击。 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以使用这面盾牌进行其中一次攻击，这次攻击的目标必须在你 5 尺之内。将你的熟练加值和力量调整值加入攻击检定。若命中，盾牌会对目标造成 2d6 + 2 + 你力量调整值的力场伤害，如果目标是生物，你可以将其推离至多 10 尺；如果该生物的体型与你相同或更小，你还可以同时将它击倒，使其陷入倒地状态。

庇护领域。 当你或 5 尺内你可见的一位盟友成为一次攻击的目标，或为一次区域效应进行豁免检定时，你可以用反应使这面盾牌制造一个以你为源点的无法移动的5尺光环。当光环出现时，任何未完全位于其中的生物或物件都会被推至光环外最近的未占据空间中。触发此反应的攻击或区域效应将无法影响到光环内的生物和物件。光环需要你为之维持专注 ，并持续最多一分钟。没有任何东西可以进出光环，光环内的生物和物件不会受到来自外部的攻击或效应的伤害，光环内的生物也无法伤害其外部的任何东西。此词条一经使用，直至次日黎明前你都无法再次使用。

original:
Armor (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}), Uncommon (+1), Rare (+2), or Very Rare (+3)

While holding this Shield, you have a bonus to Armor Class determined by the Shield’s rarity, in addition to the Shield’s normal bonus to AC.

护甲（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmShield0000]）, 非普通（+1）/珍稀（+2）/极珍稀（+3）

持握这面盾牌期间，除了盾牌原本提供的AC加值外，你还会获得额外的护甲等级加值，加值大小取决于盾牌的稀有度。

original: The short compartment can hold up to 60 Arrows, Bolts, or similar objects.
translation: 短隔层可收纳至多 60 件小型物品，例如箭、弩箭或类似物件。

original:
Reload (2 shots)

Foundry Note

This item includes a max use of 2 for ammunition tracking. The Reload activities can be used to reset that amount.
translation:
弹容（2 发）

Foundry Note

此物品包含用于弹药跟进的 2 次使用次数。装填行动可将该次数重置回最大值。

original:
Gargantuan Object

Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 200

A Siege Tower is a mobile wooden structure with a beam frame and slats in its walls. Large wooden wheels or rollers allow the tower to be pushed or pulled by soldiers or beasts of burden. Medium or smaller creatures can use the Siege Tower to reach the top of walls up to 40 feet high. A creature in the tower has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects that originate outside it.
translation:
超巨型物件

AC: 15 HP: 200

攻城塔是一种可移动的木质建筑，其主体由木梁作为框架，墙壁由木板铺成。塔底设置了大型的木轮或滚轴，让其可被士兵或负重牲畜推拉从而进行移动。中型或更小体型的生物可以使用攻城塔到达至多 40 尺高的城墙上。攻城塔内的生物对来自塔外的攻击与其它效应处于全掩护。

original:
See: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgHornofValhall]{Horn of Valhalla}

Requirement: None

Spirits: 2

You can take a Magic action to blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of you. Each spirit uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.kz1t6xeXVwODpYb2]{Berserker} stat block and returns to Ysgard after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 Hit Points. The spirits look like living, breathing warriors, and they have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions. Once you use the horn, it can’t be used again until 7 days have passed.

If you blow the horn without meeting its requirement, the summoned spirits attack you. If you meet the requirement, they are Friendly to you and your allies and follow your commands.
translation:
参见： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgHornofValhall]

条件：无

英灵：2

你可以用一个魔法动作吹响号角。作为回应，伊斯加德的武者英灵们将在你周围60尺内未占据的空间出现。这些英灵使用怪物图鉴上 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmBerserker00000] 的数据，它们将会在 1 小时之后或HP降低到 0 时返回伊斯加德。英灵们看起来就像是活着的，能够呼吸的战士，且它们免疫 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 和 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态。号角一经使用，需要经过 7 天才能再次使用。

如果你在不满足条件的情况下吹响了号角，召唤出的英灵们将攻击你。 如果你满足条件，他们会对你和你的盟友持友善态度，并听从你的命令。

key: entries->Silver Horn of Valhalla->effects->Horn of Valhalla: Condition Immunity->name
translation: 瓦尔哈拉号角：状态免疫

key: entries->Silver Horn of Valhalla->effects->Horn of Valhalla: Condition Immunity->description
original: The spirits look like living, breathing warriors, and they have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions.
translation: 英灵们看起来就像是活着的，能够呼吸的战士，且它们免疫 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 和 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态。

original:
See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]{Figurine of Wondrous Power}

This silver statuette of a raven can become a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRaven00000]{Raven} for up to 12 hours. Once it has been used, it can’t be used again until 2 days have passed. While in raven form, the figurine grants you the ability to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalMess]{Animal Messenger} on it.

Foundry Note

This item's limited uses represent the 2 days required before the figurine can be used again.
translation:
参见：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFigurineOfWon]

这个银制渡鸦雕像可以变为一只 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRaven00000] ，其存在至多维持 12 小时。使用后，此雕像需要经过 2 日才能再次启动。当雕像处于渡鸦形态期间，雕像的魔法令你可以对其随意施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalMess] 。

Foundry Note

此物品的使用次数有限，用于跟进需要 2 天的充能周期。

original: Can target only the Silver Raven
translation: 仅能选定白银渡鸦作为目标

original:
Weapon (Any Simple or Martial), Common

An alchemical process has bonded silver to this magic weapon. When you score a &Reference[criticalhits]{Critical Hit} with it against a creature that is shape-shifted, the weapon deals one additional die of damage.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（任意简易武器或军用武器），普通

这件魔法武器使用炼金工艺镀上了一层银。当你用该武器对一个变形的生物造成一次&Reference[criticalhits]{重击} 时，该武器令该次伤害在计算时额外掷一颗骰子。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgAvatarofDeath]{Avatar of Death} appears in an unoccupied space as close to you as possible. The avatar targets only you with its attacks, appearing as a ghostly skeleton clad in a tattered black robe and carrying a spectral scythe. The avatar disappears when it drops to 0 Hit Points or you die. If an ally of yours deals damage to the avatar, that ally summons another Avatar of Death . The new avatar appears in an unoccupied space as close to that ally as possible and targets only that ally with its attacks. You and your allies can each summon only one avatar as a consequence of this draw. A creature slain by an avatar can’t be restored to life.
translation: 一名 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgAvatarofDeath]{死亡化身} 出现在距你最近的未占据空间中。死亡化身是一名包裹破烂黑袍、手持幽灵镰刀的幽魂骷髅，它的攻击仅以你为目标。当其生命值降至 0 或你死亡时，化身消失。若你的盟友对死亡化身造成伤害，那名盟友将召唤出另一名死亡化身。新的化身出现在距那名盟友最近的未占据空间中，且它的攻击仅以那名盟友为目标。你和你的盟友每人只能因一次抽卡召唤出一名化身。被死亡化身杀死的生物无法复活。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While you wear these light shoes, you can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. You have a Climb Speed equal to your Speed. However, the slippers don’t allow you to move this way on a slippery surface, such as one covered by ice or oil.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

着装这双便鞋期间，不需要借助双手，你可以在垂直表面上站立与行走（包括上下左右），甚至可以以此倒立着悬挂在天花板上。你获得等同于你步行速度的攀爬速度。不过，这双鞋提供的攀爬速度无法用于滑溜的平面（如冰、油覆盖的平面）上。

Armor (Any Heavy, Medium, or Light), Common

Wisps of harmless, odorless smoke rise from this armor while it is worn.

translation:
护甲（任意重甲，中甲或轻甲）, 普通

这件护甲被着装期间，一缕缕无害无味的烟雾会不断从护甲中升起。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary

This viscous, milky-white substance can form a permanent adhesive bond between any two objects. It must be stored in a jar or flask that has been coated inside with @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgOilOfSlipperi]{Oil of Slipperiness}. When found, a container contains 1d6 + 1 ounces.

One ounce of the glue can cover a 1-foot square surface. Applying an ounce of Sovereign Glue takes a Utilize action, and the applied glue takes 1 minute to set. Once it has done so, the bond it creates can be broken only by the application of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgUniversalSolv]{Universal Solvent} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgOilOfEthereal]{Oil of Etherealness}, or with a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

Foundry Note

This item includes 7 limited uses. The Determine Ounces activity can be used to determine the number of ounces equivalent to 1d6 + 1.

The Apply Glue activity allows you to select the number of ounces you're applying.
translation:
奇物，传说

这种白浊粘稠的物质可以把任何两件物体永久性的粘在一起。至尊胶必须被储存在一个内壁涂满了@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgOilOfSlipperi]的瓶子或罐子中。新发现的这类容器中通常装有 1d6 + 1 盎司的至尊胶。

每盎司至尊胶可以覆盖 1 平方尺的表面，并在 1 分钟后凝固。一旦至尊胶凝固，被粘在一起东西就只能用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgUniversalSolv] 或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgOilOfEthereal] 或法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]才能分开。

Foundry Note

该物品包含 7 次有限使用次数。确定盎司行动可用于确定等效于 1d6 + 1 的盎司数值。

施用胶水行动允许你选择需要施用的盎司数值。

original:
Create Scrolls from Spells

You can easily create a Scroll for a Spell by right clicking on the spell and selecting the   Create Scroll option.

A Spell Scroll bears the words of a single spell, written in a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your spell list, you can read the scroll and cast its spell without Material components. Otherwise, the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell’s normal casting time. Once the spell is cast, the scroll crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupted, the scroll isn’t lost.

If the spell is on your spell list but of a higher level than you can normally cast, you make an ability check using your spellcasting ability to determine whether you cast the spell. The DC equals 10 plus the spell’s level. On a failed check, the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.

The level of the spell on the scroll determines the spell’s saving throw DC and attack bonus, as well as the scroll’s rarity, as shown in the following table.

Copying a Scroll into a Spellbook. A Wizard spell on a Spell Scroll can be copied into a spellbook. When a spell is copied in this way, the copier must succeed on an Intelligence (Arcana) check with a DC equal to 10 plus the spell’s level. On a successful check, the spell is copied. Whether the check succeeds or fails, the Spell Scroll is destroyed.
translation:
从法术上抄写卷轴

你可通过右键点击法术并选择 抄写卷轴选项，快速为其创建法术卷轴。

每张法术卷轴都以神秘暗语记录了一道法术。如果这道法术在你的法术列表中，则你可以阅读该卷轴并施展其法术且无需任何材料成分；否则，你将无法理解该卷轴。通过阅读卷轴施展的法术同样需要遵循相应法术的正常施法时间。法术一经施展，卷轴本身就会化作尘土。如果施法被打断，则卷轴不会消失。

如果这道法术在你的法术列表中，但其环阶高于你当前能施展的水平，则你必须使用你的施法属性进行一次属性检定，以决定是否可以施展这道法术，DC等于 10 + 这道法术的环阶。如果检定失败，则卷轴上记载的法术会消失，并且不会产生任何效果。

卷轴所记载法术的法术环阶决定了这道法术的豁免DC和攻击加值，以及卷轴的稀有度，如下表所示：

将卷轴抄录入法术书。 法术卷轴上的法师法术可以被抄录入法术书中。以此方式抄录法术时，抄录者必须进行一次DC等于 10 + 这道法术环阶的智力（奥秘）检定。检定成功时便能完成法术的抄录。无论检定成功与否，该法术卷轴都会被摧毁。

original:
Armor (Shield), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

While holding this Shield, you have Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attack rolls have Disadvantage against you.
translation:
护甲（盾牌），极珍稀（需同调）

在你持握着这面盾牌期间，你为抵抗法术和其他魔法效应所进行的豁免具有优势，且对你发动的法术攻击检定具有劣势。

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary

This 2-foot-diameter black sphere is a hole in the multiverse, hovering in space and stabilized by a magical field surrounding it.

The sphere obliterates all matter it passes through and all matter that passes through it. Artifacts are the exception. Unless an Artifact is susceptible to damage from a Sphere of Annihilation, it passes through the sphere unscathed. Anything else that touches the sphere but isn’t wholly engulfed and obliterated by it takes 8d10 Force damage.

Controlling the Sphere. A Sphere of Annihilation is stationary until someone takes control of it. If you are within 60 feet of a sphere, you can take a Magic action to make a DC 25 Intelligence (Arcana) check. On a successful check, you control the sphere until the start of your next turn, and if it was under another creature’s control, that creature loses control of the sphere. On a failed check, the sphere moves 10 feet toward you in a straight line.

While in control of the sphere, you can take a Bonus Action to cause it to move in one direction of your choice, up to a number of feet equal to 5 times your Intelligence modifier (minimum 5 feet). Any creature whose space the sphere enters must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be touched by it, taking 8d10 Force damage. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage is obliterated, leaving its possessions behind but no other physical remains.

Sphere Interactions. If the sphere comes into contact with a planar portal (such as that created by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGate000000]{Gate} spell) or an extradimensional space (such as that within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgPortableHole0]{Portable Hole}), the DM determines randomly what happens using the following table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgSphereOfAnnih]
translation:
奇物，传说

这个直径 2 尺的黑色球体是多元宇宙中的一个空洞，它悬浮在空间中，由一个围绕在它周围的魔法场维持稳定。

湮灭法球会毁灭任何穿过它或被它穿过的事物，只有神器例外：除非某件神器的弱点正是湮灭法球，否则神器均可以不受影响地穿过法球。任何触碰到法球但未被完全吞没或毁灭的东西将受到 8d10 力场伤害。

控制法球。 湮灭法球总是保持静止，除非受到人控制。如果你位于法球 60 尺内，你能够以一个魔法动作 进行一次DC 25 的智力（奥秘）检定。成功则你控制法球直至你的下个回合开始，若法球已处于一名其他生物的控制之下，则该生物失去控制权。失败则法球向你直线移动 10 尺。

控制法球期间，你能够以一个附赠动作令法球向一个你选择的方向移动一定尺数，具体尺数等于 5 × 你的智力调整值（至少 5 尺）。法球进入一名生物的占据空间时，该生物必须成功通过一次DC 19 的敏捷豁免，否则将触碰到法球，受到 8d10 力场伤害。因受此伤害而生命值降至 0 的生物将被毁灭，它携带的财物将留在原地，尸体则灰飞烟灭。

法球碰撞。 如果湮灭法球与位面传送门（如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGate000000]制造的传送门）或是异位面空间（如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgPortableHole0]内部）接触，则由DM根据下表随机决定发生的事件：

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgSphereOfAnnih]

original:
Deadly Trap (Levels 1–4)

Trigger: A creature moves onto the pit’s lid

Duration: Instantaneous

A 10-foot-deep pit has a hinged lid constructed from material identical to the surrounding floor. When a creature moves onto the lid, it swings open like a trapdoor, causing the creature to fall into the pit, which has sharpened wooden or metal spikes at the bottom. The lid remains open thereafter.

A creature that falls into the pit lands at the bottom and takes 3 (1d6) Bludgeoning damage from the fall plus 9 (2d8) Piercing damage from the spikes.

Detect and Disarm. As a Study action, a creature can examine the section of floor that forms the pit’s lid and make a [[/check inv 15]] check, detecting the pit on a successful check. Once the hidden pit is detected, an Iron Spike or a similar object can be wedged between the pit’s lid and the surrounding floor to prevent the lid from opening, thereby making it safe to cross. The cover can also be held shut using an Arcane Lock spell or similar magic.

Escape. A creature needs a Climb Speed, climbing gear, or magic such as a Spider Climb spell to scale the pit’s smooth walls. You can make the pit easier to escape by adding cracks in the walls big enough to serve as handholds and footholds.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the trap for higher levels by increasing the pit’s depth and damage, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Pit Depth

Damage

5–10

30 feet

10 (3d6) Bludgeoning plus 13 (3d8) Piercing

11–16

60 feet

21 (6d6) Bludgeoning plus 36 (8d8) Piercing

17–20

120 feet

42 (12d6) Bludgeoning plus 57 (13d8) Piercing
translation:
致命陷阱（1-4级）

触发： 生物移至陷坑盖上时

持续时间： 立即

这个 10 尺深的陷坑具有一块铰链式顶盖，顶盖使用的材料与周边的地板一致。当生物移动到陷坑盖上时，它会如活板门一般敞开，使得该生物坠落进底部设置着木制或铁质尖刺的陷坑之中。那之后，盖子将保持开启。

掉入陷坑且在落在底部的生物将因坠落而受到3（1d6）钝击伤害，外加从尖刺上受到9（2d8）穿刺伤害。

侦测与解除。 生物可以用搜索动作检查形成了陷坑盖的地面部分并进行 [[/check inv 15]] 检定，成功则侦测到陷坑。 找到陷坑后，便可以用铁钉或类似物件插入陷坑盖和周边地面之间的缝隙，以避免陷坑盖开启，从而确保安全通过。使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplArcaneLock] 或类似魔法也可以让盖子保持关闭。

逃脱。 生物需要攀爬速度、攀爬工具或例如蛛行术的魔法，才可以攀上陷坑的光滑墙壁。你可以在墙壁上增加足够大的裂缝，作为抓手和支点，使陷坑变得更容易逃脱。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提升陷坑的深度与伤害来提高陷阱对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

等级

陷坑深度

伤害

5–10

30 尺

10（3d6）钝击伤害外加13（3d8）穿刺伤害

11–16

60 尺

21（6d6）钝击伤害外加36（8d8）穿刺伤害

17–20

120 尺

42（12d6）钝击伤害外加57（13d8）穿刺伤害

Wondrous Item, Very Rare

This ornate wooden board has the letters of the Common alphabet printed on one side, alongside the words “Yes” and “No” and symbols representing “Weal” and “Woe.” The board comes with a heart-shaped, wooden planchette. This planchette must be resting on the lettered side of the board for the board’s magic to function.

This board has 3 charges and regains 1 expended charge daily at dawn. While touching the planchette, you can take 1 minute to cast one of the spells on the table below. The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell. As you cast the spell, you call on the spirits of the dead to guide the planchette across the board’s surface, answering your questions by pointing to the letters or words on the board.

Spell

Charge Cost

1

3
translation:
奇物, 极珍稀

这块华丽木板的一面印有通用语字母表的字符，旁边还有“是”和“否”的字样，以及代表“吉”和“凶”的符号。通灵板配有一块心型的木制占卜板。这块占卜板必须放置在通灵板有字母的一面，才能让通灵板的魔法发挥作用。

通灵板具有3充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1 已消耗的充能。施展法术时，你可以召唤死者灵魂引导占卜板在木板表面滑动，并通过指向木板上的字母或单词来回答你的问题。触摸占卜板期间，你可以花费 1 分钟施展一个法术，能施展的法术与所需充能如下表所示。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Common

If you place a Tiny object weighing no more than 1 pound (such as a shard of crystal, an egg, or a stone) above the tip of this staff while holding it, the object floats an inch from the staff’s tip and remains there until it is removed or until the staff is no longer in your possession. The staff can have up to three such objects floating over its tip at any given time. While holding the staff, you can make one or more of the objects slowly spin or turn in place.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]，普通

持握这根法杖期间，如果你将一个重量不超过 1 磅的微型物件（例如一块水晶碎片、一颗鸡蛋、一块石子）放于法杖的尖端，这个物件将会在尖端旁 1 寸的位置漂浮着，直到该物件被移除或法杖不在你手里。这根法杖同一时间至多可以让三个这样的物件在尖端漂浮。持握此法杖期间，你可以让这些物件中的一个或多个缓慢地绕着法杖旋转或原地自转。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Common

This wooden staff is decorated with bird carvings. It has 10 charges. While holding it, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 charge from the staff and cause it to create one of the following sounds, which can be heard out to 120 feet: a finch’s chirp, a raven’s caw, a duck’s quack, a chicken’s cluck, a goose’s honk, a loon’s call, a turkey’s gobble, a seagull’s cry, an owl’s hoot, or an eagle’s shriek.

Regaining Charges. The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the staff explodes in a harmless cloud of bird feathers and is lost forever.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]，普通

这根木制法杖上装饰着鸟形雕像。它具有 10 充能。持握此法杖期间，你可以执行魔法动作来消耗1充能，使其创造出周围 120 尺范围内都能听到的以下声音之一：麻雀啾啾、乌鸦哇哇、鸭子嘎嘎、小鸡咯咯、大鹅呱呱、潜鸟呜呜、火鸡咕咕、海鸥嗷嗷、夜枭嘤嘤或老鹰呖呖。

恢复充能。 这根法杖在每日黎明时重获 1d6 + 4 已消耗的充能。当充能数耗尽时，骰一次 [[/r 1d20]]。如果骰值为 1，法杖将在一阵无害的鸟羽之云中爆炸并且永久消失。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Rare (Requires Attunement by a Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard)

This staff has 10 charges. While holding the staff, you can use any of its properties:

Cast Spell. You can expend 1 of the staff’s charges to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplComprehend]{Comprehend Languages} from it using your spell save DC.

Reflect Enchantment. If you succeed on a saving throw against an Enchantment spell that targets only you, you can take a Reaction to expend 1 charge from the staff and turn the spell back on its caster as if you had cast the spell.

Resist Enchantment. If you fail a saving throw against an Enchantment spell that targets only you, you can turn your failed save into a successful one. You can’t use this property of the staff again until the next dawn.

Regaining Charges. The staff regains 1d8 + 2 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll 1d20. On a 1, the staff crumbles to dust and is destroyed.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]，珍稀（需吟游诗人，牧师，德鲁伊，术士，魔契师或法师同调）

这根法杖具有 10 充能。持握这根法杖期间，你可以使用以下词条：

施展法术。 你可以消耗 1 充能，从法杖中施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplComprehend] ，该法术使用你自己的法术豁免DC。

惑控反射。 如果一道惑控学派法术仅以你为目标，而你豁免成功时，你可以执行反应并消耗 1 充能，将法术反射给原施法者，如同你施展了这道法术一般。

惑控抵抗。 如果一道惑控学派法术仅以你为目标，而你豁免失败时，你可以将失败的豁免改为成功。法杖的这项词条一经使用，其直至次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

恢复充能。 这根法杖在每日黎明时重获 1d8 + 2 已消耗的充能。当充能数耗尽时，骰一次d20。如果骰值为 1，法杖将崩解为尘土，并被摧毁。

恢复充能。 这根法杖在每日黎明时重获 1d6 + 4 已消耗的充能。当充能数耗尽时，骰一次 [[/r 1d20]]。如果骰值为1，法杖将变为一根非魔法性的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]。

This staff has 10 charges.

Insect Cloud. While holding the staff, you can take a Magic action and expend 1 charge to cause a swarm of harmless flying insects to fill a 30-foot Emanation originating from you. The insects remain for 10 minutes, making the area &Reference[Heavily Obscured] for creatures other than you. A strong wind (like that created by @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}) disperses the swarm and ends the effect.

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

As a Bonus Action, you can turn the head of this staff into that of an animate, venomous snake for 1 minute or revert the staff to its inanimate form.

When you take the Attack action, you can make one of the attack rolls using the animated snake head, which has a reach of 5 feet. Apply your Proficiency Bonus and Wisdom modifier to the attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 Piercing damage and 3d6 Poison damage.

The snake head can be attacked while it is animate. It has AC 15, HP 20, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. If the head drops to 0 Hit Points, the staff is destroyed. As long as it’s not destroyed, the staff regains all lost Hit Points when it reverts to its inanimate form.

Foundry Note

This item includes 20 limited uses which can be used for tracking the snake's HP. The Awaken Snake Head activity restores all 20 uses so the snake will be at full HP whenever it is activated.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]，非普通（需同调）

以一个附赠动作，你可以将法杖的头部变为一条会动的毒蛇，持续一分钟，或直至你执行附赠动作将法杖还原为非活化形态。

当你执行攻击动作时，你可以使用触及 5 尺的活化蛇头来发动其中一次攻击检定。这次攻击检定使用你的熟练加值与感知调整值。命中时，目标将受到 1d6 穿刺伤害与 3d6 毒素伤害。

蛇头在活化期间可以被攻击。它具有AC 15，HP 20，免疫毒素与心灵伤害。蛇头的生命值降为0时法杖将被摧毁。只要法杖未被摧毁，它就会在还原为非活化形态时恢复所有失去的生命值。

Foundry Note

此物品包含20次的有限使用次数，可用于记录蛇头的生命值。活化蛇头行动将恢复所有使用次数，因此每次激活时，该蛇都会处于满生命值状态。

This staff has 50 charges and can be wielded as a magic Quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with it. While you hold it, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls.

Spell Absorption. While holding the staff, you have Advantage on saving throws against spells. In addition, you can take a Reaction when another creature casts a spell that targets only you. If you do, the staff absorbs the magic of the spell, canceling its effect and gaining a number of charges equal to the absorbed spell’s level. However, if doing so brings the staff’s total number of charges above 50, the staff explodes as if you activated its Retributive Strike (see below).

Regaining Charges. The staff regains 4d6 + 2 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 20, the staff regains [[/r 1d12 + 1]] charges.

Retributive Strike. You can take a Magic action to break the staff over your knee or against a solid surface. The staff is destroyed and releases its magic in an explosion that fills a 30-foot Emanation originating from itself. You have a 50 percent chance to instantly travel to a random plane of existence, avoiding the explosion ([[/r 1d2]], teleported on a 1). If you fail to avoid the effect, you take Force damage equal to 16 times the number of charges in the staff. Each other creature in the area makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes Force damage equal to 6 times the number of charges in the staff. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

Foundry Note

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

As a Magic action, you can throw this staff so that it lands in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of you, causing the staff to become a Giant Constrictor Snake in that space. The snake is under your control and shares your Initiative count, taking its turn immediately after yours.

On your turn, you can mentally command the snake (no action required) if it is within 60 feet of you and you don’t have the Incapacitated condition. You decide what action the snake takes and where it moves during its turn, or you can issue it a general command, such as to attack your enemies or guard a location. Absent commands from you, the snake defends itself.

As a Bonus Action, you can command the snake to revert to staff form in its current space, and you can’t use the staff’s property again for 1 hour. If the snake is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it dies and reverts to its staff form; the staff then shatters and is destroyed. If the snake reverts to staff form before losing all its Hit Points, it regains all of them.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]，非普通（需同调）

以一个魔法动作，你可以将法杖扔到你周边10尺内一处未占据空间的地面上，并让其变为一条巨蟒蛇。这条蛇将受你所控，其先攻值与你相同，并在你的回合结束后立即进行其回合。

在你的回合内，只要蛇在你身边 60 尺范围内且你未陷入失能状态，你便可以用精神给他下达命令（无需动作）。你将决定巨蟒在这一轮中执行什么动作以及如何移动，或者你可以下达一个宽泛的指令，例如攻击你的敌人或保护某个地点。如果你没有下达命令，蛇将保护自己。

以一个附赠动作，你可以命令蛇在当前的空间还原回法杖形态，之后你无法在 1 小时内再次使用法杖的词条。如果蛇的生命值被降为 0，它将死亡并还原回法杖形态，随后法杖破碎并被摧毁。如果蛇在失去全部生命值之前还原回法杖形态，它会恢复所有失去的生命值。

Tree Form. You can take a Magic action to plant one end of the staff in earth in an unoccupied space and expend 1 charge to transform the staff into a healthy tree. The tree is 60 feet tall and has a 5-foot-diameter trunk, and its branches at the top spread out in a 20-foot radius. The tree appears ordinary but radiates a faint aura of Transmutation magic that can be discerned with the Detect Magic spell. While touching the tree and using a Magic action, you return the staff to its normal form. Any creature in the tree falls when the tree reverts to a staff.

Regaining Charges. The staff regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the staff loses its properties and becomes a nonmagical Quarterstaff.

法术。 持握这根法杖期间，你可以从法杖中施展以下表格中的一道法术，使用你自己的法术豁免DC。表格中将显示你施展法术所需消耗的充能数。

树木形态。 你可以执行魔法动作来将法杖的一端插入一处未占据空间的土地上，并消耗 1 充能将其转变为一颗健壮的树。这棵树高 60 尺，树干直径 5 尺，顶端的树冠以 20 尺半径向外延伸。这棵树外观与普通的树无异，但 侦测魔法 能辨别出树上散发出的微弱变化系魔法灵光。你可以在触碰这棵树时执行魔法动作 将其变回原本的法杖形态。当树还原回法杖时，任何在树上的生物都会掉下来。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

This staff can be wielded as a magic Quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with it. It also has the following additional properties. Once one of these properties is used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Lightning. When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can cause the target to take an extra 2d6 Lightning damage (no action required).

Thunder. When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can cause the staff to emit a crack of thunder audible out to 300 feet (no action required). The target you hit must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the Stunned condition until the end of your next turn.

Thunder and Lightning. Immediately after you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can take a Bonus Action to use the Lightning and Thunder properties (see above) at the same time. Doing so doesn’t expend the daily use of those properties, only the use of this one.

Lightning Strike. You can take a Magic action to cause a bolt of lightning to leap from the staff’s tip in a Line that is 5 feet wide and 120 feet long. Each creature in that Line makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Thunderclap. You can take a Magic action to cause the staff to produce a thunderclap audible out to 600 feet. Every creature within a 60-foot Emanation originating from you makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d6 Thunder damage and has the Deafened condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]，极珍稀（需同调）

这根法杖可被用作一根魔法长棍（用这根长棍发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +2 加值）。它具有以下额外词条。其中的某项词条一经使用，直至次日黎明前你都无法再次使用。

电闪。 当你用法杖发动近战攻击并命中时，你可以对目标造成额外 2d6 点闪电伤害（无需动作）。

雷鸣。 当你用法杖发动近战攻击并命中时，你可以让法杖爆发出距你 300 尺内都能听见的雷霆巨响（无需动作）。被你击中的目标必须通过一次DC 17 的体质豁免，否则陷入震慑状态，持续至你的下个回合结束。

雷霆。 当你用法杖发动近战攻击并命中时，你可以立刻执行附赠动作来同时使用电闪和雷鸣词条（见上文）。这样做只会消耗雷霆词条的使用次数，而不会消耗电闪或雷鸣的使用次数。

闪电打击。 你可以执行魔法动作，让法杖从尖端射出一道覆盖宽 5 尺，长 120 尺线状区域的闪电束。所有在该线状区域内的生物都需要进行DC 17 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败则其受到 9d6 闪电伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

惊雷。 你可以执行魔法动作，让法杖制造一记在你 600 尺内都能听见的惊雷声响。以你为源点 60 尺光环区域内的所有生物都需要进行DC 17 的体质豁免。豁免失败则其受到 2d6 雷鸣伤害并陷入耳聋状态，持续 1 分钟；豁免成功则仅受半伤。

key: entries->Staff of Thunder and Lightning->activities->Thunder & Lightning->name
entries->Staff of Thunder and Lightning->activities->Lightning Strike->name

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This staff has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

The staff can be wielded as a magic Quarterstaff. On a hit, it deals damage as a normal Quarterstaff, and you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra 2d10 Necrotic damage to the target and force it to make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has Disadvantage for 1 hour on any ability check or saving throw that uses Strength or Constitution.

Foundry Note

The Save activity includes an Active Effect for tracking the disadvantage.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]，珍稀（需同调）

这根法杖具有 3 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d3 已消耗的充能。

这根法杖可被用作一根魔法长棍。命中时，其造成普通长棍的伤害，然后你可以消耗 1 充能来对目标造成额外 2d10 暗蚀伤害，并强迫目标进行一次DC 15 的体质豁免。豁免失败时，目标在 1 小时内进行的基于力量或体质的属性检定与豁免都具有劣势。

Foundry Note

豁免行动包含一个用于跟进劣势状态的主动效应。

original: The target has Disadvantage for 1 hour on any ability check or saving throw that uses Strength or Constitution.
translation: 你在1小时内进行的基于力量或体质的属性检定与豁免都具有劣势。

original: Increase one of your ability scores by 2, to a maximum of 24.
translation: 你令你的一项属性值提升 2，至多提升至 24。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare

While touching this 5-pound stone to the ground, you can take a Magic action to summon an Earth Elemental. The elemental appears in an unoccupied space you choose within 30 feet of yourself, obeys your commands, and takes its turn immediately after you on your Initiative count. The elemental disappears after 1 hour, when it dies, or when you dismiss it as a Bonus Action. The stone can’t be used this way again until the next dawn.
translation:
奇物，珍稀

在你用这块 5 磅重的石核接触地面期间，你能够以一个魔法动作召唤一只土元素。土元素会出现在你 30 尺内一处由你选择的未占据空间、理解你所说的语言、服从你的命令、使用你的先攻值并在你之后立即执行其回合。土元素会在 1 小时后、它死亡时、或你用一个附赠动作将其解消时消失。直到次日黎明前，石核都无法再以该方式进行使用。

key: entries->Stone of Controlling Earth Elementals->activities->Summon Elemental->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

While this polished agate is on your person, you gain a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

Foundry Note

This item includes an Active Effect that automates the bonus.
translation:
奇物，非普通（需同调）

吉运之石是一块光亮的玛瑙，携带它于身上期间，你在属性检定和豁免检定上获得+1加值。

Foundry Note

此物品包含一个主动效应，可自动提供加值。

original: A magic item (chosen by the DM) appears on your person. In addition, you gain 10 Temporary Hit Points daily at dawn until you die.
translation: 一件由DM选择的魔法物品出现在你手中。此外，你将在每日黎明时获得 10 临时生命值直至你死亡。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效
卡牌太阳：每日临时生命值

original:
Source: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDmtSun0000000]{Sun}

You gain [[/healing 10 type=temphp]]{10 Temporary Hit Points} daily at dawn until you die.
translation:
来源：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDmtSun0000000]

你在每日黎明时获得 [[/healing 10 type=temphp]]{10 临时生命值}直至你死亡。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}), Rare (Requires Attunement)

This item appears to be a sword hilt.

Blade of Radiance. While grasping the hilt, you can take a Bonus Action to cause a blade of pure radiance to spring into existence or make the blade disappear. While the blade exists, this magic weapon functions as a Longsword with the Finesse property. If you are proficient with Longswords or Shortswords, you are proficient with the Sun Blade.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals Radiant damage instead of Slashing damage. When you hit an Undead with it, that target takes an extra 1d8 Radiant damage.

Sunlight. The sword’s luminous blade emits Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. While the blade persists, you can take a Magic action to expand or reduce its radius of Bright Light and Dim Light by 5 feet each, to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.

Foundry Note

If you are proficient with Shortswords you can manually set the item as proficient.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]），珍稀（需同调）

这件物品看起来像是一把剑柄。

耀光剑刃。 持握剑柄时，你可以用一个附赠动作将这把剑纯粹由光芒构成的剑刃展开或是解除。展开剑刃的阳炎剑视为一把具有灵巧词条的魔法长剑。如果你拥有长剑或短剑的熟练，则你也拥有对阳炎剑的熟练。

你用该武器发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +2 加值，但它造成光耀伤害而非挥砍伤害。被这把剑命中的不死生物将额外受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。

耀阳。 阳炎剑闪耀的剑刃会散发出 15 尺的明亮光照和额外 15 尺微光光照。这一光照视为日光。剑刃展开期间，你能够以一个魔法动作 使明亮与微光光照半径各扩大或缩小 5 尺。光照范围上限为明亮和微光区域各 30 尺，下限为各 10 尺。

Foundry Note

若你对短剑熟练，可手动将该物品设置为熟练。
伤害加值：1d8 光耀伤害（对亡灵生效）

original:
Large Object

Armor Class: 19 Hit Points: 20

Spill (Requires a Full Cauldron). Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 10-foot square directly below the cauldron. Failure: 10 (3d6) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

An iron pot is suspended so that it can be tipped easily, spilling its contents. Once emptied, a cauldron must be refilled before it can be used again. Filling the cauldron requires three Utilize actions. Then a crew member can take the Spill action.

Cauldrons are typically filled with boiling oil but can be filled with other substances, such as acid or green slime (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.lVkdQivhFHqVmxg7]{Hazards} in this chapter), with different effects.

Foundry Note

This item has 3 limited uses for tracking filling.

The Fill activity grants one use so after three uses you can use the Spill activity.
translation:
大型物件

AC: 19 HP: 20

倾倒热油（需要大锅装满）.

敏捷豁免： DC15，大锅下方10尺立方内的所有生物。

失败： 10（3d6）火焰伤害。

成功： 半伤。

一口吊挂起来的钢铁坩锅，可以方便地将其侧翻并倒出内里所装载的物质。大锅一旦倒空，则必须将其重新装满才能使用。装满大锅需要三次操作动作，随后操作手便可执行倾倒热油动作。

大锅通常装着热油，但也可以装填其他物质，比如强酸或者绿软泥（见本章中 “@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.lVkdQivhFHqVmxg7]{危害 Hazards} ”部分），并依不同物质造成不同效应。

Foundry Note

此物品有 3 次跟进填充的有限使用次数。

装填行动可给予一次物品使用次数，所以使用三次后，您就可以使用 倾倒行动了。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}), Legendary (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this sword. In addition, while you hold the sword, you can take a Reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. You have Advantage on the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any Immunity or Resistance the target has to that damage.

Foundry Note

The Attack Reaction activity does not automatically bypass Damage Resistances/Immunities.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]），传说（需同调）

你用此剑进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值。此外，持握此剑时，你能够以反应用此武器对你触及内任何对你造成了伤害的生物发动一次近战攻击。你进行此次攻击检定具有优势，且这次特殊攻击造成的伤害忽略目标对本次伤害的任何免疫或抗性。

Foundry Note

攻击反应行动不会自动无视伤害抗性/免疫效果。

original: creature within reach deals damage to you
translation: 对你触及内任何对你造成了伤害的生物

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}), Artifact (Requires Attunement)

Kas was a powerful warrior who served Vecna and whose loyalty was rewarded with this sword. As Kas’s power grew, so did his hubris. The sword urged Kas to destroy Vecna and usurp his throne. Legend says Vecna’s destruction came at Kas’s hand, but Vecna also wrought his rebellious lieutenant’s doom, leaving only Kas’s sword behind.

Bloodthirst. The sword thirsts for blood. If the sword doesn’t taste blood on its blade within 1 minute of being drawn from its scabbard, its wielder makes a [[/save ability=cha dc=15 format=long]]. On a successful save, the wielder takes [[/damage 3d6 type=psychic]] damage. On a failed save, the wielder is dominated by the sword, as if by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominateMo]{Dominate Monster} spell, and the sword demands blood. The spell effect ends when the sword’s demand is met.

Magic Weapon. You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with the sword, which scores a Critical Hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20 and deals an extra 2d10 Slashing damage to Undead.

Random Properties

Random Properties. The sword has the following random properties (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.iA3mHmvlXvWKlyBo#artifact-properties]{Artifacts}):

  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorBenefici]{minor beneficial property}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorBenefici]{major beneficial property}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorDetrimen]{minor detrimental property}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorDetrimen]{major detrimental property}

Spells. While the sword is on your person, you can cast the following spells (save DC 18) from it:

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCallLightn]{Call Lightning}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineWord]{Divine Word}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFingerofDe]{Finger of Death}

Once you use the sword to cast a spell, you can’t cast that spell again from it until the next dawn.

Spirit of Kas. While the sword is on your person, you gain the following benefits:

Battle Hunger. You add 1d10 to your Initiative rolls.

Blade of Defense. When you take an action to attack with the sword, you can transfer some or all of its attack bonus to your Armor Class instead. The adjusted bonuses remain in effect until the start of your next turn.

Necrotic Resistance. You have Resistance to Necrotic damage.

Sentience/Personality Details

Sentience. The Sword of Kas is a sentient Chaotic Evil weapon with an Intelligence of 15, a Wisdom of 13, and a Charisma of 16. It has hearing and Darkvision out to 120 feet.

The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and speaks Common.

Personality. The sword’s purpose is to bring ruin to Vecna. Killing Vecna’s worshipers, destroying the lich’s works, and foiling his machinations all help to fulfill this goal.

The Sword of Kas also seeks to destroy anyone corrupted by the Eye and Hand of Vecna.

Destroying the Sword. A creature attuned to both the Eye of Vecna and the Hand of Vecna can use the Wish property of those combined Artifacts to unmake the Sword of Kas, provided the sword is within 30 feet of the spell’s caster. Upon casting Wish, the creature makes a DC 18 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, nothing happens, and the Wish spell is wasted. On a successful save, the Sword of Kas is destroyed.

Foundry Note

This item includes Active Effects which automatically add the 1d10 to your initiative and grants you Resistance to Necrotic damage.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]），神器（需要同调）

凯斯是一位侍奉维克那的强大战士，他的忠诚赢得了这把宝剑作为奖赏。随着凯斯力量日渐增长，他的野心也随之膨胀。凯斯的佩剑力劝他推翻维克那，并篡夺维克那的王位。传说维克那殒落自凯斯之手，但反叛的副官也遭到厄运，最后只有凯斯的佩剑流传于世。

嗜血。 这柄剑渴求鲜血。若此剑在出鞘后的1分钟内其锋刃没有尝到鲜血，其持用者进行一次 [[/save ability=cha dc=15 format=long]]豁免，豁免成功则持用者受到 [[/damage 3d6 type=psychic]] 伤害。失败则持用者将被剑控制，如同被法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominateMo] 操控。剑渴求鲜血，当剑的需求满足时，法术效应结束。

魔法武器。 你用此剑进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值，你用此剑进行的攻击检定在 d20 中掷出 19 或 20 时造成重击，此剑对亡灵额外造成 2d10 挥砍伤害。

随机词条

随机词条。 凯斯之剑具有下列随机词条（见本章“@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.iA3mHmvlXvWKlyBo#artifact-properties]{神器}”）：

  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorBenefici]{次要增益词条 }
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorBenefici]{主要增益词条 }
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorDetrimen]{次要增益词条 }
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorDetrimen]{主要增益词条 }

法术。 只要此剑在你身上，你就可以从中施展以下法术（豁免DC18）：

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCallLightn]
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineWord]
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFingerofDe]

一旦你使用此剑施展法术，直至次日黎明你都无法再次以此剑施展那个法术。

凯斯之灵。 只要此剑在你身上，你就获得以下增益：

战斗饥渴。 你将1d10加入你的先攻检定。

防御之刃。 当你执行动作以此剑发动攻击时，你可以选择将此剑的攻击加值全部或部分转移到你的护甲等级中。加值修改持续至你的下个回合开始。

暗蚀抗性。 你具有对暗蚀伤害的抗性。

智能/个性详情

智能。 凯斯之剑是一柄混乱邪恶的智能武器，智力为 15，感知 13，魅力 16。它具有 120 尺听觉及 120 尺黑暗视觉。

凯斯之剑说通用语并可以通过心灵感应与持用者交流。

个性。 这柄剑的目标是毁灭维克纳。杀死维克纳的信徒、摧毁巫妖的作品、挫败他的阴谋都有助于实现该目标。凯斯之剑还试图摧毁任何被维克纳法眼和魔掌腐化之人。

凯斯之剑 还试图摧毁任何被维克纳法眼和魔掌腐化之人。

摧毁凯斯之剑。 一名同时与维克那法眼和维克那魔掌维持同调的生物，可以使用其祈愿 词条摧毁凯斯之剑，此时凯斯之剑需位于施法者 30 尺内。施展此次祈愿术时，该生物需要进行一次DC 18 的魅力豁免，失败则无事发生，祈愿术被浪费；成功则凯斯之剑被摧毁。

Foundry Note

此物品附带的主动效应将自动在先攻检定上额外增加 1d10，并赋予你暗蚀伤害抗性。
伤害加值：2d10 挥砍伤害（对亡灵生效）

original: The adjusted bonuses remain in effect until the start of your next turn, although you must hold the weapon to gain a bonus to AC from it.
translation: 此剑的攻击加值全部或部分转移到你的护甲等级中。加值修改持续至你的下个回合开始。

original: The adjusted bonuses remain in effect until the start of your next turn, although you must hold the weapon to gain a bonus to AC from it.
translation: 此剑的攻击加值全部或部分转移到你的护甲等级中。加值修改持续至你的下个回合开始。

Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000]{Glaive}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}), Rare (Requires Attunement)

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000]{Glaive}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}), Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Curse. This weapon is cursed and possessed by a vengeful spirit. Becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed, you are unwilling to part with the weapon, keeping it on your person at all times. While attuned to this weapon, you have Disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.

In addition, while the weapon is on your person, you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw (Call to Vengeance activity) whenever you take damage from another creature in combat. On a failed save, you must attack the creature that damaged you until you drop to 0 Hit Points or it does or until you can’t reach the creature to make a melee attack against it.

You can break the curse in the usual ways. Alternatively, casting @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBanishment]{Banishment} on the weapon forces the vengeful spirit to leave it. The weapon then becomes a +1 Weapon with no other properties.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]），非普通（需同调）

你用该魔法武器发动的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得+1加值。

诅咒。 这把武器被寄宿在武器内的一道渴望复仇的魂灵所诅咒，与之同调的生物将受到其诅咒影响。只要诅咒还在生效，你总是会把剑带在身上，不愿与它分开。与这把剑的同调持续时，你在用其他武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰具有劣势。

此外，在这把武器被你带在身上期间，每当你在战斗中受到其它生物造成的伤害时，你就必须成功通过一次DC 15 的感知豁免 (复仇之唤 行动)。如果豁免失败，则你必须持续攻击对你造成伤害的生物，直到你或它的生命值降至 0，或是你无法追上该生物以对其发动近战攻击为止。

你可以用常见方式解除武器上的诅咒。对剑施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBanishment]也可以驱逐其中寄宿的复仇魂灵。此后，这把武器将变为一把不具备其它词条的 +1 武器。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000]{Glaive}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}), Rare (Requires Attunement)

When you hit a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, the target takes an extra 2d6 Necrotic damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be unable to regain Hit Points for 1 hour. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]），珍稀（需同调）

当你用此魔法武器命中一个生物时，目标额外受到 2d6 暗蚀伤害，且必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免否则将无法恢复生命值，持续 1 小时。目标可以在它的每个回合结束时重复此豁免，豁免成功则解除此效应。

Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Dagger}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSickle0000]{Sickle}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}), Common (Requires Attunement)

While this weapon is on your person, you understand the nonwritten communication of all Fey, and they understand yours.

Secret Message. As a Magic action, you can use the weapon to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMessage000]{Message}. Once this property is used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepRapier0000]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword] ，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSickle0000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSpear00000]），普通（需同调）
