original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary (Requires Attunement by a Cleric or Paladin)

This talisman is a mighty symbol of goodness. A Fiend or an Undead that touches the talisman takes 8d6 Radiant damage and takes the damage again each time it ends its turn holding or carrying the talisman.

Holy Symbol. You can use the talisman as a Holy Symbol. You gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls while you wear or hold it.

Pure Rebuke. The talisman has 7 charges. While wearing or holding the talisman, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 charge and target one creature you can see on the ground within 120 feet of yourself. A flaming fissure opens under the target, and the target makes a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. If the target is a Fiend or an Undead, it has Disadvantage on the save. On a failed save, the target falls into the fissure and is destroyed, leaving no remains. On a successful save, the target isn’t cast into the fissure but takes 4d6 Psychic damage from the ordeal. In either case, the fissure then closes, leaving no trace of its existence. When you expend the last charge, the talisman disperses into motes of golden light and is destroyed.
translation:
奇物，传说（需牧师或圣武士同调）

这枚护符是良善的象征。触碰护符的亡灵或邪魔生物将受到8d6光耀伤害，每当该生物持握或携带此护符结束其回合时，将再次受到此伤害。

圣徽。 你可以将护符当作圣徽使用。着装或持握护符期间，你进行的法术攻击检定获得 +2 加值。

至纯审判。 护符具有 7 充能。着装或持握护符期间，你能够以一个魔法动作，消耗 1 充能并以一名位于你 120 尺内的地面上的你可见的生物为目标，使目标脚下张开一道火焰裂隙。目标必须进行一次DC 20 的敏捷豁免，若目标是邪魔或亡灵，其进行此豁免具有劣势。豁免失败则目标坠入裂隙，灰飞烟灭；成功则目标不会坠入裂隙，但因审判受到 4d6 心灵伤害。无论情况如何，裂隙随后将不留痕迹地闭合。充能耗尽时，护符将被摧毁，化为闪耀金光的尘埃。

key: entries->Talisman of Pure Good->activities->Fiend and Undead Damage->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

While holding or wearing this talisman, you have Advantage on any [[/skill arc]] check you make to control a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgSphereOfAnnih]{Sphere of Annihilation}. In addition, when you start your turn in control of a Sphere of Annihilation, you can take a Magic action to move it 10 feet plus a number of additional feet equal to 10 times your Intelligence modifier. This movement doesn’t have to be in a straight line.
translation:
奇物，传说（需同调）

持握或着装此护符期间，你为操控 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgSphereOfAnnih] 而进行的 [[/skill arc]] 检定具有优势。此外，你的回合开始时，若你正在操控湮灭法球，你能够以一个魔法动作 将法球移动一定尺数，具体尺数等于 10 + 10 × 你的智力调整值。以此法移动法球时，其不必以直线进行运动。

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

This item symbolizes unrepentant evil. A creature that isn’t a Fiend or an Undead that touches the talisman takes 8d6 Necrotic damage and takes the damage again each time it ends its turn holding or carrying the talisman.

Holy Symbol. You can use the talisman as a Holy Symbol. You gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls while you wear or hold it.

Ultimate End. The talisman has 6 charges. While wearing or holding the talisman, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 charge and target one creature you can see on the ground within 120 feet of yourself. A flaming fissure opens under the target, and the target makes a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. If the target is a Celestial, it has Disadvantage on the save. On a failed save, the target falls into the fissure and is destroyed, leaving no remains. On a successful save, the target isn’t cast into the fissure but takes 4d6 Psychic damage from the ordeal. In either case, the fissure then closes, leaving no trace of its existence. When you expend the last charge, the talisman dissolves into foul-smelling slime and is destroyed.
translation:
奇物，传说（需同调）

这枚护符是至恶的象征。触碰护符的非亡灵非邪魔生物将受到 8d6 暗蚀伤害，每当该生物持握或携带此护符结束其回合时，将再次受到此伤害。

圣徽。 你可以将护符当作圣徽使用。着装或持握护符期间，你进行的法术攻击检定获得 +2 加值。

万物终焉。 护符具有 6 充能。着装或持握护符期间，你能够以一个魔法动作，消耗 1 充能并以一名位于你 120 尺内的地面上的你可见的生物为目标，使目标脚下张开一道火焰裂隙。目标必须进行一次DC 20 的敏捷豁免，若目标是天族，其进行此豁免具有劣势。豁免失败则目标坠入裂隙，灰飞烟灭；成功则目标不会坠入裂隙，但因审判受到 4d6 心灵伤害。无论情况如何，裂隙随后将不留痕迹地闭合。充能耗尽时，护符将被摧毁，化为散发着恶臭的粘液。

key: entries->Talisman of Ultimate Evil->activities->Non-Fiend or Undead Damage->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Common (Requires Attunement)

While this doll is within 5 feet of you, you can spend a Short Rest telling it to say up to six phrases, none of which can be more than six words long, and set a condition under which the doll speaks each phrase. You can also replace old phrases with new ones. Whatever the condition, it must occur within 5 feet of the doll to make it speak. For example, whenever someone picks up the doll, it might say, “I want a piece of candy.” The doll’s phrases are lost when your Attunement to the doll ends.
translation:
奇物, 普通（需同调）

这个玩偶在你周边 5 尺范围内期间，你可以花费一次短休教会它说至多六段短语，并设定玩偶说出每段短语的条件，每段短语的长度都不能超过六个单词。你也可以使用新短语替换旧短语。设定的条件必须在玩偶周边 5 尺范围内发生，这样玩偶才会说话。例如，当有人捡起这个玩偶时，它可能会说一句“我想要一块糖”。当你与玩偶的同调结束时，玩偶的短语会消失。

original: Every magic item you wear or carry disintegrates. Artifacts in your possession vanish instead.
translation: 你着装或携带的所有魔法物品被解离。你拥有的神器不会被解离，但会因此消失。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

This bag made from gray, rust, or tan cloth appears empty. Reaching inside the bag, however, reveals the presence of a small, fuzzy object.

You can take a Magic action to pull the fuzzy object from the bag and throw it up to 20 feet. When the object lands, it transforms into a creature you determine by rolling on the table that corresponds to the bag’s color. See the Monster Manual for the creature’s stat block. The creature vanishes at the next dawn or when it is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

The creature is Friendly to you and your allies, and it acts immediately after you on your Initiative count. You can take a Bonus Action to command how the creature moves and what action it takes on its next turn, such as attacking an enemy. In the absence of such orders, the creature acts in a fashion appropriate to its nature.

Once three fuzzy objects have been pulled from the bag, the bag can’t be used again until the next dawn.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgTanBagOfTrick rollable]
translation:
奇物，非普通

这种布袋有三种不同颜色的版本：灰色、铁锈色、棕褐色。布袋看起来空无一物，但把手伸进去会摸到一个小小的毛绒物件。

你能够以一个魔法动作取出布袋里的毛绒物件，并把它扔出至多20尺远。当物件落地时，投骰子参考对应颜色布袋的表格决定物件变成的生物。相关生物的资料见怪物图鉴 Monster Manual 。该生物在次日黎明时分或者其生命值降至 0 时消失。

扔出的生物对你和你的盟友态度 友善，且会在你的回合结束后行动。你能够以一个附赠动作命令该生物在其下一回合执行特定的移动方式，做特定的动作，例如攻击你的敌人。没接到命令时，该生物按自己天性行动。

一旦袋子抽出三件毛绒物件后，直至次日黎明才可再次使用。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgTanBagOfTrick rollable]

key: entries->Tan Bag of Tricks->activities->Pull and Throw->name
entries->Tan Bag of Tricks->activities->Pull and Throw->chatFlavor
original: Transformed creature determined by DM or table roll
translation: 由DM决定或通过掷骰子来确定变成的生物

original:
Wondrous Item, Common

This tankard has a stern face sculpted into one side. You can drink ale, wine, or any other nonmagical alcoholic beverage poured into it without becoming inebriated. The tankard has no effect on magical liquids or harmful substances such as poison.
translation:
奇物, 普通

这个大酒杯的一侧雕刻着一张坚毅的脸。只要使用这个酒杯，无论是喝麦芽酒、果酒、还是其他任何非魔法的酒精饮料，你都不会醉。这个酒杯对魔法液体或毒药之类的有害物质无效。

original:
Rod, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This rod ends in three rubbery tentacles. While holding the rod, you can take a Magic action to direct the tentacles to stretch outward, each one attacking a creature you can see within 15 feet of yourself. For each tentacle, make a melee attack roll with a +9 bonus. A tentacle deals 1d6 Psychic damage on a hit. If you hit the same target with all three tentacles, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until you have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition, until you take a Bonus Action to release the target, or until the target is no longer within 15 feet of you. While Restrained in this way, the target takes 3d6 Psychic damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.
translation:
权杖，珍稀（需同调）

这根权杖的末端长着三条有弹性的触须。持握这根权杖时，你可以执行魔法动作来指挥触手向外伸展，每一条都会对你可见的 15 尺之内的一个生物发动攻击。为每条触须进行 +9 加值的近战攻击检定。单条触须命中时会造成 1d6 心灵伤害。如果你用三条触须击中同一目标，则该目标必须成功通过DC 15 的敏捷豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态。束缚将持续直至你陷入&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态，花费附赠动作放开目标或目标不再处于你的 15 尺之内时。当目标被以此法束缚时，在其每个回合开始时都会受到 3d6 心灵伤害。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上的效应。

original:
You gain proficiency and &Reference[Expertise] in your choice of History, Insight, Intimidation, or Persuasion. In addition, you gain rightful ownership of a small keep somewhere in the world. However, the keep is currently home to one or more monsters, which must be cleared out before you can claim the keep as yours.

Foundry Note

Unlike the other cards from the Deck, this item will not destroy itself upon use in order to serve as a symbol of ownership of the keep.
translation:
你在历史、洞悉、威吓或游说中选择一项获得其熟练和 &Reference[Expertise] 此外，你获得世界上某个地方的一座小城堡的合法所有权。然而这座城堡被一只或更多怪物所占据，你必须清理其中的怪物来获得城堡的宣称。

Foundry Note

与牌组中的其他卡牌不同，此物品在使用时不会自我销毁，而是作为城堡所有权的象征。

original: Card's effect occurs immediately upon draw
translation: 卡牌的效应在抽牌时即刻生效

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatclub0]{Greatclub}), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

While you are attuned to this magic weapon, your Strength is 20 unless your Strength is already equal to or greater than that score. The weapon deals an extra 1d8 Thunder damage to any creature it hits and an extra 3d8 Thunder damage to objects it hits that aren’t being worn or carried.

The weapon has the following additional properties.

Clap of Thunder. As a Magic action, you can strike the weapon against a hard surface to create a loud clap of thunder audible out to 300 feet. You also create a 30-foot Cone of thunderous energy. Each creature in the Cone must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition. Nonmagical objects in the Cone that aren’t being worn or carried take [[/damage 3d8 type=thunder]] damage.

Earthquake. As a Magic action, you can strike the weapon against the ground to create an intense seismic disturbance in a 50-foot-radius circle centered on the point of impact. Structures in contact with the ground in that area take 50 Bludgeoning damage, and each creature on the ground in that area must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or have the Prone condition. If that creature is also concentrating, it must succeed on a [[/save con 20]] saving throw or its Concentration is broken. In addition, you can cause a 30-foot-deep, 10-foot-wide fissure to open up on the ground anywhere in the area. Any creature on a spot where the fissure opens must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, falling into the fissure on a failed save or moving with the fissure’s edge on a successful one. Any structure on a spot where the fissure opens collapses into the fissure. Once you use this property, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatclub0]）, 极珍稀（需同调）

当你与这把魔法武器同调后，你的力量变为 20，除非你的力量已经大于或等于此值。这把武器会对其命中的任何生物造成额外 1d8 雷鸣伤害，也会对其命中的未被穿着或携带的物件造成额外 3d8 雷鸣伤害。

这把武器具有以下附加词条:

雷霆霹雳。 以一个魔法动作，你可以使用这把武器击打一处坚硬表面，制造出在 300 尺内都能听见的雷鸣般巨响。并且，你制造出一个 30 尺锥状的雷霆能量区域。锥状区域内的每个生物都必须成功通过一次DC15的力量豁免，豁免失败则其陷倒地状态。锥状区域内未被穿着或携带的非魔法物件会受到 [[/damage 3d8 type=thunder]] 伤害。

地震。 以一个魔法动作，你可以使用这把武器敲击地面，在以敲击点为中心，半径 50 尺的范围内引起一阵强烈的地震扰动。该区域内与地面接触的建筑物会受到 50 点钝击伤害，并且该区域地面上的每个生物都必须成功通过一次DC 20 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败则其陷入倒地状态。若该生物同时正在维持专注，则其必须成功通过一次[[/save con 20]] 豁免，豁免失败则其专注被打断。此外，你可以在该区域内任意一处的地面上打开一 道30 尺深，10 尺宽的裂缝。任何位于裂缝开口位置的生物都必须进行一次DC 20 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败则其落入裂缝中，豁免成功则其会随着裂缝边缘移动。任何位于裂缝开口位置的建筑物都会坍塌落入裂缝中。这项词条一经使用，则其直至次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

original: Bonus Damage: 2d8 Thunder vs loose object
translation: 伤害加值： 2d8 雷鸣伤害（对非固定物体生效）

original:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare

This book contains memory and logic exercises, and its words are charged with magic. If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book’s contents and practicing its guidelines, your Intelligence increases by 2, to a maximum of 30. The manual then loses its magic but regains it in a century.

Foundry Note

This item includes 48 max uses for tracking hours read.

The Read activity includes a scaling value that lets you enter the amount of hours you've read. Once you hit 48 you can use the included Active Effect to increase your Intelligence.

The Reset Progress activity resets your uses to 0 if you fail to complete the book within 6 days and need to start over.
translation:
奇物，极珍稀

这本书记载了训练记忆和逻辑的方法，其文字蕴含魔力。如果你在不长于 6 日的时间段内花费了 48 小时研读这本书并实践其中的方针，则你的智力提升 2，至多提升至 30。之后这本手册将失去魔力，直到一个世纪后才能恢复。

Foundry Note

该物品包含 48 次最大使用次数用于记录阅读时长。

阅读行动包含可调节数值输入功能，允许录入实际阅读时长。累计达到 48 小时后，可触发内置的主动效应提升感知属性。

重置进度行动可将使用次数归零（若未能在 6 日内完成书籍阅读需重新计时）。

If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book’s contents and practicing its guidelines, your Charisma increases by 2, to a maximum of 30. The manual then loses its magic but regains it in a century.

Foundry Note

This item includes 48 max uses for tracking hours read.

The Reset Progress activity resets your uses to 0 if you fail to complete the book within 6 days and need to start over.

奇物，极珍稀

Foundry Note

该物品包含 48 次最大使用次数用于记录阅读时长。

阅读行动包含可调节数值输入功能，允许录入实际阅读时长。累计达到 48 小时后，可触发内置的主动效应提升感知属性。

key: entries->Tome of Leadership and Influence->activities->Reset Progress->name

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary (Requires Attunement by a Wizard)

This book has a desiccated tongue pinned to its front cover. Five of these tomes exist, and it’s unknown which one is the original. The tongue on the first Tome of the Stilled Tongue belonged to a treacherous former servant of the lich Vecna. The tongues pinned to the covers of the four copies came from other spellcasters who crossed Vecna. The first few pages of each tome are filled with indecipherable scrawls. The remaining pages are blank.

While attuned to this item, you can use it as a Spellbook and an Arcane Focus. In addition, while holding the tome, you can take a Bonus Action to cast a spell you have written in this tome, without expending a spell slot or using any Verbal or Somatic components. Once used, this property of the tome can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Only you can remove the tongue from the book’s cover. If you do so, all spells written in the book are permanently erased.

Vecna watches anyone using this tome and can write cryptic messages in it. These messages typically fade away after they are read.

Foundry Note

The Cast Spell activity can be used for tracking your uses of that property.
translation:
奇物，传说（需法师同调）

这本厚重皮革包覆的卷册封面上钉着一条风干的舌头。卷册现存世5本，但无人知晓哪本才是原本。第一本静语卷册上的舌头来自一名背叛了巫妖维克那的仆人。其它四本复制品封面上的舌头则来自冒犯了维克那的其他施法者。每本卷册的前几页都写满了难以辨认的潦草字迹，其余页面则空白如新。

与此卷册同调期间，你可以将它作为法术书和法器。此外，持握卷册期间，你能够以一个附赠动作施展一道记录在卷册中的法术而无需言语或姿势成分，也无需消耗法术位。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。

只有你可以移除卷册封面的舌头。若如此做，书中记录的所有法术将被永久抹除。

维克那留意着任何使用卷册的人，还可以向卷册内写入密文。这些密文通常在被人阅读后即消失不见。

Foundry Note

施法行动可用于跟进该物品的使用次数。

key: entries->Tome of the Stilled Tongue->activities->Cast Spell->name

Ingested Poison

A creature subjected to Torpor poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the &Reference[Poisoned] condition for [[/r 4d6]] hours. The creature's Speed is halved while the creature is Poisoned in this way.
translation:
服用型毒药

服用这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Poisoned] 状态 [[/r 4d6]] 小时。以此法中毒期间该生物的速度减半。

original:
Large Object

Armor Class: 15 Hit Points: 150

Trebuchet Stone (Requires Load and Aim). Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 300/1,200 ft. (can’t hit targets within 60 feet of itself). Hit: 44 (8d10) Bludgeoning damage.

A Trebuchet is a catapult that throws its payload in a high arc so it can hit targets behind walls. Loading a Trebuchet requires two Utilize actions, and aiming it requires two more Utilize actions. Then a crew member can take the Trebuchet Stone action.

Foundry Note

This item has 2 limited uses for tracking loading. Aiming must be tracked manually.

The Load activity grants one use so after two uses you can use the Trebuchet Stone activity.

巨型物件

AC: 15 HP: 150

配重投石（需要装填与瞄准）.

远程攻击： +5，射程300/1200 尺（无法命中 60 尺内的目标）。

命中： 44（8d10）钝击伤害。

配重投石机是一种以弧线抛射重型投石的攻城器，其投出的石弹可以越过城墙打击目标。装填和瞄准配重投石机各需要两次操作动作，随后操作手便可执行配重投石动作。

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary

This tube holds milky liquid with a strong alcohol smell. When found, a tube contains 1d6 + 1 ounces.

You can take a Utilize action to pour 1 or more ounces of solvent from the tube onto a surface within reach. Each ounce instantly dissolves up to 1 square foot of adhesive it touches, including @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgSovereignGlue]{Sovereign Glue}.

Foundry Note

This item includes 7 limited uses. The Determine Ounces activity can be used to determine the number of ounces equivalent to 1d6 + 1.

The Apply Solvent activity allows you to select the number of ounces you're applying.
translation:
奇物，传说

这管乳白色的液体散发着浓烈的酒精气味。被发现时，管中装有 1d6 + 1 盎司的万溶剂。

你能够以一个操作动作将管中 1 盎司或更多的液体倒在触及内的某表面上。每盎司万溶剂将立刻溶解它接触到的至多 1 立方尺的粘合剂（包括 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgSovereignGlue]）。

Foundry Note

该物品包含 7 次有限使用次数。确定盎司行动可用于确定等效于 1d6 + 1 的盎司数值。

施用溶剂行动允许你选择需要施用的盎司数值。

Wondrous Item, Common

奇物, 普通

你能够以一个附赠动作将这根手杖变为一把普普通通的长剑，或者将长剑变回手杖。你必须持握该物品才能完成以上两种变形。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgViciousVine00]{Vicious Vine}

Vicious vines are animated by magic. They often cling to doorways, archways, walls, and statuary. Until a vicious vine moves, there’s nothing to distinguish it from an inanimate vine.

Each vicious vine has AC 11; HP 16; and to Immunity Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Psychic damage. When a creature enters a space within 5 feet of the vine for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the vine tries to coil around that creature. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or have the Grappled condition (escape DC 12). While Grappled in this way, the target takes 5 (1d10) Necrotic damage from the vine’s life-draining thorns at the start of each of the target’s turns. The vine can grapple only one creature at a time.

As an Influence action, a character under the effect of a Speak with Plants spell or similar magic can try to persuade the vine to release its victim, doing so with a successful DC 10 Charisma (Persuasion) check. A creature released by the vine in this way won’t be attacked by that vine again for the next 24 hours.

At Higher Levels. You can scale the hazard for higher levels by increasing the Necrotic damage, the save DC, and the escape DC, as shown in the following table.

Levels

Necrotic Damage

Save/Escape DC

5–10

11 (2d10)

14

11–16

22 (4d10)

16

17–20

55 (10d10)

18
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgViciousVine00]

恶毒活藤由魔法活化，它们常常附着在门框、拱门、墙壁和雕像上。除非恶毒活藤移动，否则没有办法将其与非活化的 藤蔓区分开来。

每条恶毒活藤拥有AC 11，16 点生命值，并对钝击、穿刺和心灵伤害具有免疫。当一个生物一回合内第一次进入藤蔓5尺范围内，或在范围内开始其回合时，藤蔓将会尝试缠绕住 此生物。目标必须成功通过一次DC 12 的敏捷豁免，否则将陷入受擒状态（逃脱DC 12）。以此法陷入受擒状态的生物在自己的回合开始时，藤蔓上的荆棘会吸取其生命力，对其造成5（1d10）点暗蚀伤害。一条藤蔓同时只 能擒抱一个生物。

以一个影响动作，处于 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithP] 或者类似法术效应下的角色可以说服藤蔓释放受害者，这需要成功通过一次DC 10 的魅力（游说）检定。一个被藤蔓主动释放的生物在接下来的24小时内不会被这根藤蔓再次攻击。

针对更高等级。 你可以通过提高黯蚀伤害、豁免DC和逃脱DC来提高危害对应的等级范围，如以下表格所示。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGlaive0000]{Glaive}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}), Legendary (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, the weapon ignores Resistance to Slashing damage.

When you use this weapon to attack a creature that has at least one head and roll a 20 on the d20 for the attack roll, you cut off one of the creature’s heads. The creature dies if it can’t survive without the lost head. A creature is immune to this effect if it has Immunity to Slashing damage, if it doesn’t have or need a head, or if the DM decides that the creature is too big for its head to be cut off with this weapon. Such a creature instead takes an extra 30 Slashing damage from the hit. If the creature has Legendary Resistance, it can expend one daily use of that trait to avoid losing its head, taking the extra damage instead.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

你用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值。此外，此武器无视对挥砍伤害的抗性。

你在以此武器进行的攻击检定的 d20 中掷出 20，且目标生物至少有一个脑袋时，你砍下该生物的一颗头。如果该生物无法在失去这颗头的情况下生存，则它立即死亡。若该生物具有对挥砍伤害的免疫、没有头或不需要头部、或是DM认为此武器无法斩下如此巨大的头颅，则作为被斩首的替代，该生物在此次被命中时额外受到 30 挥砍伤害。若该生物具有传奇抗性，它可以消耗 1 次该特性的使用次数来避免被斩首，但仍需受到额外伤害。

original:
Wand, Artifact (Requires Attunement)

Lore

Crafted and wielded by Orcus, this ghastly wand slips from the demon lord’s grasp from time to time. When it does, it magically appears wherever the demon lord senses an opportunity to achieve some fell goal.

The wand is topped with a skull that once belonged to a human hero slain by Orcus. The wand can magically change in size to better conform to the grip of its user. All Holy Water within 10 feet of the wand is destroyed.

Any creature besides Orcus that tries to attune to the wand makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature takes 10d6 Necrotic damage. On a failed save, the creature dies and, if it is a Humanoid, turns into a Zombie.

Magic Weapon. You can wield the wand as a magic Mace that grants a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with it. The wand deals an extra 2d12 Necrotic damage on a hit.

Random Properties

Random Properties. The Wand of Orcus has the following random properties (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.iA3mHmvlXvWKlyBo#artifact-properties]{Artifacts} in this chapter):

  • 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorBenefici]{minor beneficial properties}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorBenefici]{major beneficial property}
  • 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorDetrimen]{minor detrimental properties}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorDetrimen]{major detrimental property}

The detrimental properties of the Wand of Orcus are suppressed while the wand is attuned to Orcus.

Protection. You gain a +3 bonus to Armor Class while holding the wand.

Spell Charge Cost Table

Spells. The wand has 7 charges and regains 1d4 + 3 expended charges daily at dawn. While holding the wand, you can cast one of the spells on the following table from it (save DC 18). The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell.

Spell

Charge Cost

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimateDea]{Animate Dead}

1

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBlight0000]{Blight}

2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCircleofDe]{Circle of Death}

3

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFingerofDe]{Finger of Death}

3

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPowerWordK]{Power Word Kill}

4

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithD]{Speak with Dead}

1

While attuned to the wand, Orcus or a follower blessed by him can cast each of the wand’s spells using 2 fewer charges (minimum of 0).

Call Undead. While holding the wand, you can take a Magic action to conjure 15 Skeletons and 15 Zombies. These Undead magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of you and obey your commands until they are destroyed or until the next dawn, when they collapse into inanimate piles of bones and rotting corpses. Once you use this property, you can’t use it again until the next dawn.

While holding the wand, Orcus can summon any kind of Undead, not just skeletons and zombies. These Undead don’t perish at dawn the following day, remaining until Orcus dismisses them.

Sentience/Personality

Sentience. The Wand of Orcus is a sentient Chaotic Evil item with an Intelligence of 16, a Wisdom of 12, and a Charisma of 16. It has hearing and Darkvision out to 120 feet.

The wand communicates telepathically with its wielder and speaks Abyssal and Common.

Personality. The wand’s purpose is to help satisfy Orcus’s desire to slay everything in the multiverse. The wand is cruel, nihilistic, and bereft of humor.

To further Orcus’s goals, the wand feigns devotion to its current user and makes grandiose promises that it has no intention of fulfilling, such as vowing to help its user overthrow Orcus.

Destroying the Wand. Destroying the Wand of Orcus requires that it be taken to the Positive Energy Plane by the ancient hero whose skull surmounts it. For this to happen, the long-lost hero must first be restored to life—no easy task, given the fact that Orcus has imprisoned the hero’s soul and keeps it hidden and well guarded.

Bathing the wand in positive energy (such as that which permeates the Positive Plane) causes it to crack and explode, but unless the above conditions are met, the wand instantly re-forms on Orcus’s layer of the Abyss.
translation:
魔杖，神器（需要同调）

传说

这根阴森恐怖的魔杖由奥喀斯制作并使用。它不时从其恶魔领主创造者的手中溜走，神奇地出现在恶魔领主感到有机会实现其邪恶目的的地方。

魔杖顶端是一个骷髅头，它曾属于一个被奥喀斯残杀的人类英雄。魔杖可以魔法地改变自身大小以适合其持用者的身形。所有位于奥喀斯之杖 10 尺内的圣水将被摧毁。

除奥喀斯外，任何生物与魔杖进行同调时，必须进行一次DC 17的体质豁免。豁免成功，则该生物受到10d6暗蚀伤害。豁免失败，则该生物死亡，若其是类人，则变为一只丧尸。

魔法武器。 你可以将魔杖用作一把魔法硬头锤，用魔杖进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值，魔杖命中时，额外造成 2d12 暗蚀伤害。

随机词条

随机词条。 奥喀斯之杖具有下列随机词条（见本章“@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.iA3mHmvlXvWKlyBo#artifact-properties]{神器}”）：

  • 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorBenefici]{次要增益词条}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorBenefici]{主要增益词条}
  • 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMinorDetrimen]{次要减益词条}
  • 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgMajorDetrimen]{主要减益词条}

与奥喀斯维持同调期间，奥喀斯之杖的减益词条将被抑制。

防护。 持握魔杖时，你的护甲等级获得+3加值。

法术充能消耗表

法术。 魔杖具有 7 充能并在每日黎明时重获 1d4 + 3 已消耗的充能。你可以从中施展下表中的法术（豁免DC 18）。表中表明了你施展对应的法术需要消耗多少充能。

法术

充能消耗

奥喀斯与受其祝福的追随者与魔杖维持同调期间，他们施展以上每个法术的充能消耗降低2（最低为0）。

唤起亡灵。 持握魔杖期间，你能够以 15 具骷髅 和 15 只丧尸，这些亡灵将魔法的自地面中升起或在你 300 尺内的未占据空间中生成，它们将服从你的命令，它们被摧毁或次日黎明时，它们会倒塌为一堆无生命的骨头和腐尸。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。

奥喀斯在持握魔杖期间可以召唤任意种类的亡灵，而非仅仅是丧尸和骷髅。这些亡灵不会在次日黎明消亡，而是存在直至奥喀斯将他们驱散。

智能/个性

智能。 奥喀斯之杖 是一根混乱邪恶的智能魔杖，智力为 16，感知 12，魅力 16。它具有 120 尺听觉及 120 尺黑暗视觉。奥喀斯之杖说通用语和炼狱语并可以通过心灵感应与持用者交流。

奥喀斯之杖说通用语和炼狱语并可以通过心灵感应与持用者交流。

个性。魔杖的目标是满足奥喀斯杀戮多元宇宙一切的欲望。魔杖残暴，虚无，且毫无幽默感。

为了进一步完成奥喀斯的目标，魔杖会假装忠诚于其现任使用者，甚至给对方许下根本不打算应允的承诺，比如发誓帮助对方推翻奥喀斯本尊。

摧毁奥喀斯之杖。 要摧毁奥喀斯之杖 ，需要魔杖上骷髅头的英雄本尊将其带到正能量位面。要做到这点，必须先让这位故去已久的英雄重新复活——这并非易事，奥喀斯囚禁了他的灵魂，藏在一个守备森严的秘密地点。

将魔杖浸没在正能量（例如弥漫在正位面的正能量）中将导致其崩坏炸裂，但如果无法满足上述的前提条件，破坏的魔杖将立即在奥喀斯所控制的深渊层域中重新形成。

original:
Wand, Uncommon (Requires Attunement by a Spellcaster)

This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]{Web} (save DC 13) from it.

Regaining Charges. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand’s last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
translation:
魔杖，非普通（需施法者同调）

这根魔杖具有7充能。持握它时，你可以消耗1充能从中施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]{蛛网术} (豁免DC13)。

恢复充能 这根魔杖在每日黎明时重获1d6+1已消耗的充能。当充能数耗尽时，骰一次 [[/r 1d20]].。如果骰值为1，魔杖将化作飞灰并被摧毁。

original:
Wand, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 charge while choosing a point within 120 feet of yourself. That location becomes the point of origin of a spell or other magical effect determined by rolling on the Wand of Wonder Effects table. Spells cast from the wand have a save DC of 15. If a spell’s maximum range is normally less than 120 feet, it becomes 120 feet when cast from the wand. If an effect has multiple possible subjects, the DM determines randomly which among them are affected.

Regaining Charges. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand’s last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the wand crumbles into dust and is destroyed.

Wand of Wonder Effects Table

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgWandOfWonderE rollable caption=false]

Foundry Note

The actionable effects of the table are included as activities and implemented as much as possible in the table to provide flexibility in how you'd like to use them.

The Expend activity should be used for any effect which isn't implemented as an activity for tracking charge uses.
translation:
魔杖，珍稀（需同调）

这根魔杖具有7充能。持握它时，你可以执行魔法动作并消耗1充能，并选择位于你120尺内的一点。那个位置变为由惊异魔杖效应表中骰出的法术或其他魔法效应的源点。从魔杖中施展的法术的豁免DC为15。如果一个法术的最大射程在正常情况下不足120尺，则当被魔杖释放时其射程变为120尺。若一种效应有多个可选目标，则DM随机决定其中哪个目标将被效应影响。

恢复充能. 这根魔杖在每日黎明时重获1d6+1已消耗的充能。当充能数耗尽时，骰一次 [[/r 1d20]]。如果骰值为1，魔杖将化作飞灰并被摧毁。

惊异魔杖效应表

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgWandOfWonderE rollable caption=false]

Foundry 注

表格中的可操作功能被设计为具体活动，并尽可能内置于表格本身，您可以灵活地选择如何使用他们。

若某效果未被设计为追踪充能次数的特定动作，则应采用'消耗动作'机制进行结算。

original:
Ring, Legendary (Requires Attunement)

Each Ring of Elemental Command is linked to one of the four Elemental Planes. The DM chooses or randomly determines the linked plane. For example, a Ring of Elemental Command (air) is linked to the Elemental Plane of Air.

Every Ring of Elemental Command has the following two properties:

Elemental Bane. While wearing the ring, you have Advantage on attack rolls against Elementals and they have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Elemental Compulsion. While wearing the ring, you can take a Magic action to try to compel an Elemental you see within 60 feet of yourself. The Elemental makes a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the Elemental has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start your next turn, and you determine what it does with its move and action on its next turn.

Elemental Focus. While wearing the ring, you benefit from additional properties corresponding to the ring’s linked Elemental Plane:

Water. You know Aquan, you gain a Swim Speed of 60 feet, and you can breathe underwater.

Spellcasting. The ring has 5 charges and regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can cast a spell from it. Choose the spell from the list of available spells based on the Elemental Plane the ring is linked to, as shown in the following table. The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell, which has a save DC of 18.

Plane

Spells (Charges)

Water

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCreateorDe]{Create or Destroy Water} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIceStorm00]{Ice Storm} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTsunami000]{Tsunami} (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{Wall of Ice} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterWalk0]{Water Walk} (2 charges)
translation:
戒指，传说（需同调）

每枚命令元素戒指都连接着四个元素位面之一。由DM选择或随机决定连接着的位面。例如，一枚命令元素戒指（气）连接着气元素位面。

每枚命令元素戒指都具有以下两种词条：

元素灾厄。 着装戒指期间，你对元素的攻击检定具有优势，且元素对你的攻击具有劣势。

元素强令。 着装戒指期间，你可以执行魔法动作来尝试强迫一个可见的，位于你 60 尺内的元素服从于你。该元素进行一次DC 18 的感知豁免。豁免失败时，该元素直到你的下个回合开始前陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态，且你决定其下一回合他将使用移动和动作做什么。

元素集中。 着装戒指期间，你受益于与该戒指连接的元素位面对应的额外词条：

水。 你懂水族语，你获得 60 尺游泳速度并且可以在水下呼吸。

施法。 这枚戒指具有 5 充能，并在每日黎明时重获 1d4 + 1 已消耗的充能。着装戒指期间，你可以从中施展法术。根据戒指连接的元素位面，从以下表格中选择对应的法术，施展相应法术所需的充能数如该表所示，法术的豁免DC为 18。

位面

法术（充能数）

水

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCreateorDe]{枯水术/造水术} (1 充能), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIceStorm00]{冰风暴} (2 充能), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTsunami000]{海啸术} (5 充能), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{冰墙术} (3 充能), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterWalk0]{水上行走} (2 充能)

original: If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].
translation: 如果你没有喝足够的水，你就有风险陷入 &Reference[脱水] 状态。

original:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepTrident000]{Trident}), Artifact (Requires Attunement)

You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you roll a 20 on the d20 for an attack roll with this weapon, the target takes an extra 21 Necrotic damage.

While holding Wave, you gain the following benefits:

Combat Ready. You have Advantage on Initiative rolls.

Underwater Adaptation. A bubble of air forms around your head while you are underwater, allowing you to breathe normally in that environment.

Aquatic Command. Wave has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While you carry it, you can expend 1 charge to cast Dominate Beast (save DC 20) from it on a Beast that has a Swim Speed.

Globe of Invulnerability. While holding Wave, you can cast the level 9 version of Globe of Invulnerability from it. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Sentience/Personality/Lore Details

Held in the dungeon of White Plume Mountain, Wave is engraved with images of waves, shells, and sea creatures.

Sentience. Wave is a sentient weapon of Neutral alignment, with an Intelligence of 14, a Wisdom of 10, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and Darkvision out to 120 feet.

The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and speaks Aquan.

Personality. Wave zealously encourages mortals to worship sea gods and has a habit of humming sea chanteys. Conflict arises if the wielder fails to further the weapon’s objectives in the world.

Destroying Wave. Wave can be destroyed only on the island of Thunderforge, where it was forged. The weapon must be melted down by a storm giant or someone imbued with a storm giant’s strength. Destroying Wave angers a god of the sea, who sends powerful agents to attack the island and punish the destroyers.
translation:
武器（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepTrident000]{三叉戟}），神器（需同调）

你用此魔法武器进行的攻击检定和伤害掷骰获得 +3 加值。当你在以此武器进行的攻击检定的 d20 中掷出 20 时，目标额外受到 21 暗蚀伤害。

持用波涛期间，你获得以下增益：

枕戈待命。你投掷先攻时具有优势。

水下适性。你身处水下期间，一个空气泡泡环绕着你的脑袋，令你可以在该环境下如常呼吸。

命令水栖。 波涛 具有3充能并在每日黎明时重获 1d3 充能，当你携带波涛时，你可以消耗 1 充能，对一只具有游泳速度的野兽施展支配野兽（豁免DC 20）。

法术无效结界。 持握波涛时，你可以从中施展九环版本的法术无效结界。该词条一经使用，直至次日黎明你都无法再次使用。

智能/个性/详细背景

波涛藏在白羽山的地下城中，这把精致的三叉戟上面雕有波浪、贝壳和海洋生物的图案。

智能。 波涛是一把具有绝对中立阵营的智能武器，智力为 14，感知 10，魅力 18。它具有 120 尺听觉及 120 尺黑暗视觉。

波涛与其持用者通过心灵感应交流，波涛也会说水族语。

个性。 波涛 热衷于劝诫凡人信仰海神，并有哼唱船歌的习惯。如果其持用者没有将波涛的目标传遍世界，波涛将进行反噬。

摧毁波涛。 波涛只会在雷铸岛——其被锻造出来的地方——被摧毁。波涛只能由风暴巨人或拥有着风暴巨人力量之人亲手熔化。摧毁波涛 将激怒一位海神，其将派遣强大的使徒们攻打小岛并惩罚将波涛摧毁之人。

original:
Weapon (Any Simple or Martial), Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

As long as this weapon is within your reach and you are attuned to it, you and allies within 30 feet of you gain the following benefits.

Alarm. The weapon magically awakens each subject who is sleeping naturally when combat begins. This benefit doesn’t wake a subject from magically induced sleep.

Supernatural Readiness. Each subject has Advantage on its Initiative rolls.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

武器（任意简易武器或军用武器），非普通（需同调）

在同调该武器后，只要这把武器在你的触及范围内，你和你30尺内的盟友便获得以下增益：

警报。 这把武器能魔法性地在战斗开始时唤醒处于自然睡眠中的受益者。该增益无法唤醒因魔法而导致的睡眠。

超然备战。每名受益者在投掷先攻时都具有优势。

original:
Nuisance Hazard (Levels 1–4)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgWebs000000000]{Webs}

Giant spiders weave thick, sticky webs across passages and at the bottom of pits to snare prey. These web-filled areas are &Reference[Difficult Terrain].

A creature that enters a web-filled area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. As an action, a creature Restrained by the webs can try to escape from them, doing so with a successful DC 12 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check.

Each 10-foot Cube of webs has AC 10; HP 15; Vulnerability to Fire damage; and Immunity to Piercing, Poison, and Psychic damage.
translation:
妨碍危害（等级1-4）

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgWebs000000000]{蛛网}

巨蜘蛛会在过道和陷坑底部编织厚实黏滑的蛛网用以捕猎。这些布满蛛网的区域皆视为困难地形。 &Reference[困难地形]。

在每个回合内首次进入蛛网覆盖区域内，或者在区域内开始自己的回合的生物需要成功通过一次DC 12 的敏捷豁免，否则 将陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态。以一个动作，一个被蛛网束缚的生物可以尝试从蛛网上逃脱，这需要成功通过一次DC12的力量（运动）或敏捷（特技）检定。

每10尺立方的蛛网拥有AC10，15点生命值，蛛网对火焰伤害具有易伤，而对穿刺、毒素和心灵伤害具有免疫。

original:
Wondrous Item, Legendary

This fine black cloth, soft as silk, is folded up to the dimensions of a handkerchief. It unfolds into a circular sheet 6 feet in diameter.

You can take a Magic action to unfold the Well of Many Worlds and place it on a solid surface, whereupon it forms a two-way, 6-foot-diameter, circular portal to another world or plane of existence. Each time the item opens a portal, the DM decides where it leads. The portal remains open until a creature within 5 feet of it takes a Magic action to close it by taking hold of the edges of the cloth and folding it up.

Once the Well of Many Worlds has opened a portal, it can’t do so again for [[/r 1d8 # Hours]] hours.
translation:
奇物，传说

这块丝绸般柔软的精致黑色布料折叠起来有手帕大小，展开时则为直径6尺的圆形。

你能够以一个魔法动作展开诸界之井，将它布置在坚实表面上，产生一扇直径6尺、通向另一个世界或存在位面的圆形双向传送门。每次此物品打开传送门时，由DM决定它所连接的地方。传送门保持开启，直至位于其5尺内的一名生物以一个魔法动作抓住布料的边缘把它折叠起来，来将传送门关闭。

诸界之井一经使用，在1d8 [[/r 1d8]]小时内都无法再次打开传送门。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon

While holding this fan, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind} (save DC 13) from it. Each subsequent time the fan is used before the next dawn, it has a cumulative 20 percent chance of not working; if the fan fails to work, it tears into useless, nonmagical tatters.

Roll for Chance of Not Working: [[/r 1d5cs>@item.uses.spent]]

Foundry Note

Each of use of Gust of Wind expends a use of this item and is reset at dawn. The inline roll above rolls 1d5 and checks if the value is higher than the number of uses to handle the cumulative 20 percent chance of not working. It will return "1" if it's successful and "0" if it fails.
translation:
奇物, 非普通

持握这把扇子时，你可以用它施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{造风术}（豁免DC13）。在次日黎明之前，随后每再次使用这把扇子都会累积20%的几率失效；如果扇子失效，则其会被撕裂成无用的非魔法碎纸。

Roll for Chance of Not Working: [[/r 1d5cs>@item.uses.spent]]

Foundry 注

每次使用造风术都会消耗一次该道具的使用次数，并在黎明时重置。上面的内联掷骰会掷出 1d5，并检查数值是否高于使用次数，以处理累计 20% 的失效几率。如果成功则返回 “1”，如果失败则返回 “0”。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

These boots have 4 charges and regain 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the boots, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 charge, gaining a Fly Speed of 30 feet for 1 hour. If you are flying when the duration expires, you descend at a rate of 30 feet per round until you land.
translation:
奇物, 非普通（需同调）

这双靴子具有4充能，并在每日黎明时恢复1d4已消耗的充能。着装这双靴子期间，你能够以一个魔法动作消耗1充能，获得30尺飞行速度，持续1小时。如果持续时间结束时你正飞行，则你将以每轮30尺的速度下降直至着陆。

original: The wings lasts for 1 hour or until you end the effect early as a Magic action. The wings give you a Fly Speed of 60 feet.
translation: 这对翅膀会持续1小时，或直至你使用一个魔法动作提前结束效应。这对翅膀会赋予你60尺飞行速度。

original:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)

While wearing this cloak, you can take a Magic action to turn the cloak into a pair of wings on your back. The wings lasts for 1 hour or until you end the effect early as a Magic action. The wings give you a Fly Speed of 60 feet. If you are aloft when the wings disappear, you fall. When the wings disappear, you can’t use them again for [[/r 1d12]] hours.
translation:
奇物, 珍稀（需同调）

着装这件斗篷期间，你能够以一个魔法动作将斗篷转变为你背上的一对翅膀。这对翅膀会持续1小时，或直至你使用一个魔法动作提前结束效应。这对翅膀会赋予你60尺飞行速度。如果翅膀消失时你仍在空中则你会坠落。翅膀消失后，你在[[/r 1d12]] 小时内无法再次使用它们。

original: The wings lasts for 1 hour or until you end the effect early as a Magic action. The wings give you a Fly Speed of 60 feet.
translation: 这对翅膀会持续1小时，或直至你使用一个魔法动作提前结束效应。这对翅膀会赋予你60尺飞行速度。

original:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon (+1), Rare (+2), or Very Rare (+3)

While wearing these wraps, you have a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with your Unarmed Strikes. The bonus is determined by the wraps’ rarity, and those strikes deal your choice of Force damage or their normal damage type.

Foundry Note

The Wrap Unarmed Strike activity can be used to enchant your Unarmed Strike with the relevant bonuses, rarity, and damage type. You will be able to select the damage type when you roll damage and the system will remember your choice going forward.

If you don't already have an Unarmed Strike natural weapon you can add this one to your character sheet: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgUnarmedStrike]{Unarmed Strike}.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]
translation:
奇物，非普通（+1）/珍稀（+2）/极珍稀（+3）

裹着这套布制绑带期间，你的徒手打击的攻击检定与伤害掷骰获得加值。加值的数值取决于这套绷带的稀有度，且你可以令你的徒手打击造成力场伤害，而非原本的伤害类型。

Foundry 注

绑带徒手攻击 行动可用于为你的 “徒手攻击 ”附加相关的加值、稀有度和伤害类型。你可以在掷伤害时选择伤害类型，系统会记住你的选择。

如果你还没有徒手打击天生武器，你可以在你的角色卡里加入这个：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgUnarmedStrike]{徒手打击}。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgFoundryRefere.JournalEntryPage.Ok4iCgD25ENgoRxE cite=false caption=false classes="hide-in-embed"]

key: entries->Wraps of Unarmed Power->activities->Wrap Unarmed Strike->name

original:
Injury Poison

A creature subjected to Wyvern Poison makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
translation:
损伤型毒药

受这种毒药影响的生物需要进行一次DC14的体质豁免，豁免失败则受到24（7d6）毒素伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

original:
Deadly Hazard (Levels 1–4) or Nuisance Hazard (Levels 5–10)

Actor: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgYellowMold000]{Yellow Mold}

Yellow mold grows in dark places, and one patch covers a 5-foot square. If touched, the mold ejects a cloud of spores that fills a 10-foot Cube. Any creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) Poison damage and have the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 minute. While Poisoned in this way, the creature takes 5 (1d10) Poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Direct sunlight or any amount of Fire damage destroys a patch of yellow mold.
translation:
致命危害(等级1–4) 或 妨害危害(等级5–10)

角色： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgYellowMold000]{黄霉菌}

黄霉菌生在阴暗处，每片黄霉菌覆盖5尺方形区域。如果被触碰，黄霉菌会喷射出一片覆盖10尺立方区域的孢子云。任何处于此区域内的生物必须成功通过一次DC15的体质豁免，否则将受到11（2d10）点毒素伤害，并在接下来的一分钟内陷入&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态。以此法中毒的生物在其每个回合开始时受到5（1d10）点毒素伤害。生物在每个自己的回合结束时重新豁免，豁免成功则效应终止。

阳光直射或任何火焰伤害都会立刻摧毁一片黄霉菌。
